I was vaccinated, but I also lived out there mask free from March 2020 until I was. Worked with someone who got Covid, he wasnâ€™t vaxxed at the time, but got through it with mild symptoms. Who knows, I had sniffles, coughs, and the like, maybe I had it too? The thing is, shit happens. â€œLove thy neighborâ€ as a decent human being you shouldnâ€™t go and spit and cough on someone if you have Covid, but this whole mandate, guilt, and â€œcancellingâ€ is way to out of hand. The fear mongering is totally out of control, especially now when we have tons of information. I personally donâ€™t understand the whole anti-vax crap myself, but I do know how it all probably started and so do you. The 2020 election. The â€œhateâ€ for Trump. The world of â€œwokenessâ€ that takes offense at any and all jokes, accidents, or misspoken words. The people who fervently attach their wagon to another and lose all of their common sense.
As the election rolled on and the â€œhatredâ€ for Trump grew, the Democrats stroked the fear of a â€œTrumpâ€ Vaccine. That fear grew to both sides of the spectrum and â€œcommon senseâ€ took a shit. Now, I believe in choice. You donâ€™t want to take it, donâ€™t. You want an abortion, get it. You want to stick your privates into a mouse trap, feel free. I know I wonâ€™t, but I wonâ€™t push you either way in what you decide.
Try this on for size.. This will make your brain sad. We vaxxed people have to wear masks, not to protect us, but to protect the unvaxxed, but the unvaxxed are being denied life saving surgeries because they arenâ€™t vaxxed. SO we have to keep them healthy and Doctors, who are sworn to, donâ€™t. everyone understands risks, unless you have some sort of disability. We have passed the flu and common cold to each other for hundreds of years, even after thereâ€™s been a flu vaccine, that by the way is totally voluntary.
People are dying and Iâ€™m not going to sit here and say itâ€™s because they all had underlining conditions, because that would be stupid. Whether it naturally occured, which I personally donâ€™t think it did, or was made in a lab, it happened. Like the spanish flu and the plague. Going to sound horrible, but some people are and were meant to die from it, some people are and were meant to be damaged by it, and some are and were able to slide on through unscathed. Polio, my Grandmother had it when she was young and became what they called at the time â€œa carrierâ€ and both her siblings died from it, yet she came through. My Great Grandparents also. A vaccine was made and was not used as political folly and most everyone took it and to this day we take it. There are side effects, but to a small percentage. But you know what? In 1955 there wasnâ€™t 24 hour news channels that had to have audiences and ratings. Old Mr. Smith, from Kansas, got the polio vax and became deathly ill because an allergic reaction. It was horrible, but it wasnâ€™t constantly pushed, in your face and examined over and over as though the coming of the anti-christ, like now days. This is what happened to the Covid vaccine. Just imagine if the polio vaccine was just made today. You internet fanatics would start with how it makes the government track you. Politicians would use it against each otherâ€™s intentions both good or bad, FOX, CNN, and the others would spend hours and days about the good and bad and even interview the fanatics and finally find that one person who had a bad reaction and make it seam like every 1 in 3 people instantly drop dead from it. For views, likes, or just plain attention movie stars, singers, pod casters, and â€œself importantâ€ people will battle with each other about the good and bad. All the while people will die or be disabled or walk scot-free with no side effects, because thatâ€™s just how the world works.
No matter what people say or how many otherâ€™s they cancel. No matter if one believes in the vaccine or doesnâ€™t. Itâ€™s your life, you know the risks, you know the benefits. At anytime a plane or a meteor can fall out of the sky on to you. Who knows? For those of you who are ultra religious, God could end us in a blink of an eye. So should we constantly live in fear of everything or live life knowing the risks and believing others do to? Itâ€™s all common sense and no one should be allowed to push another out of employment or house and home based on their beliefs. Actual actions? Thatâ€™s a different story.

After my last 2 entries I bet everyone is missing the â€œwoe is meâ€ Colby.
Although this one wonâ€™t quite be as whiney as most, it will definitely fall into that category.
Iâ€™m jealous of others. I read the posts and see the pictures on Facebook of friends and I see their family pictures. Scott and his loving wife and two girls proudly, lovingly standing together. Charley and his wifeâ€™s vacation. Mikeâ€™s and his bride and their travels and dogs. Yes, there are a few that donâ€™t have the perfect family like I have had to slowly admit mine is now. It goes beyond that though. There are several friends that have â€œrediscoveredâ€ the love of someone from their past or reconnected with the ex.
Ultimately, my â€œdamagedâ€ mind wanders to Patty and how completely cut me out of her life. How does someone do that? How is it possible when you share 4 children? How is it possible when you live in the otherâ€™s childhood home, surrounded by reminders, and finding the otherâ€™s memories, treasures, and momentoâ€™s of the past? Iâ€™m happy that most of the time itâ€™s the boys that find them, but I hate that we havenâ€™t together. Years have past, I know this, but it hurts to be treated and talked to as I am by her as thought I was a stranger or the choice from shelf 12 at the sperm bank. Once again I fall back to the thought, I never treated her in any horrendous way. Most women who kill to be treated like she was. She ultimately became the person she said for 20 years she would not be. Love = Money.
Lately Iâ€™ve been good. I had an awful panic attack last week, but have been numb about everything since. As people have read my â€œpoliticalâ€ views they can see I am getting back to my load mouthed, uneducated views on things. Believe it or not, I have always felt that way about myself. I have always been awkward and immature. I am the prime example of the saying, â€ Let people think of you as stupid instead of opening your mouth and proving it.â€
SO, the new trend for me on Facebook dating is to get likes from people and then never talked to. It is nice to see that people have â€œlikeâ€ me based on some pictures and a quick description, but the silence just makes me feel as though they had an â€œoopsâ€ moment as they scrolled through the countless faces.
Well, maybe something will happen in the world later or tomorrow and I can get back to soap box with my dunce cap on.

Title: 2/2/22 Again
Content:
Once again the Universe has reminded me of my place in it. Once again I allowed my head to pop out from the hole I found myself in for 3 years now. Spent yet another day texting and chatting with someone. I allowed the warmth of feeling worthy and special to fill me, finally the bleak hard days may be over. Then like so many times before, I woke to the â€œtextâ€.
Iâ€™m the mole in â€œwhack a moleâ€ game that is played by the grand champion. Never missing, they bring the mallet down everytime I pop up. The shit eating grin on my face gets knock back into the hole, over and over until the time runs out. It never was like this before. Sure, I had tough days, incredibly tough days, but the â€œwallsâ€ held and safely inside of them, I looked to the bright future with my family and friends around me every day. I never saw the â€œinside jobâ€ come. The walls were torn down from the inside out and the enemy rushed in.
Iâ€™m too old, to young, not religious enough, a smoker, a nonsmoker, my kids are too young. Iâ€™m not in the right place in life, not compatible, not financially stable, not a good enough Father, a Father. Iâ€™m too short, not healthy enough, donâ€™t smile. Iâ€™ve heard and been â€œblown offâ€ with almost every excuse other than how I smell.
I listened about how she really missed little kids running around and the energy they gave off. She wished for Grandchildren and couldnâ€™t wait for her son and daughter and their partners to give her Grandbabies.. Yet, my kids are too young for her to be comfortable with. The mallet once again came down to â€œknockâ€ me back into the hole.
I give up. I wasnâ€™t good enough for the woman I had spent 20 years with and actually had kids with. She left me for a man 20 years her senior. A man who had a checkered past and a broken relationship of his own. A man whoâ€™s bad habits leave mine in the dust. How can I possibly think that anyone would truly want me if the one person who â€œlovedâ€ me left me for that? What does that say about me?
Sure, at first I tried too hard. Iâ€™ve learned from the mistakes. I have come to know me and like me, as people have constantly told me in that non-compassionate way people do. Iâ€™m afraid that I have become to comfortable with myself and thatâ€™s what scares me. Iâ€™m starting to want to shut the world out. It takes everything I have to come to work, to keep my job. I donâ€™t want to leave my â€œjail cellâ€ of an apartment. Not to shop, not to go out to eat, and slowly, not to get my kids. Donâ€™t get me wrong, I want to see them and be with them, I love them, but I wish they could be brought to me and picked up when the visit is over. I used to be a friendly and talkative person. I never felt any issues about going up to a stranger and having a conversation or going to a crowded bar, restaurant, or event, but now I avoid them. For almost 2 years, when I got out of my breakdown, I have tried to talk to, meet, and date new people and every time, every â€œIâ€™m sorry, butâ€¦..â€, every unanswered call or text, has chipped away at what little â€œmeâ€ I used to be.
Itâ€™s nice that married women tell me Iâ€™m handsome and anyone would be lucky to be with me. Same with people who live states or countries away who never intend to ever meet me, that say the same thing. The obligated â€œoh your baby is so beautifulâ€ thing you say when clearly itâ€™s the ugliest thing youâ€™ve ever seen. What really sealed the deal about the absolute fakeness of peopleâ€™s compliments was when an old friend must have taken pity on me during the initial trama of my â€œmentalâ€ break from my marriage ending. For 2.5 years we talked about everything. We flirted and laughed. She told me of how she always had a crush on me and how if she didnâ€™t live overseas she would jump at a chance to be with me. She was in a thin ice marriage and would say how when it ended she would be on the first plane back here. Apparently, it was all said to â€œcheer me upâ€ and not ever planned to happen, until it did. She came home this past December. I have yet to hear from her. No visit or phone call. No answer to messages. Come to find out she started a relationship with someone else. So needless to say, Iâ€™ve given up on taking compliments. Between the empty oneâ€™s from the untouchable oneâ€™s and the â€œsorry butâ€¦.â€ oneâ€™s, Iâ€™ve come to believe I am not worthy of anyoneâ€™s attention, friendship or love.
I couldnâ€™t keep my own wife happy no matter what I did. I couldnâ€™t keep my life long friends. I couldnâ€™t keep the unconditional love of my siblings. The only people who will talk to me are online, no offense, or the professional oneâ€™s I pay to talk to me. I never thought I would be what it is that life seems to be making me, but all the efforts Iâ€™ve made, all the attempts, and all the begging pleas have done nothing to stop it. It may seem as though I am whining and feeling sorry about myself, maybe I am or maybe I unknowingly caused all this to myself because of actions and nonactions. Iâ€™m sorry to the few in this world who still care and I am sorry to my boys, but as of right now I quit.

Yesterday I started to write about Patty. A deep dive in the years of memories to attempt to see where, when, or even if she actually loved me or was trapped in our relationship. I know how I felt from the first day. I know how her slightest touch comforted me and helped quiet my mind. I didnâ€™t write this to torture myself, rather I have been trying to do a process called Radical Acceptance. I had mentioned this a while back and the other day I finally got a book about it. Now Iâ€™ll be the first to admit Iâ€™m a little dense when it comes to reading and learning. I have always been what they callÂ Kinesthetic.
Kinesthetic â€“Â Taking a physically active role, kinesthetic learners are hands-on and thrive when engaging all of their senses during course work. These learners tend to work well in scientific studies due to the hands-on lab component of the course.Â 
So needless to say, doing this on my own is kind of breaking my brain. The thing is, I have to embrace the pain and work out the cause of it all to come to grips with the why and what of it. I told you it makes my head sad. Who knows, maybe I am doing it all totally wrong, need to read on.
Â A lot of people understand what I am going through but, for some reason I want those close to me to understand. I want my Sister to say sheâ€™s sorry and sheâ€™s here for me. My friendâ€™s the same. They all have known me all my life and they know who I am and how things effect me. Yet for some reason a 20+ year relationship with a person, who you have 4 children with and made no secret about how you felt about her, your children, and them, doesnâ€™t matter and I should have just brushed it off like dirt.

I just wrote a long Fuck You post on FaceBook. Found out one or more of my â€œfriendsâ€ were running to Patty and telling her anything I may say about my feelings on the whole divorce for the past 3 years. I held nothing back, I donâ€™t care anymore. Feelings for the village I grew up in and where I chose to raise my family in and how people knew us. Almost everyone in that village knew us, but chose to not say or inform me about her â€œaffairâ€. I had know these people all my life. I went to church with them, school with them, ate beside them and they just chose to ignore it. I blasted her work. All the people who work there and knew us for years. They always a loving couple and children, but chose to â€œnot get involvedâ€ and even encouraged her relationship with him. Even before the â€œbreakâ€ they knew and all just stood there, with their fake ass smiles as they saw me and my kids when we stopped there for items or to pick her up. I called out the fakes who â€œhad my backâ€ yet were no where to be found when I needed them the most. The liars who said up and down how they would get together with me and have me over if they ever came home to Silver Creek, only to come home and totally ignore me like the rest. I yelled at the world.
Is this helpful? Should I have done it? I donâ€™t care. For 3 years these â€œfriendsâ€ have known what I was going through, how it was breaking me, and the dark places I found myself and they did nothing. Oh the occasional, â€œit gets betterâ€ was said. Yet the same oneâ€™s would tell me how they just didnâ€™t do things because of covid, yet would post pictures of the party they had or the bar they went to. The same ones would say they werenâ€™t looking to date, when all I wanted to do was go for coffee and talk, yet would find themselves in new relationships days later. And, of course the ones that would messenger me and would get me to tell them my feelings and then run right to Patty. Could we have reconciled?Â  Could we have gone to counselling? I guess not when people were filling her head with doubt and encouraging her affair.
I talk about it, obviously, but I have become numb. Over the course of the last few weeks, I have tried not to. I have wrote here and in menâ€™s divorce groups to try to hold onto my feelings and empathy. I just donâ€™t have it in me anymore and I want to not feel, anything.

Title: More randoms
Content:
I just went for a walk around my work. Itâ€™s snowing pretty hard here, but not biting cold. I tried to listen and clear my mind to â€œbe in the momentâ€, Iâ€™m just not ready.
Why am I still grieving the end of my marriage and loss of my wife after 3 years? The things she has done and said. Her actions since. I still give her the benefit of the doubt and she is literally another manâ€™s wife. Why did I have to be the one to lose everything? Why does everyone else get to stay in the life I made? Why wonâ€™t anyone just come and talk to me?
I donâ€™t want to go home to the apartment today, but I have no money or gas to go anywhere else. I feel the triggers of my depression starting and Iâ€™m trying to change them. Iâ€™m not excited that I have a 2 day weekend when I should be. I donâ€™t want another anxiety attack.
Listening to Dr. Philâ€™s podcast on Borderline Personality Disorder. Iâ€™ve been told I have it and I wish â€œmy peopleâ€ would listen and understand it instead of just shutting me out of their lives. If thatâ€™s what cost me my love and family, what am to think? Why havenâ€™t I ever been giving a 2nd chance with people? Why wonâ€™t people just talk to me?
Should I get a therapist online? Mine moved to another area, not far, but not near. Should I get a life coach? Should I get a hooker? Iâ€™m tired of being scared of life without people. Actual human contact, not a zoom thing, not a virtual bar crawl or group.
This is going to be a horrible weekend.

Title: Whatâ€™s done is done
Content:
Sitting here realizing I screwed up my life. Iâ€™ve no where to go and no one to see. The only person devastated by the divorce is me, no one else, even the boys. That sounds awful, but itâ€™s true. Oh, they do miss from time to time, but life never missed a beat. Mom moved a man in the same day Dad left and she never talked to the boys about it, it was just the way it was.
How is it I mean so little to everyone? I have disorder. Iâ€™ve been told this. Borderline Personality Disorder. Iâ€™ve told this to people, my therapist has told this to people and all their reactions were the same. Nothing. No one looked into it or sat down with me. My sister talked to my therapist and essentially made it all seem as though all she ever did was help, yeah right. So everything is me.
Iâ€™ve thought about suicide, several times in the last few years. I wonâ€™t do it, physically that is. I think tonight Iâ€™m going to mentally kill the person I am. There wonâ€™t be any tears from people and no one will find out or even care.
First thing, I have sent my last text to anyone. Letâ€™s see how long I can really go before someone reaches out. Second, I just wonâ€™t care anymore. Iâ€™m going to smoke, eat, drink what I want, when I want. I left social media, except for this and I can bet you, no one will or has noticed. So, time to pull the metaphysical trigger.. See you on the other side.

Iâ€™m sitting here in a Tim Hortonâ€™s parking lot, drinking my coffee and thinking about how my life has turned out so far. Trying desperately to remember the few â€œgoodâ€ times that have happended along the way. I was there for all my childrenâ€™s births, seeing their little faces. I try to remember their firsts. the steps, the words, their laughs. Iâ€™m not allowed to talk to their mothers anymore about any of it. Not in a loving way as two people who made a life. I try to remember the good times i had with their mothers, but all I can think of is how both of them dismiss old memories of us as if we never existed and that instantly makes the memory go dark. Those are my memories from the age of 17 to now. My kids and my pain.
All I wanted was to be a husband and Father. All I tried to do was be the best at both. Both times I was left for another who was only there for them, my exâ€™s. I had and have become the blame, the reason, and the cause for every bad thing that my children do or donâ€™t do. Never for any good. After the â€œfireâ€ I have never been told by either of them that Iâ€™m a good Father or anything. No Fatherâ€™s day thank you for being their Dad. No apreciation for child support or things bought for their needs. Nothing. Yeah, I should do these things and I shouldnâ€™t expect appreciation for supporting my own children. But, after a lifetime of not good enough, I would like some sort of compliment or acknowledgement.
I read and hear of these saved marriages and familys and all I can think of is how I was never given an opportunity to save mine. There was no regrets from my exâ€™s, no second thoughts, and no reasons given. One day I, all of a sudden, just became not good enough. Not worth anything. I could fall off the face of the Earth and nothing would stop and look back for me.
I canâ€™t remember if it was Tom Sawyer or Huckleberry Finn who spied on their own funeral, but I would love to see how people would react to my â€œdeathâ€. Morbid, I know, but for all the cries for help and pleas for support that have fallen on the deaf ears of friends and family over the course of my divorce, I canâ€™t help to think that it will be trouble enough to despose of my body. Frankly Iâ€™ve said it and Iâ€™ll say it again, I will be long dead and rotting before anyone will come looking. I will be the smell coming from apartment 8.
Â 
I donâ€™t have money to just pack up and go, she saw to that. Where would I anyway?Â  The only family that knows of me is the family that doesnâ€™t talk to me. No Aunts or Uncles anywhere. No Cousins that know me or that are close enough to offer me a place to stay until I get established. I certainly donâ€™t want to play homeless in a warmer state. So here I am stuck in my nightmare.
Â 
DAY 2 of no texts or calls from the â€œpeopleâ€ in my life.

Sitting here looking at the pictures of my sons. From babies to little men. Iâ€™m so so proud of each one. Wishing I was more of a constant in their lives.
The common sense of the whole thing is right there staring me in the face. I love a woman who no longer or never loved me. How could a person do what she did for essentially money? I know it happens, you hear and read about it all the time. I hate that I have held such a naivety about how love and life works. I hate that I only see the good in people, when the bad hangs on them like a smell. I hate that I canâ€™t live my life as selfishly as most do.
Yet, I want my boys to be like me in that sense, but I know this world and what itâ€™s becoming will eat them up and spit them out. Maybe what she did is better for them. Maybe this hard lesson and truth will serve them so much more then watching their sad gullible empathic father fall apart.
Â 
Day 3â€¦

I donâ€™t like me.
Even when my life was put together, I didnâ€™t particularly like me.
Iâ€™ve racked my brain to remember when it all took a shit inside me. The only thing I can think was my relationship with my first ex wife Vikki. We met in 1987 when she moved to my village to live with her Mom. Up until then I remember having a confidence that easily shook off issues, of course I had plenty of friends and interests that occupied my life. Vik was the typical 80â€™s girl. The big hair and looks. She always smelt intoxicating as she would pass me in the halls and I was totally smitten from the first time I saw her. Several attempts went unnoticed by her until one night we were walking around, me and her and her friend. She was casually bumping into me and lingering in front of me, looking into my eyes and rubbing up against me. Eventually, back at her house we wound up kissing and she instantly got me. The first few months were awesome, well as awesome as any teenage relationship can be, but then the bumps hit. Apparently I wasnâ€™t the only one that had noticed her and well, she loved the attention. Several times she would start the â€œbreak upâ€ talk and several times I lost my shit. Crying and begging her to stay. Believe it or not I was a bit more dramatic then I am now. She cheated on me a couple times and like a fool I begged for her forgiveness because I had obviously did something to cause her to. Also, at this time my â€œfriendsâ€ werenâ€™t really there for me like they were before. That was my fault too. I had chosen a girl over them and I was, what the kids say â€œpussy whippedâ€.
With age age comes wisdom, people say, and I realize that I should have just been done with it and thought of myself and my future, butâ€¦.
We somehow would get to back together and then break up and then got back together. Eventually, I wound up getting her pregnant. Because I was raised the way I was and having gone to church every Sunday, I thought they since we were having a baby that we were going to be together forever, that she would love me forever.Â  It was good dream, fun wedding and great time until after Kayla was born and Vikki healed up. Then it all went to shit and my brain couldnâ€™t handle it. Much like today, I had no friends to fall back to. I let every nasty thing she and her â€œnewâ€ guy said stick. I looked at this as my fault, and really no one was telling me different. The only saving grace was I was young. Barely in my 20â€™s and still had the youthful looks. I still had women interested in me for just that reason and I never really was alone. My parentâ€™s were still alive and I had my old room to fall back to, but the cracks were there and damage was done as far as my self confidence and image went. The Borderline Personality Disorder started then I believe.
Then life really kicked in.

Title: OOPS
Content:
Well I guess Iâ€™m stuck on Match.com for 6 months unless they agree to refund my payment. Usually online purchases come to a â€œare you sure?â€ type on confirmation. Thatâ€™s what I get I guess, for being curious.
Â 
Â 
OH and Day 4

Day 5
Â 
I think I met someone. Of course, Iâ€™ve said that about 20 times in the last 2 years. So weâ€™ll see.
Match refunded my money, NY state is good for somethings, apparently due to NY law Iâ€™m allowed a 3 day, no questions asked refund for pay sites.
Caught up on the show 1883 last night, DAMN thatâ€™s a good show. Oh and Ozark, I was a fan from the first on that one. So, yeah, I just bummed around yesterday afternoon. Was thinking of making soup but, I just donâ€™t care to cook things anymore after all of this. I used to live for cooking for my family, now though it just doesnâ€™t feel right anymore.
On the way to work today I heard a song that I havenâ€™t heard in ages and WOW did it speak to me. Bluer Than Blue by Michael Johnson.

After you go, I can catch up on my reading
After you go, Iâ€™ll have a lot more time for sleeping
And when youâ€™re gone, looks like things are gonna be a lot easier
Life will be a breeze, you know
I really should be glad
But Iâ€™m bluer than blue, sadder than sad
Youâ€™re the only light this empty room has ever had
And life without you is gonna be
Bluer than blue
After you go, Iâ€™ll have a lot more room in my closet
After you go, Iâ€™ll stay out all night long if I feel like it
And when youâ€™re gone I can run through the house screaming
And no one will ever hear me
I really should be glad
But Iâ€™m bluer than blue, sadder than sad
Youâ€™re the only light this empty room has ever had
And life without you is gonna be
Bluer than blue
I donâ€™t have to miss no TV show
I can start my whole life over
Change the numbers on my telephone
But the nights will sure be colder
And Iâ€™m bluer than blue, sadder than sad
Youâ€™re the only light this empty room has ever had
And life without you is gonna be
Bluer than blue

I also heard Re-Flex, The Politics of Dancing, too. So thereâ€™s that.

Title: Getting it out of my noodle
Content:
A customer just came into my work today and I got triggered. Not because of a mask thing, race thing, or any number of woke issues. I was triggered because he was an older gentleman with a young wife or girlfriend. The mind went right to my situation. My ex leaving me for a man 20 years older than her, 10 years older than me. This man just bought a trailer worth over $7000 with a pass of a credit card. So money is the key, has to be.
Maybe, once upon a time, love was all that mattered, but those days have come and gone in my opinion and my experience. What makes it so much worse for me is this guy, my exâ€™s new husband, from everything I have learned was just a bounce around loser, who at his lowest supposedly â€œfound Godâ€. That and he was left some property, which he sold and essentially â€œboughtâ€ my exâ€™s love with. I have ran the situation through my mind over and over if this never happened. We would have got the owed taxes paid, this is her big grievance with me, I hadnâ€™t paid the house taxes and we owed X amount. As I had told her, weeks before the break, they would be paid up with the income tax refund we were going to receive and low and behold they were. I wasnâ€™t there at the time and half of the return was mine, but they were paid. By then, he had moved in and sold his land and â€œBOOMâ€ she had money. More than we were ever able to save, we were raising children and such, so in an instant, she had thousands of dollars. Iâ€™m not discounting the love this guy has for her, she was easy to love, but I fail to see what else besides his money she sees in him.
Three large stimulus payments and several months of child tax payments and 2 huge tax returns (4 kids) and she is sitting pretty. Money in savings, trips, new crap in the house. Like an idiot, I walked away from $25,000 of the $35,000 of my share of the house, my house, because I was guilted about how the boyâ€™s needed this and that and how the house needed to be fixed up. To late now, papers have been written and signed. I still havenâ€™t been given my 10k though.
Is it fair of me to make such a blanket statement of women? No, I do believe there are those who live through good and bad times together, but there are those who are just motivated by money. Maybe the writing was on the wall when her mother married a well off Native American man who had a very successful cigarette business. The new house she got, the modern appliances, and the furniture and new leased vehicle every year. Then one day, he got sick and put the business in his childrenâ€™s name and I want to say it took all of a week for her to kick his ass out. I know, me and my brother in law had to come and change all the locks.
I just thought my ex was different. She would go for hours bitching about how my mother in law was. How ever since her father died, mom would just use people and how there was no love involved although it was said. How stupid I was, how stupid I am still.
I read in the news today aboutÂ Shimon Hayut, who they call the Tinder Swindler. Thereâ€™s a documentary on Netflix. He would, obviously, get these beautiful women to date him. He would, for a time, wine and dine them in fancy restaurants,Â  hotels, and vacations. They fell for it every time. He would tell them he was some type of diamond mogul. Then eventually he would get them to open up credit accounts or straight ask them for money, you know because they â€œlovedâ€ him for his heart, not his money. All told, he walked away with millions from them all. From what I can find, heâ€™s pretty ordinary looking and definately, IMHO, way out their league, but heâ€™s a diamond mogul and they are just the salt of the earth types of men all women want. Right?
I know, I am one of the million â€œplain lookingâ€ hard luck fellows that believe ourselves to be the â€œgood guyâ€ women always seem to say canâ€™t be found. Yet, we are bad ones because we didnâ€™t get born into money or the right family, werenâ€™t smart enough to be lawyers or doctors, or good looking enough to be actors or models. Oh, and because some of us arenâ€™t over attracted to certain types of women. So I think I just called out the hypocrisy of us types of guys. Maybe we deserve to be walked over and left for a richer ugly guy.
So yeah, I unfortunately judged this old guy and his young, out of his league lady, who spent thousands with out a blink of his eye and then got into his $50,000 Dodge truck and hitched up his trailer to tote around his 2 side by sides to take to his â€œvacationâ€ home. Meanwhile, thereâ€™s a man out there, king of plain looking, who installs dry wall for a contractor, that would die for this girl, who one day left him for â€œgreenerâ€ pastures.
Ok, I am still bitterâ€¦..

Day 6, I think. Itâ€™s all a blur..
Iâ€™m at a loss of words today. It was a fairly boring night. Went down the YouTube rabbit hole for a while, watching a wide variety of fail videos and meme reviews. I discovered a channel calledÂ Psych2Go and WOW it really opened my mind and eyes about a lot of things. Hereâ€™s a link to that if you ever wondered about something raddling your noodle like me :Â https://www.youtube.com/psych2go
I triedÂ Binaural Beats when I went to bed. I have headphones that I bought a few months ago call Bed Phones that kind of fit comfortable enough to sleep with for people that sleep like I do. I guess you can say I am a side sleeper, IDK, I burrow like like a hamster in my pillow and blankets. Not the greatest sleep technique for older people with bad aches and pains. It usually takes me about a hour to get around the apartment without painâ€¦LOLÂ  I just have never been able to sleep on my back.
Anyhoo, supposedly listening toÂ Binaural Beats is supposed to somehow program your brain and such. Look it up because I will do no justice to it by trying to explain it. Does or did it work? I really donâ€™t know. I did have some nice dreams. Really nice dreams where it seemed everything was working great in whatever life I was dreaming about. Neither of my exâ€™s were in them. Maybe an old friend or two. I want to say a dalliance with an old female boss I had years ago. The typical dream that goes all over the place, but still seems connected for some reason. I guess Iâ€™ll have to keep at it and see how it goes.
I have to go grocery shopping tonight, which after the divorce has actually become a chore and not the pleasant thing it was back then. I used to love finding new things to make for Patty or making her favorites. The kids tell me that she has totally changed on what she used to like that I made. Not sure if I should take that as bad or good. Does she miss my cooking so much that she just chooses to eat different because no one can match it? Did she hate it this whole time? It took a long time to go shopping at first. My mind would constantly go to her as I went through the isles and saw all the things I used make and found new things I was sure she would love. Iâ€™ve all but stopped cooking in general instead I buy the same things week after week. Light cream (for coffee), Fairlife 2% milk, Fiber one cereal, Bobâ€™s red mill oatmeal, Bananas (to make Fiber one palatable), Pears and Apples. Sometimes a salad mix. I used to make stews and soups, casseroles and pasta salads. Several types of sandwiches and various â€œNewâ€ recipes. I would experiment with all types of things but, now itâ€™s cereal or oatmeal in the morning and salad or fruit at night. On the off chance I want to liven things up, Iâ€™ll order a pizza. No more pop (soda), juice, deserts (thatâ€™s what the fruit is for) . A sad meal plan for a sad man.
So, yep, thatâ€™s all I got todayâ€¦

So my brain did it to me again. Once again I am thinking â€œwhat ifâ€™sâ€ and â€œif onlyâ€™sâ€ about my ex and the life I had. Itâ€™s getting frustrating. This current headache? For some reason I was thinking about a 25th wedding anniversary. Yeah, how stupid is that. Even if we stayed together that wouldnâ€™t happen until 2029, but for some reason that got me sad.
Damnit, the signs that sheâ€™s done with me and over it is as clear as water is wet, ice is cold, or Iâ€™m handsome..
Â 
I donâ€™t know what is happening with the lady I met online. We have chatted and she has not said anything that makes it seem as though sheâ€™s not interested, but the answers come far and few between. I realize people have lives and donâ€™t sit around waiting to instantly answer texts yet, I am chomping at the bit to hear from her and I am losing my s**t not to start writing the â€œdid I do something wrongâ€ and â€œwhatâ€™s wrongâ€ texts. I donâ€™t remember trying to date being this hard on me ever. I am totally an over-sharer. That is something I am trying not to do either with her, but I just want to talk to her.. I want her to like me. I want her to want to meet me just as much. Iâ€™d be pulling my hair out if I had anyâ€¦.
Am I wrong to think that if someone really likes another they would move Heaven and Earth to meet them?

Title: 2/11/2022 How do you write a sigh???
Content:
I guess I thought youâ€™d be here forever
Another illusion I chose to create
You donâ€™t know what you got until itâ€™s gone
And I found out a little too late
I was acting as if you were lucky to have me
Doinâ€™ you a favor, I hardly knew you were there
But then you were gone, and it all was wrong
Had no idea how much I cared
Now being without you takes a lot of getting used to
Should learn to live with it but I donâ€™t want to
Being without you is all a big mistake
Instead of getting easier, itâ€™s the hardest thing to take
Iâ€™m addicted to you babe, youâ€™re a hard habit to break
You found someone else you had every reason
You know I canâ€™t blame you for runninâ€™ to him
Two people together but livinâ€™ alone
I was spreading my love too thin
After all of these years Iâ€™m still tryinâ€™ to shake it
Doinâ€™ much better, they say that it just takes time
But deep in the night, itâ€™s an endless fight
I canâ€™t get you out of my mind
Now being without you takes a lot of getting used to
Should learn to live with it but I donâ€™t want to
Being without you is all a big mistake
Instead of getting any easier, itâ€™s the hardest thing to take
Iâ€™m addicted to you babe, youâ€™re a hard habit to breakÂ 
Now being without you takes a lot of getting used toÂ  Â 
Should learn to live with it but I donâ€™t want to
Being without you is all a big mistake
Instead of getting any easier, itâ€™s the hardest thing to take
Iâ€™m addicted to you



I finally got through that song today without tearing up. Not sure if itâ€™s a sign that Iâ€™m finally healing or not, but I have been able to listen to 1979 â€“ now Chicago again. I sang these songs in the car, at karaoke, and in the shower growing up blissfully thinking that they would mean nothing more than nice songs to sing.

Fact is, I havenâ€™t listened to any type of sad song or love song in a long time for the same reason. I always thought I would never relate to any of them. Boy, was I wrongâ€¦LOLÂ  I just listened to The Wall the other day and thought that Roger Walters and David Gilmour were prophets that knew of my pain why back in 1979 when they recorded it..

Our song, or I should say the song that I tried to show how I loved her, was The Luckiest by Ben Folds. I wonâ€™t copy and paste it here, but if you have never heard it, look it up, itâ€™s a beautiful song. Well so much for that. Words and sentiments didnâ€™t keep us together anyway.

Title: Just a thought I canâ€™t get out of my head
Content: I had everything I always wanted, but everything did not want meâ€¦.

I have my second youngest for the weekend. Came to work with me today. Itâ€™s hard with the younger ones not to get sentimental again of all I have lost and to a point they have lost too. All I ever want for them and me, was to grow up in a family like I had. I know that they all rolled with the punches that their Mom and I have thrown at them, Iâ€™m the only one still living in the past.
I am keeping the brave face on for them, but dying inside.

Title: Saturday night
Content:
Day 9
I havenâ€™t heard from anyone around me at all. No well wishes, no concerns, nothing. I guess itâ€™s safe to say that nothing is going to happen with the lady I thought I met. Atleast Iâ€™m used to that. Seams everyone leaves me before even getting to know me. Maybe I stink.
There used to be a time when my boys liked me cutting their hair. That seemed to go the way of the marriage. My 3rd born is sobbing in the other room because he says I ruined his hair. Maybe I really donâ€™t do anything right. It all just feels like Iâ€™m just not needed at all other than child support. I still suffer every day wondering why this all happened like it did.

Title: 2/13/22 Day 10
Content:
Just sat down for a coffee and to check my phone. Once again I got the â€œthanks, but no thanksâ€ message from yet another person.
I hear everyone when they say no to push the dating thing. I hear everyone when they say work on myself, love myself, and spoil myself, but I am not like that and have never been. I thrive on being part of something and with people. These last few years have made me spiral into a place I wouldnâ€™t wish on anyone. I know I shouldnâ€™t take the regections personally, but I do. I canâ€™t help it after everything and how my marriage ended and everyone seemed to forget me.
Yes, I get the whole if they arenâ€™t there for you, you donâ€™t need them stuff, I really do, but even a prize fighter can only with stand so many punches until he goes down.Â Itâ€™s starting to feel I just took the last upper cut today when I read her words. I really donâ€™t understand how my ex jumped directly into a new relationship or several of the women I have attempted to date that swore up and down that they werenâ€™t ready, only to find out they too jumped into something days after saying such things to me.
Itâ€™s the same things I have wrote at least once a week for the last several months here. Mom used to say, â€œlike a sick birdâ€™s assâ€, I write this same thing in just slightly different ways.
Â 
I have 3 more hours with my son today. I will do what I can to make him happy and to enjoy the visit, but once I drop him back home and hug and kiss the rest of my sonâ€™s, it will be a long ride home. I will once again attempt to clean around the apartment, but eventually I will just crawl under several blankets and sleep the day away, againâ€¦.

Day 11
Valentineâ€™s day has become the worst day for me. When I had just separated with Patty 3 years ago, I still had the ability to come and go at our home. Now this was about 3 weeks after I moved out and she moved the â€œnewâ€ guy in. So ofcourse the first thing I saw was the roses. Yuck.. What a lazy thing to do for Valentineâ€™s day, give flowers that will die in less than a week. Then I saw the cardâ€¦.
I knew Pattyâ€™s handwriting right off the bat. The sentiment was one I donâ€™t think I ever heard from her directed to me in our 20 years. Yes, she had told me she loved me now and then, but what she wrote him in this card broke me further then.
â€ Iâ€™m falling more and more in love with you every day. I never thought I could feel like this. I canâ€™t wait to spend the rest of my life with you.â€
It was only 3 weeks since I left to give her â€œspaceâ€ . What did I do that was so bad that she push away any love for me and just say that to another. I never have recovered from that, as I am sure most know.Â  So needless the day of â€œloveâ€ is the day I had my heart torn to pieces and scattered to the winds. Just one of the several â€œholidaysâ€ I now spend alone and hear from no one.
On top of that, the IRS has sent me a nice Valentineâ€™s gift. I did my taxes and had the double, triple checked and sent in January. I was due a refund that would finally help me to get ahead with at least one issue in my life, but no. Seems after they did their â€œmagicâ€ I now owe. I have no idea what type of voodoo math they used, but with all the stimulis stuff and well the Government changing stuff continuely, I have decided to fight it. I just really could have used the money, but as they say â€œIf it wasnâ€™t for bad luckâ€¦..â€

**** Strawberry, I just saw your note on yesterdayâ€™s post. I had started to write this beforehand and I just canâ€™t bring myself to erace it after all that typingâ€¦.LOL

Title: Stupid
Content:
So I set up a FaceBook page for my work today and to do so I had to set up a personal account. I made one for my sales manager who could careless about it. Just like the asshat I am though I did a search for the ex wifeâ€™s page. Stupid.
Did you ever look at an open fire and think to yourself, â€œI wonder what will happen if I stick my hand in there?â€ and then do it, knowing full well you will get burnt? Yeahâ€¦Me..
Besides the pictures of her and them (she looked wonderful in her wedding dress. We didnâ€™t have a formal one) it was the comments. The people I complain about not being there for me, my friends, have since a few weeks after our separation making comment about how good they look together and stuff. Yet I never got an answer what so ever from any of them. Well I guess you can say I did now.
I see she has the life she must have wanted all along, but never told me, as I saw the vacation pictures, the hiking pictures, and the like. She never wanted to do those things with me, I asked and begged to do those things.
Â 
I never thought I could feel worse, until today.

Title: Hurt
Content:
Some reason Iâ€™m stuck in a horrible rut today. I keep wanting something I just canâ€™t have. Wishing to go back to a life that is no longer mine.
Every where look, every show I watch, I see a life I always wanted and probably wonâ€™t have again. Why is it some people have what they donâ€™t want, while people like me canâ€™t have what we want? I was raised in the church, Lutheran, what I like to call â€œCatholic lightâ€. Almost interchangeable, but not the same. I have prayed and spoken to God over and over for years. I have faith, but Iâ€™ve never quite understood how the â€œplanâ€ people speak of works. Iâ€™ve heard countless people say thereâ€™s a plan that God has for me. Iâ€™m starting to think itâ€™s just what you say when you donâ€™t want to have the conversation. Try as I may I just canâ€™t seem to understand this plan. This plan has cost me two marriages, one child, losing everything, not being able to raise my children how I want them to be, rather having to make peace with the other man and hope he doesnâ€™t fail. This plan has left me alone, hurt, worthless. Itâ€™s cost me friends and family.
I look for the good things, I do see them. My children are healthy, the woman I live more than life is happy. Yet, for me personally, I donâ€™t see any good or happy and itâ€™s not like Iâ€™m not trying. I put in work. Iâ€™m kind to strangers. Iâ€™m helpful to anyone who needs help. I meditate, I breathe, I been trying to get healthy. Why was I left by everyone? Why wonâ€™t some one help me? Why am I not allowed to have answers?

I really donâ€™t know what to write right now. Iâ€™m feeling useless, worthless, and just a lump of skin taking up space. I do try to look and see things I am gratefull for and say something positive each day, but not today. I just donâ€™t have it in me.
So, I got a call last night, but I donâ€™t think it goes towards my counter of days I have gone without hear from someone. This aquaintance I have known for years was obviously extremely drunk. She managed to mumble about how nice I am and how things will get better. It was nice to hear, but it took her getting that drunk to even call and honestly I donâ€™t quite remember when I last talked to her sober.
The whole tax refund mess has turned me into an mess. I really do not know how I will get myself out of financial Hell any time soon. Itâ€™s nice that there is a place between poor and rich where nothing can come your way. Make to much for government help, do not make enough for a cosolidation loan.
This last â€œbrush offâ€ from the lady I met online has also hit me hard. I guess Iâ€™m good enough looking to be swiped right, but not good enough to actually meet.

Title: The long way around
Content:
This will sound like one of the hundred entries I have made here, but I miss my little family and the woman who was my best friend for years. Iâ€™m dense, but not stupid, I know things have changed, she has changed, and people have changed while Iâ€™ve been stuck in January 2019. Iâ€™ve been holding on to a frayed rope hoping it will hold me, but knowing it will break at anytime. Where will I fall to is unknown, but bad or good, I donâ€™t want to fall. There just out of reach is the comfortable, caring, and safe life I knew for years. Family and friends are staring down at me hanging, but not doing anything to rescue me. Iâ€™m hoarse from calling for help and my arms are tired, but I continue to fight to hold on.
Iâ€™m afraid to let go. Iâ€™m afraid of the lonliness down there in the dark. I donâ€™t want to die alone. I donâ€™t want to changeâ€¦
After my first divorce and all the fallout in the early 90â€™s I did all the work. I made the sacrifices and trials. I fought and clawed for the life I wanted and in a blink it was taken away from me and essentially given to another. Not just my wife and her love and friendship, but my childrenâ€™s every day lives and actions. My home and my possesions. Yes, in the â€œgrand schemeâ€ Iâ€™m not defined by those things.
Iâ€™m tired of grieving, but I cannot seem to stop. I tired of feeling abadoned, but I was. I live in the grasp of all my failures, learning from them, but never escaping them.

Title: 2/17/2022 Victim Blaiming or Mentality
Content:
I was diagnosed with Borderline Personality Disorder by my psychologist and therapist. I donâ€™t quite understand it, but all I have learned and heard about it does seemingly fit the person I feel I have been for years. Other than those two, everyone in my life thinks I am a whiney, poor-me bitch that always complains the world is giving me the shaft constantly.
Of course, when I let my loved ones and friends know of this â€œissueâ€ they all immediately made the decision that I was once again becoming an â€œattention whoreâ€. Thatâ€™s how itâ€™s been for 3 years now. Even though I was told and I felt I had this problem, it just became unmanageable after my â€œbreakâ€ when the marriage failed. I have written about this several times, but I have the thoughts and I need to write them. The woman who said she loved me, would never leave me, built a family with me, and was my rock, just shut me out over the course of a day. When I say to shut me out, I mean there were no tears in her blank eyes when she told me she wanted a divorce, she would move away in disgust as I would try to hold her, and she would not discuss why things were finished, other than the initial saying we were done. I turned to my sister for comfort and support and she immediately made my hurt into her problem. â€œYou better not keep the kids from me,â€ she screamed at me and then sped away. Countless texts and calls went unanswered as I quickly descended into my personal Hell. I turned to my friends and heard them call her a bitch and slut and told me to deal with it. Days later I was told they didnâ€™t want to hear me bitch and moan about it and then they stopped answering too.
And for the last 3 years, thatâ€™s how things have been. Oh, I threw myself at their mercy, apologizing that â€œmyâ€ drama had caused them inconvenience, and asking, begging to be included again. The invites never came and neither did holiday well wishes. Nothing.
I have been suicidal. I have wound up in the ER with panic attacks. I have been homeless and broke. Yet at no time did these people ever acknowledge my pain or loss. No hugs or shoulders to cry on. No distractions or pep talks. No Merry Christmas, Happy Thanksgiving, Happy New Year, or Happy Birthday messages. Itâ€™s just been me alone except for the occasional visits with my sons, who I canâ€™t talk to about my hurt and loss.
Would someone who found out they have cancer be treated like this? Someone whose home burnt to the ground, would they be told to stop crying about it? Every conversation I have tried to have with those close to me get turned into â€œget over itâ€ or â€œman upâ€. As I just wrote when I tried to explain my mental issue, they have just laughed it off. Yet my sister alone has supported and comforted several of her in-laws who have gone through depression, sickness, loss, and divorce, but me, nothing.
I have always tried to be open about my feelings to others. I sat with my ex as she lost her grandmother and through all the dramas with her mother and sister. I spent weeks helping and supporting my sister when her 1st husband die of cancer. I stepped up to care for my mother when no one else would when she descended into dementia. I made it a priority to be there and cheer up my 2 best friends through their divorces and heartbreaks, even allowing one of them to stay with us rent-free for weeks until he got back on his feet. I have lent money when I couldnâ€™t afford to.
So is this victim-blaming on their part or do I truly have a victim mentality? Maybe the writing was always on the wall and I was too blind to see it about how people around me acted. Maybe my ex dropped subtle clues I just ignored. Maybe when I sat with my broken, tubed up, and in a coma and daughter and then again at her death bed without so much of a hug from people I should have known or how my sister made it all about her pain that her niece died. Yes her niece, not my daughter, because you see according to all of them I have lived a charmed life and have never felt the horrors of the world as they have. Somehow they have always had support from others when I havenâ€™t had so much as an apology.
Â

Title: Or maybe it is me
Content:
My day started bad, but at least it was a nice warm morning, but my mood along with the weather has become cold and grey. Itâ€™s one of the days I have at least 3 to 4 times a month where I just canâ€™t shake the hopelessness of my situation.
Iâ€™m sorry, but I just donâ€™t see this as an opportunity as everyone tells me to. Maybe if I had lived a life of selfishness and been self-serving I would feel better about all this, but I lived for my family, my wife, and children. All the decisions were for them. From 18 years old until I was 48, it was keeping others happy, safe, and secure. When she gave up on me, on us, it took away everything from me. YES, I still have the boys and I do whatever I can for them and with them, but it will never be the same. I lost everything and in 3 years I havenâ€™t even got close to being able to save any rainy day money. I still live in the debt part of a marriage and will be for a few more years as I pay off things I donâ€™t even have. All the while she has remarried with a clean slate and all the things we worked for over 20 years. All of this hasnâ€™t affected my kids at all. I think they see me sad, but they never have acknowledged it. They do their best when they come to slum it with me for a day or two.
Maybe I asked for this life. Maybe my actions or faults took me to this lonely existence. I honestly do not remember treating other people badly, but maybe I did and I was too narcissistic to realize it. Maybe I should have been more greedy of peopleâ€™s affections than giving. Or, maybe I am just one of those people who are outside of everything that is never acknowledged and meaningless to others. Like a penny, Iâ€™m sometimes needed, but no one cares if they drop me.

So how do I feel today? My life and health can sum it up, shittyâ€¦ Really shittyâ€¦
I woke up in pain. The kind of pain where you just donâ€™t want to get out of bed, but it hurts too much to stay. The first step after I forced myself out of bed was incredibly unsteady. My knees didnâ€™t want to support my body and I fell. My neck is a ball of tense pain and I canâ€™t lift it to see straight without the piercing pain that travels down into my shoulders. When I do get back up, my back is so stiff I have to waddle hunched over, gingerly placing each step while steadying myself on the wall. Iâ€™m almost 51, but I feel well into my 90â€™s.
Needless to say, my emotions feel as bad as my body.Â  The body pain is like being hit by a semi and the mental anguish is like stepping in the road constantly on purpose.
Itâ€™s not like I enjoy this or that I even want this, it just seems to be what it is. Everything feels like itâ€™s caving in on me. I canâ€™t get ahead financially and the bills are piling up. I canâ€™t get a consolidation loan because my credit was wrecked with the divorce. The IRS claims that my $2500 refund is now a $300 debt and even though they say an explanation was sent on the 14th itâ€™s yet to arrive. I triple check everything, claimed everything and somehow their voodoo math screwed me. It wasnâ€™t a lot of money, but it was the lifeline I needed, and that like everything else â€œblew upâ€ in my face.
I still stress about people who have blatantly walked from my life without explanation and have never looked back. I still feel horrendous hurt and loss for these selfish, uncaring, lying ass-hats. They wouldnâ€™t spit on me if I was on fire and yet I need their approval, apologies, and answers to feel whole for some reason.
I make it to what can be considered a kitchen in my way over-priced shit apartment and struggle to make coffee. I absentmindedly check my cell knowing nothing will be there. No calls or messages, no answers. I make the usual bland easy breakfast not wanting to stand anymore. I make it to my chair spilling a quarter of the coffee, as usual, on the floor. I eat and drink while the typical bull shit plays on the television news. It all fills me with more depressing thoughts that pile up on my already-mile-high mountain of emotional shit. Iâ€™ve gone past the point of caring to want to make the change. Although I am not suicidal, I donâ€™t want to live anymore. I selfishly want someone to come and help me, not for the rest of my life or even like hospice care, just a little bit of time. Someone to cry with, someone who can just do for me a couple of days so I can be a lifeless lump, and someone who will finally acknowledge the hurt, pain, and damage the last 3 years have caused me.
A lot to ask for, I know. I am just in the grips of depression and tired of fighting my BPD feelings. I canâ€™t afford my therapist right now, but honestly, I never felt as though it was helping me anyway. Why canâ€™t I be that random person someÂ philanthropist happens to help? Why canâ€™t I have that story of when I helped the person with their groceries or cross a street, they are so appreciative they send me a gift or the waiter that gets a $1000 tip on a $50 check?
Money wonâ€™t buy happiness, but being out of debt would sure go a long way with helping me be focused on the other issues that plaque me.

Title: Early Saturday 2/19/2022
Content:
When somebody loved me
Everything was beautiful
Every hour spent together
Lives within my heart
And when she was sad
I was there to dry her tears
And when was happy so was I
When she loved me

Through the summer and the fall
We had each other, that was all
Just she and I together
Like it was meant to be
And when she was lonely
I was there to comfort her
And I knew that she loved me

So the years went by
I stayed the same
But she began to drift away
I was left alone
Still I waited for the day
When sheâ€™d say, â€œI will always love youâ€
Lonely and forgotten

Never thought sheâ€™d look my way
And she smiled at me and held me
Just like she used to do
Like she loved me
When she loved me

When somebody loved me
Everything was beautiful
Every hour spent together
Lives within my heart
When she loved me

I kind of hate that I havenâ€™t been able to listen to music or watch a movie or show without something ripping me apart.

Title: Same day, once a week
Content:
Sunday morning. 6am. Another day off that I should enjoy, but wonâ€™t. Been up since 4:30, but laid in bed as the thoughts started to boil in my head. I got up and told my kid he could lay down in my bed so it would free up the couch and wouldnâ€™t disturb him.
Oh, to be 15 again. I was fucking untouchable then. I hadnâ€™t let people screw me over and everything went as smoothly as possible. Now, I sit here trying to see what I write through tears and fogged up glasses.
3 years and I still sob everyday. Every single day since. Who does that? 3 YEARSâ€¦ I physically live in the now, but mentally canâ€™t stop living in January 2019.
I have only myself to blame for 35 years of failure, hurt, and heartbreak. I wasnâ€™t a good son or brother. I havenâ€™t been a good man or husband. Iâ€™m shit as a Father. Iâ€™ve chosen the easy way all these years and blamed God and everyone for all the bad thatâ€™s come into my life. Iâ€™ve squandered every and any chance at happiness and fulfillment. Iâ€™ve pushed people so far away that when the leave me, they never ever look back.
I sit here in a freezing truck at Tim Hortons, drinking a coffee and smoking a cigarette Wishing that Patty would call and say please come home. That will never happen nor will she even talk to me and listen as she had in the past. Iâ€™m trying to hold on to the only things in my life that matter, which is 4 boys. I know they love me as I do them, but it kills me how readily they accepted everything.Â  In a matter of a day I left and he moved in and no one took offense to it.
I feel like Iâ€™m just a novelty to them. A weekend get away from the other 3 or 2 annoying brothers. The oldest 2 have cell phones, but never call or message me for nothing. Just like all the others my phone sits silently on the table beside me. If it wasnâ€™t for Bill collectors and spam calls it would never ring.
Maybe I am narcissistic. Iâ€™m to blame for my and otherâ€™s unhappiness, but Iâ€™m too blind to see it. I pushed Patty into the arms of another. A man that doesnâ€™t live thinking of past regrets and hurts. I just canâ€™t understand how she could dump me after years together and act as if we never were. I never abused her physically or mentally. I stressed everyday about her happiness and my possible failure to make her happy, but never put forth the efforts needed. Maybe she did show signs or tried to tell me, but I was too stupid to see.
I know people would be sad if I left this world, but I also believe that they wouldnâ€™t grieve for me as I have them. There wouldnâ€™t be a funeral or remembrance. There wouldnâ€™t be an obituary in the paper. There would still be people who have no idea for years. Who would even make the decision about what to do with my body? My kids are to young. Patty apparently hates me. My Sister would see it as how I once again burdened her life. My brothers would shrug their shoulders and do nothing. This is my legacy. To be forgotten and not talked about. A man who wanted nothing more than to have a family. A loving wife and children. Now Iâ€™m the sperm donor that a woman had the misfortune of being with. The Father of 4 boys who were raised by another man. The brother who was a burden. The needy friend. The bad neighbor.Â  The weirdo that sat in his truck for an hour at the Tim Hortons.Â  The oddball who would tell inappropriate jokes and uncomfortably flirt. The fat, bald, and ugly guy. The piss poor employee and coworker. The forgotten guy the graduated with us.
Thatâ€™s who I am. If Iâ€™m lucky I might just be an after thought to someone.

Title: Another Sunday Night
Content:
Iâ€™m sitting here like I do every Sunday evening just hating myself. Hating who I was, who I am, and who I have to be. Iâ€™m writing this because I have absolutely no one to talk to. I havenâ€™t been able to afford to see my therapist. Thatâ€™s funny, itâ€™s what anyone who actually does talk to me tells me to do, see a therapist. Then the conversation is over.
So, yeah I miss talking to people who mostly blow me off and frankly donâ€™t care anymore. Sometimes I get so desperate I call the suicide hot line, just to hear a voice.
Iâ€™m not stupid, I do realize there are hundreds of men in this predicament. I read the same stories as mine on several different sites, hoping somehow there would be some trick, hack, or answer to my misery. Honestly I have seen the answers and things I need to do and I just donâ€™t have it in me to do them.
Itâ€™s Hell when you are your own worst enemy. I donâ€™t understand why Iâ€™m still grieving my lost marriage and family, when no one else has even shed a tear. I need help, but not therapy, not the several anti depression and anxiety pills. I need that sit around a backyard fire pit help. The â€ I just thought I would stop byâ€ help. The call to see how I am help. The included type of help. I even settle for the call from my kids help. None of this has happened for the 3 years since things ended. Yes I get the boys and I talk to them, if I call.
This is the same shit I write constantly here, I guess I can understand while people avoid me.

Title: 2/21/2022 Angry Monday Morning
Content:
Iâ€™m angry with myself. Iâ€™m angry at life. Iâ€™m angry at people.
Iâ€™m angry with me
I hate that I canâ€™t move past and move on from this. Iâ€™m tired of crying at least once every day for a life I lost and will never get back. I wrack my brain every day to understand why this all happened. Every day is just one long sigh. Plans made the day before taking a back seat to the worthless feelings that overwhelm me. I hate I canâ€™t get the effects of my BPD under control as I should after spending close to thousands of dollars to learn how.
Iâ€™m angry at life
WTF!!! Why do the shittiest things keep happening to me? What has living a moral, ethical, and caring life brought me? Nothing. All my relationships have ended with no choices of looking back or reconciliation. When people are done with me there are no looking back, no smoothing things over, or no friendships. Patty locked me out of her life so completely, it was like we never met even though she lives in my family home and has 4 children with me. If this was all about finances, why the total hate? She rushed things so fast with this guy, there wasnâ€™t even a chance for me to work things out. Every loss I have had is so final whether it was a death, a breakup, a fight, and even a mistake. How is it that some of the most terrible people in the world have seemingly great lives? How is it that he lived such a fucked up life, but now has my ex, my family, and most of my possessions?
Iâ€™m angry at people
Speaking of â€œhimâ€, what kind of scumbag preys on anotherâ€™s sadness? Knowing that she was married and sure, she was unhappy with things at home, but you decided to stoke the fire. Offer the things she says are the issues and convince her not to talk to her husband about them. What kind of scumbag comes over the same day 4 young boys have watched their Father have to drive away cry for their Mother. Yes, I canâ€™t blame him for all of it, she had a huge hand in it too, come onâ€¦ I am so sick of the world these days. Iâ€™m sick that I was born in a generation that started this whole selfish, itâ€™s all about yourself, view of life. People take the easy way out and then shut themselves off instead of just talking it out. Patty literally pissed on 20 years of a very non-problematic relationship without even trying to explain her hurt to me. She let this man, who for all intents and purposes she knew for maybe 2 months into her life force me out. She has never talked to me or even the boys as to why. She has never been out of his sight for an hour to even think of what she has done to me. Or maybe she knows. Maybe she enjoys the fact that she destroyed a man because she can.
My Sister and friends essentially spit in my face when I needed them. Made me worst when I tried to explain how I feel and what the pain was doing to me. These people I have held when they lost things in their lives. I never uttered the words to any one of them â€œget over itâ€, â€œman upâ€, â€œwe donâ€™t want you around if youâ€™re going to be like thatâ€ or the gem my Sister hit me with the day Patty said she wanted a divorce, â€œYou better not keep the fucking boyâ€™s from meâ€. There were no hugs, or â€œit will get betterâ€. They just kept the hurt growing. I so wanted my Sister to help me process things I kept calling, begging, and texting her just so I could feel like my world didnâ€™t blow up, but all I got was a threatening text from my Brother in Law warning me to stop bothering her or he would personally end me. Yeah, thatâ€™s what he said, end me.

Iâ€™m sorry. Every day itâ€™s all the same shit, just creatively written in a different fashion here. Iâ€™ve thrown my â€œproblemsâ€ into a world of children dying from disease and hunger. Wars and needless deaths. Real depression and mental issues. Horrible abuses and abusers. People who have never had a relationship or children. Orphans and widowers. I am the selfish generation I hate so much and Iâ€™m paying for my sins. I feel like I will be paying for them until my last breath.

Title: The house plant
Content:
They say be careful what you ask or wish for. This too, along with anger is on my mind. Somehow the subject of her new husband came up last night with my son Morgen. I wasnâ€™t asking, he made a comment about something we were watching about him, which unfortunately I took as an invitation to ask the really stupid questions I never should have. Apparently, my boys all do things with him. You know, all the things I did or wanted to do as they age. On one of these â€œtripsâ€ with Morgen, he told him of how he â€œmetâ€ my ex. He supposedly fell instantly in love with her, as I am sure any man 20 years older than a woman would. He went on to say that once he learned she was married, he backed off, yeah right. When he found out she was unhappy though all bets were off. He actually told my son that he promised my ex that she would never want for anything unlike â€œyour Fatherâ€ has done to her for years. Oh, he assured my son that he thinks I am a good man, but that his mother needs more than I could give her.
Â 
And so, just one more person that has come into my life and has taken something or someone from me without thought or regrets. Thatâ€™s been my story all my life, losing. In school, people would take credit for things I did or steal the girl I liked. I never had a â€œbro codeâ€ with my best friends and that was plain to see when Tony immediately hooked up with a girl I just broke things off with. I honestly was happy he got a girlfriend, but it turned into â€œI canâ€™t hang out with you because sheâ€™s your exâ€ bull shit for the rest of high school and now like then the other 2 guys I considered friends all hitched their wagons to Tony and left me standing there alone. I guess I shouldnâ€™t have put so much hope in them nowadays and how they have turned away from me.
I am pathetic. What a worthless waste of skin I have been for all my life. I have all the answers I have ever asked for right in front of me. Itâ€™s always been me. Iâ€™m reached for the moon when I had no business in the stars. No one pities me as much as I pity myself and no one cares that I have and constantly still get walked on and over by everyone. Two marriages, two wives have seen me as a no-good, worthless piece of shit and they ran at the first chance and never looked back, never even acknowledging I was in their lives. My friends and siblings, not one once of compassion, just frustration that I was bothering them. My own children, never questioning why mom made dad leave or who was the new guy who showed the exact same day and has never left. Itâ€™s as if the last 32 years of my life never happened. Like a twilight zone episode, I run to each and everyone who has been in my life the whole time, and not one of them remembers or knows who I am.
The only thing keeping me on this side of the dirt is myÂ conscience. If I was to just leave and disappear I would constantly quilt myself for othersâ€™ troubles or sadness. The same people who wonâ€™t piss on me if I was on fire. I have to assure myself constantly that I am important to my children because if I donâ€™t I donâ€™t think I would ever hear from them. Also, I could never just leave, I have nothing and no one. No savings or retirement.Â Â I realize I have a problem. I know I need mental help, but what can you do when you canâ€™t afford all that? Where is my guarding angel to enter my life and show me I matter?Â  Where are my 3 ghosts who visit me and show me I matter?Â  Where is my Clarence on the cold, snow bridge I want to jump from? Like it or not, Patty has him, he swooped in with his money and saved her from the horrible man I was. My sister has her husband who threatened me away from her, my own sister. My friends, they have each other, and frankly, I wasnâ€™t part of their lives since 1987 no matter what I have done for the both of them. I have never been able to count on either one of my brothers, ever. The only people who I knew would be there are now dead and gone.Â 
No matter how much I scrub and wash or change I wear this shit on me like a cloud of dust on Pigpen from Peanuts. I guess the only way I can make how I feel understandable is like this: A flower needs care, water, and sunshine to live and thrive. If it doesnâ€™t it wilts and dies, but if someone notices it just before the end, they can nurse it back into health. I really believe Iâ€™m at that point. The point is I just canâ€™t do it for myself and I need help, actual help, not questions by therapists to make me work out what I already know. Iâ€™m an indoor plant sitting on a ledge where Iâ€™ve been left all alone with nothing. All the people who I thought would be there, have left me to wilt, and frankly, no one wants a half-dead house plant.
Â

Title: One last thing 2/21/22
Content:
I subscribed to Paramount plus. This is not an advertisement, but rather a better understanding of how things in life affect me or trigger me.
Iâ€™ve been watching the series Bull and this episode he and his ex wife/ girlfriend have their baby. It has torn me to pieces watching it. Four times, well actually 5, but 4 times me and Patty were right there like that. Me holding her hand an comforting her as she was in labor. Holding both her and each one of our boys. The last one, Caden, was born and there was a scare. Not him, but her. They couldnâ€™t control the bleeding.Â  They took Caden to the nursery and told me I had to leave. The worry and hurt I felt for that 1/2 hour was unexplainable. She was my whole world and I prayed and prayed that she wouldnâ€™t be taken from me.
Every one of our childrenâ€™s births were incredibly special to me and I thought they were to her also. How could you turn away from a person you go through all that with. Four times. How do people not think of that and not realize the love that was there and not want to do everything to save that for each other and the kids?
I guess my problem is I am 50 years old and I am still totally naive about love and how the world works. As I have said over and over, we didnâ€™t have an abusive relationship. We didnâ€™t have petty fights and never went to bed angry. I did everything in my power to make her happy and comfortable. I didnâ€™t realize I had Borderline Personality Disorder then, but I knew something wasnâ€™t right with me. Yet I kept it from affecting her or at least I believe I did. I had my blue moments, my worthless feelings, my issues. I talked to her about things and why I was sad, mad, or just weird at different moments. She never said that I was bothering her with it. She saw what I went through when my daughter died and when my parents died. She was the calm in the storm of my mind and all I asked of her was to be there. I could have the most heart wrenching day filled with pain, sadness, anger, and loss and it would all melt away when I wrapped my arm around her in bed. The only thing that ever quieted my thoughts was that, holding her.
I have yet found a way to stop the thoughts and the bad since. I have taken most types of medications for my anxiety and depression and although initially they work, it never has gone away. I want it to go away. I want it all to go away.Â  Iâ€™m serious, I want to try Keritan or TMS. Right now I would even do shock therapy or a lobotomy to make the hurt stop. I would rather be a zombie and not think about her, then to continue like this.

They say it takes a year for every 5-7 years you were in a relationship to get over it. Iâ€™m in my 3rd and I am hard-pressed to see the light at the end of the tunnel. Grieving would be so much easier if someone grieved with me. Unlike death grief where multiple people feel the loss, relationship grief is a deep hole in darkness lonely grief. People have chosen to either ignore me or scold me about all of this. Maybe my anti-self is my worst enemy. He pulls and tugs me down with a hard grip on me where I just canâ€™t move. Meanwhile, I see the shows, movies, and real-life stories of othersâ€™ recovery. That one friend, that one sibling, or the stranger who comforts and helps the other through their pain. Helping to build them up and change their views of life, or discovering that they are the right person in the otherâ€™s life and all ends beautifully as the man or woman sits with their friend, family, or new love as the sun rises on a new day. Thatâ€™s not happening for me.
Oh, I have been given some sage advice from a lot of people, friends, and faceless strangers, but no actual contact. Nothing close to a sit-down over coffee or dinner. No family celebrations or get-togethers. Rather, I burden others or creep them out as I ask for some company.
I write these entries at least 2 times each week since I started OD. You would think they have helped me and the comments would inspire me, but they donâ€™t. I guess Iâ€™m wired differently than most people. The stark dropped me several times before my delivery.Â  Maybe after years of believing words from Pattyâ€™s mouth only to be destroyed by her, words just donâ€™t do it for me, whether they come from people or professionals. 2 years of therapy and I feel as though I never changed all that much. Robin is a wonderful therapist, but I could see a hundred more and still come out feeling this way. I know this. I think I understand what would help me and I have made several attempts that all failed miserably to where they just made things even worst.
Would it be unfair of me or just not right to want someone to come into my life and â€œnurseâ€ me back to normal? I have for others. Iâ€™ve seen people do it for others.Â  Hell, my exâ€™s new husband saw her when she was â€œunhappyâ€ and made every effort to help her to destroy me and my life, without her having any sort of remorse.
Guess I am extremely jealous that most people have had that one somebody who was in love with them. The kind of love I wasted on Patty for years, that was never returned. I have never been pursued. I have never been convinced that even though I will end someone, I will be ok. Not one person in my 50 years ever stressed or thought of my feelings or even came back to me when they were over. They were done, like a banana peel I was tossed away never to be thought of again. There is no one out in the world who is sick with worry or stressed over me. I will admit, there have been a couple of times I have ended a call or text with the words, â€œI just donâ€™t want to live and Iâ€™m going to end it allâ€. No wellness checks by police showed at my door. Neither did the people I said this to or another they may have asked to check in on me. I wouldnâ€™t hear from them until I once again called or messaged them and even then I wouldnâ€™t hear back. The handful of people who saw what this has done to my health and sanity have also never, out of the blue, checked in with me.
