Oh I tried, but a day later they wrote me off and never wanted to talk to me about anything. What family I have didnâ€™t helped to have some sort of normalcy either. My body is fighting me too. Cancer scare, horrible painful knees, no sleep. My mind wonâ€™t calm no matter what I do.
I just want friend who I can sit with and feel comfortable with. Someone thatâ€™s not judgemental thatâ€™s willing to spend time even as Iâ€™m healing.

Title: Another me
Content:
I donâ€™t like myself. In fact, I truly hate myself. Maybe I am finally seeing what so many others seem to see in me and thatâ€™s the reason why they have all â€œjumpedâ€ ship from my life. I want to change, but I just do not have it in me too. I canâ€™t imagine another me. I canâ€™t afford to go out or be part of something, I canâ€™t. I make just enough to stay in my apartment and get to work and thatâ€™s it. I work stupid hours for the same salary week to week. Any and all requests for a raise or help fall on deaf ears both work and personal. Ha Ha, what a joke, personalâ€¦
Thatâ€™s it, thatâ€™s all I have right nowâ€¦

Title: May 8th
Content:
I donâ€™t know how to write my feelings right now. My dreams betrayed me again and now Iâ€™m sitting here once again lost and feeling like a loser.
All I want is someone to talk to, preferably in person. Someone like my friends here, who will listen and not judge. I just donâ€™t have that here. I canâ€™t put it on my kids.
I canâ€™t keep doing this.
This morning is one of those I canâ€™t get out of my own head days. Why? Why after all this time, does it break me. Trying to write this as I am bawling again like it all just happened yesterday. The kids and her have all moved on from me in weeks after. Sheâ€™s remarried so quickly I feel hated like all that time never mattered. So now I feel I wasted all those years and now I sit here wasting space.
I want to talk to her. I just want to hear her say that she just appreciated all the years, butâ€¦ Just something instead of this treatment as if I never existed. Actually I wish anyone would say something,Â  but everyone doesnâ€™t even text me a â€ how are you?â€
Iâ€™m not a man, not in any fashion. Iâ€™m just a lost 51yr old man-child no one wants to be around.

Title: Me
Content:
I donâ€™t understand why I need to matter to someone or anyone. At the end of the day, youâ€™re only with yourself.
Itâ€™s physically and mentally killing me not being attached to something or someone. Why did she toss me away as she did? Why did my kids accept it so fast? Why didnâ€™t anyone stand up for me with what she did? Why did everyone treat it like our marriage and relationship never was?
For the 20 years I spent with Patty, she never was one to â€œshare her businessâ€ with anyone, so what did she say about me and our marriage that made everyone turn on me? Apparently, she has said it so much over the last few years, that even she believes it. She became so nasty for no apparent reason. OK, you fell out of love, but why say the horrible stuff about how things were when they werenâ€™t bad. I mean we had what I thought was a loving relationship right up to the day it ended. She blew the smoke up my ass with promises. â€œI wonâ€™t bring him around the kids.â€ He was there the same day within hours. â€œWe will have joint custody.â€ Nope, but I couldnâ€™t afford to lawyer up. â€œYou can use money from the account to get established.â€ That was gone the next day. Why? I was walked into the field and Olâ€™ Yellered.
Now 3+ years later, no friends, no savings, several bills from the marriage, no settlement, and I still bawl like a tard every day, wishing I mattered to someone or something.Â  I havenâ€™t seen my therapist for months because I can afford to and even she hasnâ€™t checked in with me.
So, of course, I feel like a disgusting monster, A troll that no one wants to acknowledge. Just a nobody who you can lie to and not feel the least bit of regret for. This feeling has taken a hold of me and I canâ€™t get it off of me. Like a clamp thatâ€™s too rusty to turn. Why is it so easy to be blamed, lied to, and forgotten by all the people I made my life?
Iâ€™m doing the â€œworkâ€. Exercising, reading, and meditating, havenâ€™t helped. Iâ€™m too angry at God to be a practicing Christian right now. Everyone wants to give God the credit for the good stuff. So why were her betrayal and cheating going so well? Why is it a good thing for her and a multi-year â€œtestâ€ for me? She is essentially a Buddhist and her husband was a shit man for most of his life save for a couple of months of bible study?Â  SO he gets rewarded for â€œcoming to Jesusâ€ and I, a lifelong Christian man, lose everything and for the next 3+ years have to scrape by for anything? How is it that the same Wesleyan pastor can tell me about the horrible sin they committed and yet marry them? Why do I keep losing when I am playing the game right? Two marriages, the ability to raise my kids other than a weekend dad, and my daughter all of 23 and a new mother? I mean F$#%!!! How much has to be heaped onto me? I passed the point of â€œGod never gives you more than you can handleâ€ about 2 years ago. Do I think that God has it out for me? No, I know it doesnâ€™t work like that, but how much does a good man have to go through to â€œpossiblyâ€ enjoy an afterlife that may or may not be true? There are rapists, murderers, and lying cheating people out there enjoying a better-fulfilled life than me. What little â€œgoodâ€ has come to my life since heâ€™s left it just as fast. It has literally been 3 years, 4 months, and 18 days since this all went down and I am no better off than I was then.

I feel compelled to write, but I donâ€™t have anything that I havenâ€™t said 100 times before. Iâ€™m sitting here at work listening to the one woman we work with, who just started dating a guy. Heâ€™s already moved in with her and sheâ€™s talking to another woman listing his faults, but also saying how sheâ€™s sad and wants to help him overcome all of them. WTF!!!
All I ever hear is how I have to fix myself before anyone would even approach me. How I am stuck and they donâ€™t want to make the effort because I would weigh them down. Truth is, Iâ€™m not worth anyoneâ€™s effort. Iâ€™m not â€œhotâ€ enough or rich enough or set enough. I have young children and they donâ€™t want to be a mother, even though I donâ€™t want them to be. Iâ€™m too old or too far. Iâ€™m starting over and not established.
I wasnâ€™t good enough for Patty to stay with me even though she was there for the struggles, illnesses, deaths, and challenges. She witnessed firsthand how I tried and tried to make her safe, happy, and content, that it wasnâ€™t my problem, it was our problems. She never said we shouldnâ€™t this or that. Then when things got tough, after 20 years, she gave up on me when a guy with some money professed his love for her by saying he could solve all her problems. Not one thing from our marriage has she taken care of. I got all the debt and she got the shiny new life. Now, $20,000 in debt, with absolutely nothing to show for it, Iâ€™m not good enough for anyone. Iâ€™m â€œtoo bitterâ€ for my friends. Iâ€™m â€œtoo absent of a fatherâ€ for my sisterâ€™s respect. Iâ€™m not complacent enough for the ones I work with and for. Iâ€™m not financially set enough for anyone to date. Iâ€™m not worth enough for even a check-in from anyone.
I canâ€™t â€œliveâ€ because I canâ€™t afford to. Sure there are free things like church and groups, but I canâ€™t afford to get to them or even have the time to. Get a hobby? Even the most mundane of what I would want to do is out of my price range. Go for walks. When you walk a hundred feet and your knees buckle under you because they are nothing but bone on bone and full of spurs. Get surgery on them. When you have no savings and shitty insurance that requires a high deductible before they even attempt to pay and their â€œdoctorsâ€ that donâ€™t think you need something that you need and they refuse to pay for it. Enjoy the single life. When all the shit I just mentioned is happening.
Iâ€™m sorry, but I can no longer give hope to the sayings and biblical passages that say this or that about what I am going through. Itâ€™s the â€œhoneymoonâ€ phase, she will realize what she did, NOPE. Things will get better. NOPE. Youâ€™re a handsome great man, anyone would love to be with you. NOPE In times like this, turn to God, friends, and family for support, they love you and will be there. NOPE. Your therapist and psychologist care and will support your healing. NOPEâ€¦ Especially when you canâ€™t afford the $ 65 â€“ $120 bills. Maybe I should go down to the city and get a crack hooker who would at least act caring for the same amount and maybe get a stress relief out of it, for all the good the â€œprofessionalsâ€ have done.

Title: Hate
Content:
Iâ€™m embracing the hate from now on. I hate people. I hate those who have turned their backs on me for their own selfish reasons. I hate those who used me and pushed me in front of a bus to improve their own lives. I hate my â€œfriendsâ€ that have abandoned me when I needed them the most. I hate my brothers and sister for not being, loving siblings like I have had them my entire life. I am the baby of the family and I have always looked up to them and attempted to do everything I could for them. I hate my co-workers who put the blame for their fuck-ups on me and play games with me like yesterday. I hate my neighbors for being the absolute fucks of humanity. The one to the right of me who proclaims how she is a â€œprofessionalâ€ dog trainer but has no control over her dog and the one she watches as they slam against the door or window of her apartment, viciously growling and barking at anyone who walks by. I hate the other ones who glare and whisper about me as I walk by. I hate people in general, rude asshats at the store, on the roads, and in general.
Most of all, I hate myself. My looks. My health. My life. I hate I have never selfishly taken advantage of anyone to get what I want. I hate that I cared too much to leave anyone broken, because of money. I hate myself because I am not good enough for anyone to stand up for me when others lie and damage my reputation when they know that itâ€™s just not true. I hate myself because everything I have done over the course of the 51 years I have lived to improve myself, has crumbled at my feet.
This whole thing, open diary, has done nothing to help me. I have said the something thing, over and over since I joined, in different ways to no avail.Â  All of you who have made comments, thank you from the bottom of whatâ€™s left of my heart.

Still feeling the same as yesterday. My son had his first chorus concert last night and I couldnâ€™t get to it. Why? Because the same shrill b$%^h who wrote me the guilt note that spared no words to say what a shit human being and shit man and father I am. Her new husband is more of a man and a father than I ever wasâ€¦
I didnâ€™t ask for this life. I didnâ€™t walk away, I was forced. By her and everyone else. Iâ€™ve cried out for help and support for these years because I just couldnâ€™t do it all on my own. For some reason, I have this fucking stupid idea in my head that she cares for me, but is putting up this wall. Truth is, this is all her.
She was evil enough to quietly set it up behind my back and spring it on me without any compassion. She shrewdly lied and broke promises to me. Two weeks into it she left the card she got for him out that stated her love for him, more love than she has ever felt, wanting to spend the rest of her life with him. She was engaged a month after the separation and remarried days after the divorce was final. She turned all my acquaintances against me. She took everything and now talks to me like I was some nasty fuck that held her hostage for 20 years. Hate that I have no clue where it came from. But, I sit here thinking that she just let it get out of control. I keep waiting for the â€œhoneymoonâ€ phase to end and for her to at least realize what she did to a good man who sacrificed everything for her happiness.
That wonâ€™t happen
Thing is, I have a problem, an illness, that holds me back from healing and moving forward. No one gives a fuck. Iâ€™m no longer useful to any of them. I am already not comfortable with the new therapist I will be seeing. It will be two weeks until I do. Sheâ€™s made more mention about the costs and getting paid, than why I was seeking help. She refuses to hear anything from me until that time and expressed that I fill out paperwork ASAP.Â  Maybe I am expecting too much. Maybe this is how the real world is. I just spent 20 years in a bubble where everything was bright and happy until it stopped abruptly for reasons I will never know. I was written off by everyone one I held dear and left in the desert alone with nothing. I canâ€™t do it anymore.
September last year I thought I had turned a corner. I gave up smoking, lost 45 pounds, and was even exercising on a regular basis. I developed a confidence I never had. Then, in a matter of 3 weeks, I was told that I wasnâ€™t religious enough by a self-proclaimed recovering drug addict and alcoholic who â€œfound Godâ€. I was told that I was too old by a woman 5 years younger. I was told that I wasnâ€™t â€œfinancially setâ€ and that I had too young of children to date. I spent yet another holiday alone with no salutations or visits. I was called creepy for asking a girl I knew for years for coffee.Â  I was straight off lied to by a woman, a friend, whom I had talked to from 2 months after the separation, almost daily, who professed that she would be there for me if she ever came back â€œhomeâ€. She did in December, a week before Christmas. I have never heard from her since. She hasnâ€™t returned calls or texts, nothing. People wonder why I gave up. Why I donâ€™t embrace this â€œnew lifeâ€? Why do I feel too old and lost? Why I donâ€™t do this or that?
Yeah, Iâ€™m important all right, important enough for people to have a reason to pat themselves on the back because their â€œwordsâ€ and inspirational quotes, that one time, releases them of any quilt of me and says to the world that the 1 time they did so is more than enough.
Iâ€™m held here by the love of my children. I know full well, that I can no longer raise them how I wanted to, dreamt of, and hoped to. My relationship with them is completely changed because of her. Yet, even if had the money, I just wouldnâ€™t be able to walk away from them or anyone else, as they have all done to me.
I know when my time comes and goes, besides the boys, that I wonâ€™t be remembered for nothing more than a failure who was just an annoyance because he never was a â€œmanâ€, an adult, or just anything.

Title: After Midnight
Content:
I canâ€™t regulate right now. Iâ€™m slipping into anxiety attack mode and Iâ€™m really trying to calm myself.
I hate this. Over 3 years and I am suffering just the same. Wracked with miss placed guilt over not being able to keep Patty happy enough to stay with me. Wracked with guilt that I will never be the father I wanted to be for the boys. Unable to do anything and knowing I have to, to live. I just canâ€™t see the light at the end of the tunnel.
Iâ€™m a joke. Iâ€™m no real man. Who would want me? No one has ever regretted leaving me. I hear all the time how after break ups, the one who caused it has come back in some form, whether a crying phone call or a moment of weakness, but never for me. People leave me and burn everything to the ground and salt the earth, so nothing will ever grow again.
OK, I admit it, I suck at money. I never had plan. Iâ€™m always behind on stuff. I make stupid impulsive purchases and had barely any savings ever, but I loved with my whole heart. I was honorable and faithful.
It was never good enough. I just want to give up. Iâ€™ve reached the point where I canâ€™t keep treading water anymore. I need help, but to get the help on my own is causing so much anxiety and guilt. I should commit myself to a 30 day program,Â  but I canâ€™t because I have work responsibilities. I feel like Iâ€™d be further abandoning my kids. That my absence will causes other peopleâ€™s life difficulties. I canâ€™t afford to do that, even though I really should. I should have from day one.
I need someone stronger than me in my life, but someone who communicates their issues. Itâ€™s all fault. Ever since the day my 1st wife told me she was pregnant, I tried to do the right proper thing, but it wasnâ€™t.Â  I was blamed for getting her pregnant. I was blamed for the divorce. I was told that I didnâ€™t have to marry her by the same people that told me to take responsibility. I worked the long shitty job like a man should for his family only to watch my family be ripped away and given to another. Twice. I never properly grieved or dealt with things, because I was told to man up and shake them off. But I just never did.
Itâ€™s almost 1 in the morning and I am typing this on my phone with tears in my eyes for the 2000th time. Iâ€™m not saying someone has to do this for me, but everyone knows I am struggling and not one of them has even lifted a finger to help me at all.
I donâ€™t want to live anymore and I wish that something would just end it. Die in my sleep. A heart attack. Stroke. A plane falling out of the sky on top of me. Something. I just donâ€™t want to live this way. I want what I had back, I did nothing to have everything taken from me.

Title: â€œSIGHâ€
Content:
Smile, though your heart is aching
Smile, even though itâ€™s breaking
When there are clouds in the sky, youâ€™ll get by
If you smile through your fear and sorrow
Smile and maybe tomorrow
You see the sun come shining through for you
Light up your face with gladness
Hide every trace of sadness
Although our tears may be ever so near
Thatâ€™s the time you must keep on trying
Smile, whatâ€™s the use of crying
Youâ€™ll find that life is still worthwhile
If you just smile
Smile, though your heart is aching
Smile, even though itâ€™s breaking
When there are clouds in the sky, youâ€™ll get by
Thatâ€™s the time you must keep on trying
Smile, whatâ€™s the use of crying
Youâ€™ll find that life is still worthwhile
If you smile
When there are clouds in the sky
Youâ€™ll get by
If you smile, smile
Youâ€™ll find that life is still worthwhile
If you just smile (smile)
Youâ€™ll find that life is still worthwhile
If you just smile

Title: Hope
Content:
Thereâ€™s a part of me wanting so bad to be someone new, someone different, but Iâ€™m held back by the past. By responsibilities that seem as though no one else have. Morals and ethics are supposed to be important, everyone says they are, but at the end of the day, only the person who is moral and ethical loses.
HERE WE GO AGAIN
I spent most of my adult life trying to do the right thing. Never selfishly thinking of myself and now I am paying for it and all they can say is, I brought it on myself. I just donâ€™t want to feel guilty anymore for doing what everyone else does, living my life. Everything I do is the wrong thing. Donâ€™t pay a bill to pay a bigger one, â€ Youâ€™re so irresponsible.â€ Canâ€™t get my boys for the weekend because I only have just enough gas to get back and forth to work, â€œYou donâ€™t love your boys enough.â€ People put me in spots and complain and yell that Iâ€™m in that spot. Patty took everything, without one spread of respect or an ounce of guilt and now calls me a poor scumbag, knowing full well she kicked me into the pit. Now Iâ€™m judged. Iâ€™m judged by banks as a risk so I canâ€™t get a loan that could change my life. Iâ€™m judged by women on dating sites when they want to know me. Iâ€™m supposed to be this man everyone wants, but I never seem to fulfill. I was a loving father and husband, no good enough. I was a caring brother, not good enough. I was a best friend, not good enough. I am a hard worker, not good enough.
It seems my life is nothing but dominoes and egg shells and any direction is the wrong move.
I have always accepted my responsibilities, but Iâ€™m tired of also having responsibilities heaped on me from people who shirk theirs.
Iâ€™m sick of writing these everyday as I am sure people are sick of reading the same whiney things everyday. I guess all along it is me. I am to blame for my and others bad lives. The cruelest thing is I am too oblivious to see that I have dragged people down all my life and most are worse off from knowing me.

Title: Howâ€™s your day goin
Content:
Well here I sit in my truck miles away from the safety of my apartment after yet another unsuccessful date with someone. Not that I did it, but it seems like my ex sat and complained about her unhappiness and feelings and the first guy swooped in and fulfilled her lifeâ€™s dreams. I mention I feel sad and alone and just become even more sad and alone.
Against all my efforts, I think thatâ€™s that for me. Iâ€™m not meant to have a family, friends, or a relationship. Iâ€™m just meant to quietly fade away
Â

Title: The nasty hate
Content:
Can someone explain why a person who ended the relationship has to be so nasty?
My part in itâ€¦ During our marriage, I couldnâ€™t keep a job. Let me explain. I was fired once, the rest was either I was let go due to money issues in the department or like my last one, I was trained to do a job that they decided they needed a microbiologist to do the same thing.
We had 2 cars repossessed. Lost one home, but in the same breath, weâ€™re given another.Â  So, yeah, I sucked at money. Maybe I should have changed on my own.Â  Iâ€™m an adult, right, but Iâ€™ve learned that I had a personality disorder and among other things, it made me impulsive. I still am, but now I understand myself better and work every day to control myself. Does that win me back my life? No.
At no time did she ever ask me to sit down and tell me we had to get our act together ( or my act depending on whoâ€™s telling the story)
Thatâ€™s the only issue I can think of or be indirectly told of. To me, we had an essentially fight-free marriage. We enjoyed our kids, worked together on projects and improvements, took Sunday drives, and sat down every night as a family. I understand and realize that sometimes love is unsustainable and shit happens, but she cheated and lied. She broke the marriage for whatever reasons that were bouncing around in her head. I regret leaving and not putting up more of a fight, but there was nothing there. She had checked out as soon as she blindsided me with it all.Â  No compassion for the man you spent almost half your life with and had 4 children with. The man who brought you into a real family that loved you as a daughter and sister.
So why, when I walked and gave you everything and left with nothing does she have to be this nasty vindictive person? Why throw shit in my face when she knows full well she broke me mentally, financially, and emotionally? Why say shit like â€œwell I knew you wouldnâ€™t pay for thisâ€ or â€ I have to pay for all this, no thanks to youâ€ when as soon as the same day I left she moved in a 2nd income source? I was homeless for almost 3 weeks. I was given the marriage debts that I pay almost $300 a month for and Iâ€™m still paying after 3 years. She has taken several trips, paid for a wedding, and is in the middle of remodeling my childhood home with the huge tax returns for the boys and the closed to $10000 in stimulus payments from the last two years. There is no mortgage payment at all. I have to pay $700 a month. I literally starve 3 days a week, yet like her, social services think I make tons of money. So much money I actually have bonfires of just cash. Iâ€™m single, what responsibilities do I have, Right?
I get talked down to like I was the cheating lying abusive one and somehow she and he have turned most people who know me against me.
WHY? She has everything she ever wanted and all it cost her was my whole life up until the break. Yet, I am treated like shit.

Title: Thatâ€™s it
Content:
Iâ€™m done.Â 
If I do write from now on, it will be just inane stuff.Â 
No more personalÂ

Title: 6:30 pm July 4th
Content:
Cloudy skies, but humid. No real breeze. Starting to regret sitting outside.
Never been a summer person or any season person.
My future just limped by. He didnâ€™t even respond to my greeting. Head down, but you could see the lost look in his face. He lives two doors down and itâ€™s kind of weird seeing him outside at this time. He usually goes out at dawn or the dark of night. His windows are darkend out and there is no lawn chair outside.
Across the way the â€œoddâ€ neighbors are gathered. Itâ€™s good to see them having fun, but the language is something to be desired.Â  I figure itâ€™s about an hour away from the sparklers, lady fingers, and bottle rockets.
The call to the kids goes unanswered, but itâ€™s OK. I know they are having a good family time together.
Itâ€™s 6:45 July the 4th. Iâ€™m going to finish writing and go inside. Draw the shades, lock the door and curse the dark.

Title: Yesterday
Content:
I wrote a post first thing yesterday where I tore into people and was reminded by a comment that my feelings donâ€™t matter and Iâ€™ve made myself the victim of my own crime.
Once again I was told by someone to man up, grow up, and move on. Others have problems too.
Thereâ€™s no point to argue my case because my situation is nothing compared to others.
My wife leaves me and more or less destroys everything about me. Well, I should be happy that she is happy, thatâ€™s all I need to move on.
My friends deserted me, but I should be thankful theyâ€™re healthy.
The kids seem to have taken it all in stride and I should be happy they adjusted well.
Â 
I read an article today about an 18yr old celebrity who committed suicide and how tragic it is. Everyone knew he was depressed and they all did what they could for him. If only he would have manned up and have been an adult. If only he would have stopped asking and begging for help. Wow, such a weak-assed kid.
Â 
*Because we live in the world we do and people donâ€™t have the common sense to understand sarcasm, unless they say or do it, the last thing I wrote there is just that, sarcasm. It is a tragedy, but the difference is that people who â€œloved and caredâ€ for him tried, they made the effort. I somehow, without the money or fame, am supposed to roll with it. I canâ€™t afford the help. I canâ€™t afford rehab. I donâ€™t have anybody falling over themselves to help me or council me here in the real world, but I am sure I will once again be told to man up and put on my big boy pants, by someone who does or someone who has never been this low and defeated.Â 
Â 
And that is officially my last personal post here.

Title: Donâ€™t know what to write
Content:
So, Iâ€™m forcing myself to write today. I wonâ€™t go into the usual crap, nothing has changed there, but that doesnâ€™t matter. Trying to come to grips that the relationship I wanted with my boys will now have to be something else like Kayla all over again.Â  I already have regrets about stuff even though Iâ€™ve done everything I possibly can given the circumstances. Iâ€™m sure we will be close, but not as it would have been if I was still there raising them in a whole family. They will have his influence, whether good or bad, it will be there.
This thought will probably anger people, but I have never had something that was truly mine. Ok, underwear, but nothing significant. Not a relationship, friendship, and even fatherhood. All those things I usually come out on the bad side even when doing it right.
But, I said I wasnâ€™t going to go into the stuff as I have.
Â 
Whatâ€™s new in my life. I have just come from the Orthopedic office. Had both knees drained and pumped up with cortisone. It hurt like hell, but my doctor there is a very attractive woman, so itâ€™s a give and take. Had x rayâ€™s done and I definitely need both knees replaced, that ought to be fun to go through alone. Seeing that I more than met my insurance deductable with all the Roswell visits I am hoping to get this done before November.
Had a like on bumble and we started chatting last night, it went great, I thought. Her profile is gone today.
So, yeah

Title: Still havenâ€™t learned
Content:
So a literally far removed family member said this:
â€œFor every action, there is an equal and opposite reactionâ€
Yes I am actually related to him through his Grandfather.
I am that equal and opposite reaction.
I am the garbage dumpster for every oneâ€™s good things. For their good actions or things that come their way, the opposite reaction alway, or atleast the last 4 years, seems to fall on to me.
I canâ€™t catch a break.
Â 
I didnâ€™t want to write this, I have spent the last 3 hours fighting the urge, but I guess thatâ€™s my problem. I never know when I should sink back into my hole and not annoy everyone with my crap.

Title: The White Whale
Content:
Apparently, a large percentage of women around my age who are single believe there is a white whale of a man out there waiting on them. A man who has no past hardships or scars. A man who is vulnerable, but doesnâ€™t show it. A man who says screw you to the old relationships, but will fall in line with what they expect, demand, or want. A man who will accept their mood swings, past, and scars without question, yet will never once bring up his pains. A man who if he has children should be a good father to them, but always put her first, because as she says, â€œchildren are very resilient and as long as you show love, they will be there.â€ even if she has never had them. If she has children, they will always come first no matter what.
Now, these â€œwhite whalesâ€ are always trumped by looks and/or money. You can be the most fucked up man in the world, but if you look awesome or you come with money to make their lives ten times easier, any amount of shitty past can be chalked up to lifeâ€™s mistakes. Heck, they may even accept some jealousy and abuse as long as in the end, they can have nice stuff, trips, and possessions.
As I am learning, I am not either. Apparently, I am aÂ Plecostomus. Thatâ€™s the fish that eats all the shit at the bottom of the fish tank. I have my role, itâ€™s useful, but no one gives a fuck about me until I canâ€™t clean their mess.

Title: Whatâ€™s making my ass itch today
Content:
It just really bothers me that someone wonâ€™t take a chance on me because they just may have to acknowledge I have hurts and pains in life too that maybe, just maybe they will have to maybe sometimes have to give me a hug or tell me things will be ok.
Why a person you spent 20 years loving, be devoted to, and treating as the most important person in the world, can just one day turn on you and from that point treat you as if you are the shittiest of shit person. No regard for this manâ€™s life, survival, or health concerns. The man who is your childrenâ€™s father is only good enough for weekly payments and paying off debts you also made.
Why do I even care for any other person. On this planet where 95% of people would push me in front of a bus to have a few extra inches in line. After all, it seems to me people seem to like assholes more than honest to God decent people.

Title: The final straw
Content:
Apparently it is me. Everything is me. I am meant to be my own person, as long as that fits into anotherâ€™s view or wishes.
Iâ€™m told to heal, but told Iâ€™m not doing it right. Iâ€™m told to express my thoughts and opinions, but told they are wrong.
Iâ€™m told to be a father, but not like that or told Iâ€™m doing it wrong by another who in no possible way can be a father. Oh yeah, I forgot, itâ€™s 2022.
Â 
Screw it. I wanted to write more, but it doesnâ€™t matter. My truth is all wrong anyway, Iâ€™m constantly told. Oh some people try to be nice about it, but itâ€™s a very condescending type of nice.
Iâ€™m tired of having my happiness torn to shreds for otherâ€™s.Â  Iâ€™m tired of having to be happy for them because they â€œfound their happiness â€Â  Iâ€™m done being the nice considerate push over. Seriously,Â  itâ€™s over. Staring with my crap neighbor and her nasty as dogs. First comment out of her mouth hole is going to be shoved straight back into her.
The world wants me to be an ass, wants me to be selfish to get anything, well remember what I have written before today, itâ€™s probably the last time youâ€™ll see that Colby anymore.

Title: The final straw 2
Content:
I just hate myself. I hate the fact that I have put everything and everyone infront of my own self for most of my life and they have all just shit on me. Iâ€™m sorry for the language, but honestly there is no nice way of putting things anymore.
I appreciate the love I get from some of you here and I wish I could live up to the hopes and thoughts you have for me, but itâ€™s not going to happen. Not how I think you want for me.
Iâ€™m just angry at a world that doesnâ€™t owe me anything,Â  but sure likes to beat the f out of me on a daily basis.
Â 
I know the the responses I will get and I realize itâ€™s all my fault. Iâ€™m the piss poor whiney bitch boys who thinks I deserves something no one is promised in life.Â  All I ever want was to be told why. I donâ€™t give a f that Patty doesnâ€™t love me, but I have never done anything what so ever to her to hate me like she does now, yet Iâ€™m supposed to just accept that 20 years of my life doesnâ€™t mean shit anymore and I am suppose to act like it never happened. I lost my hair, my looks, my health, friends and relationships and Iâ€™m the bad guy because I feel cheated that I gave up everything that made me who I am for what amounts to nothing.Â  And I have to accept that and be one of the few who doesnâ€™t deserve any sort of help or support.
Its great to be told about the injustices of life from people who have never really went through them. The ones who tell me how to feel about my dead daughter, who never lost a kid. The one who tells me about dealing with a broken marriage, while they sit in theirs. How not everyone is this way or that way, when if given the chance wouldnâ€™t think twice about pushing me aside to escape a fire. Everyone knows what I am feeling and how Iâ€™m hurting better than me and my thoughts are just stupid and wrong.
Â 
Yes, I am losing my shit today, but thatâ€™s that. These will probably be deleted later, because like always I will choose once again to bend over and take it because someone else feels offended.

Yeah, I went off the reservation today with my entries
Thing is, I donâ€™t know how to live anymore and Iâ€™m in constant pain physically, mentally,Â  emotionally,Â  and financially. The divorce didnâ€™t take it all from me, but was the shove off the cliff.
I canâ€™t seem to find my place in the world, because everything I have tried over the 51 years of my life have all ended in failure and heartache for me and those around me. Enough so that my people have left my side instead of once again being part of my failures anymore.
I have to let it all go. Let go of everything and everyone.

Title: Where Iâ€™m at
Content:
Look, I lost my mind this weekend. It happens from time to time. I have at least seven opposing views about how to move forward going on in my noodle and there is absolutely no common thread to any of them.
I have tried to heal over these last few years and I have constantly been met by people telling me I am doing it wrong, but in the same breath, they tell me I have to do it on my own. What used to be, â€œyouâ€™re not my typeâ€ has become â€œyouâ€™re not at the same place as me in life.â€Â  It wouldnâ€™t be so hard dealing for me if I had spent my life selfishly thinking of myself and all others be damned, but I havenâ€™t. IÂ  have lived for others. Given up who I am and my dreams to another only asking for someone to be there for me. Not a demanding ask, just a be there request.
I will use my friend Sean as an example. I donâ€™t think he ever considered anotherâ€™s feelings when it came to him living his life. Seriously, if the opportunity came around for him to screw your girlfriend, he would, with no â€œbroâ€ code whatsoever. He had 2 sons with his first wife and at the time seemed like a great dad, until the divorce. Although he was receptive to his young children, he was absolutely not there for either of them. He immediately went back to living a life of no responsibility and selfishness. Not one person ever called him out on his shit. He had so much potential but lived (lives) a life of just enough. His 2nd marriage was over and done about as fast as it began, and he didnâ€™t skip a beat, and no one abandoned him, even I let him stay with us for 2 weeks. There was a passing appreciation when he was there, but that was instantly forgotten when he moved on. The 3rd came with 2 children not his own, but to who he gave a bunch of time and effort, even more than his own boys. That relationship ended and immediately he left their lives, with whom he spent over 5 years in. In no time, heâ€™s now into his 4th major relationship, with a very successful woman who also has a son. He doesnâ€™t bring anything to the relationship other than being fun to be around. He hardly works, has no pot to piss in, smokes pot, drinks way too much, and sits on the PlayStation more than a teenager. Heâ€™s 51 years old. I canâ€™t even get 2 dates out of an ex-alcoholic.
My other friend Tony, who I will be the first to admit had a rough youth, now has a horseshoe up his ass and unlike me, he is there for Sean constantly. For friendship and support. Where I was told that he didnâ€™t want or care to hear about my divorce, heâ€™s planned parties to cheer up Sean. They organized 50-year birthday parties for each other and have yet to tell me happy birthday on mine and itâ€™s been a year and a half. I guess the point is that they have a friendship that for some reason I thought I was part of, but like all my relationships, I overvalue my importance. Both my marriages ended abruptly and each ex wasted no time getting back into a relationship, without so much as a regret, even with us having kids.
I guess it is me. I am the factor in it all. I donâ€™t feel like a narcissist, in fact I know I am not one, so I guess Iâ€™m just worthless to people. I guilt my way into their lives and they just reach a point where they could care less if I die and never get heard from again. Over dramatic? It definitely sounds like it, doesnâ€™t it? Yet, I swear on the life of my children that that is the way it has gone.
People notice me when there is a reason to tell me Iâ€™m wrong in their eyes. I have done something to upset their applecart. When the shoe is on the other foot, I am unfortunately in their way and I am insignificant.
Â 
None of what I write makes any sense and it shows. I need to be committed or call it as it is, Iâ€™m disabled because of my mental state. Eventually, itâ€™s going to totally break and someone is going to be hurt and not just me. When you know you need help, but you also know that that help is unaffordable for you, what do you do? You all can tell me, yell at me, that I need professional help, but how? Where? No one is going to have a GoFundMe for Colby to go for a 30-day mental rehab. Dr. Phil isnâ€™t going to come around with a show-funded commitment. My â€œlovingâ€ family and friends are not going to care enough for an intervention, I havenâ€™t even received a hug from any of them. So, how, where do I find the â€œhelpâ€? Especially when my faith has been so damaged that I just refuse to hear the religious angle of it all.Â  I just donâ€™t know how to find a cult to join either.
Â 
So here I am in horrible depressed lonely limbo. Every effort I have attempted has added more to it than relieved it.

Title: The brain wonâ€™t shut up
Content:
What do you do when you finally realize youâ€™re nothing? That most of your life you have been sheltered and essentially lied to? When you are stuck in a spot mentally and physically where you canâ€™t seem to get help?
Itâ€™s funny, I know exactly what is wrong with me and how to try and fix myself, but I donâ€™t want to. I canâ€™t get over that hump alone. Everyone can remind me and/or tell me I have to, but I just canâ€™t. No one seems to care enough to see this and try to help, whether with or without my blessing, they just write me off and move on. Other than the comments I get on here, I have not heard from anyone, other than my boys, in months. Some even years. Yes, I have made the effort to get in touch, but it has gone nowhere.
Â 
All this makes me hurt. Seriously, I feel this constant pressure in the middle back of my head, a throbbing dull pain that never goes away. Not when I am happy like I was at Jonathanâ€™s graduation or when I take the medications for it. It is just always there. Thereâ€™s a filter over me where I just canâ€™t enjoy life in any way and canâ€™t escape my problems. My days are filled with thoughts and my nights are filled with dreams of my pains. I just want to hear from someone who has mattered to me in my life that it is ok. That the missed time with the boys is ok. That I did nothing wrong. That I am justified for feeling hurt and betrayed. I know that I had a hand in everything thing that went bad, somehow and someway, but I accepted it and apologized, and yet itâ€™s as though no one cares. Why? Why have my own flesh and blood siblings turned away from me? Why have my lifelong friends just left me broken and alone? Why does it seem like I carry a stench that repels people, even though I canâ€™t be any friendlier and kinder?

Title: Alone
Content:
I really want to talk to someone, well I want to talk and I want them to listen, agree, and tell me Iâ€™m ok that is.
My oldest is back home after a 3 day visit and every feeling I fight so hard to escape rushes right back in and I know Iâ€™m going to be a mess.
The couple people I have to possibly contact are more than likely busy or just canâ€™t handle my shit today, not that they have any other.
Sites like better health and talk space sat they can put you with a therapist instantly, but thatâ€™s so far from the case and I really donâ€™t want to overwhelm some poor volunteer at a crisis line.
People ask why I feel so alone, thus, this here is why. I have no one emotionally available to talk or listen to me. Everyone in my life does, they have spouses, friends, and family. I have to fight with myself to call a stranger or look to you all, who donâ€™t even know me for support.

Title: Yeah for me
Content:
What did she lose? She still lives in the same house, with all her things, and the kids 24/7.Â  What did my friends lose? They still hang out every Friday and have partyâ€™s.Â  What did my siblings,Â  especially my sister lose? Nothing, none of their lives changed.
Why was I the one punished? I worked to keep the marriage and family together. I checked in on my friends religiously,Â  for birthday and holidays. I bent over backwards and kept my mouth shut when my sister berated my parenting skills.
Â 
So here I sit, the living this so called â€ bachelor lifeâ€ where I answer to no one, I can come and go as I please. No one to answer to. Yeah, I canâ€™t wait to die alone.

Title: July 13th
Content:
I want to write, but itâ€™s always the same thing over and over. I want to live, but I just canâ€™t seem to get passed myself. I want to matter, but I have learned that I never had.
All my memories now have asterisks with them. I canâ€™t remember them as completely as I should and no one cares enough anymore to help fill in the blanks.
I learned to love from my parents, but I will never have that. The world is against me. Itâ€™s been a hard pill to swallow that no one will love me as my parents loved each other.
Why do I not get a 2nd chance? All the years and memories with Patty and the first chance she had to walk, she took it and had no second thought of destroying me. Oh, I am sure she doesnâ€™t speak ill of me in front of the kids, but she doesnâ€™t talk about me at all with them. She never sat them down and explained anything to them, just forced a new man into their lives hours after I left to give her â€œtime to thinkâ€. Whatâ€™s worse, all I have ever been told was it was about finances.
Maybe I am missing something? Maybe I should care less about others. I should destroy people and othersâ€™ relationships for my own gratification. Maybe I should steal the watch off a dying manâ€™s wrist instead of helping him. Maybe thatâ€™s what life is about. Maybe I missed that point in my years of reading and learning the Bible. I must have because it appears that the sinners and the selfish have everything they ever wanted.
Maybe I am unloveable? It has seemed so easy for others to give up on me, leave me, and forget me. Three women in my life that I gave up on myself for, just dumped me from their lives without so much as a thought.
I must be a lousy brother, father, and friend too. No one has come to me in my hour of need as I have them. My kids go through the motions for holidays and birthdays. The â€œhomemadeâ€ projects that they make in school are almost the only time they show I matter. In an age of cell phones, texting, and video chats, I still have to contact them. I love them all, but in the 3+ years I have been out of the home, I have received maybe 3 calls â€œout of the blueâ€ and those were just questions. No, I donâ€™t expect them to be lost without me, but every visit I get with them, they call their mom before bed. How have I become the horrible one?
Yes, I am a whiny bitch. I have a â€œwoe is meâ€ attitude. I scream of the lack of fairness in an unfair world. No one owes me shit. Only I can make myself happy. Yada, Yada, Yadaâ€¦
Â 
Even I hate me.

Title: Tell me what I really think
Content:
I spent some time looking at myself in the mirror this morning. I really donâ€™t like what I see, I havenâ€™t for a long time. Maybe everyone is right to have left.
Although I have lost some weight, I look disgusting. Besides the obvious fat, the loose hanging skin just looks ugh. Age hasnâ€™t been kind to my body, in all kinds of ways. â€œThingsâ€ donâ€™t work right anymore so essentially if I would happen to fall into a relationship, I wouldnâ€™t be able to â€œpleaseâ€ anyone in that way. This has been the case for probably 4 months before she left me, so it probably was just one more reason she was done with me.
Whatever looks I may have had 20+ years ago are well gone now. I am sick of being bald. It has made me look odd and ugly since 2004. If I let my â€œhairâ€ grow it looks as though I am a dog with mange.Â  My facial hair is a combination of several shades of red, which is weird seeing that I had dirty blond hair when I had hair. No matter how I groom it, it looks like crap, but my â€œcleanâ€ face looks worse.
No matter what style of glasses I wear, they all look odd on me.
The world doesnâ€™t help either. Iâ€™ve been called creepy for giving compliments. Creepy for asking people I have known for years to meet up and talk over coffee. The looks I get for just saying â€œhelloâ€ to a stranger in the store only add to the truth I feel about myself.
Â 
I am more than willing to go back to therapy, but because of covid and a society that believes women are men, men are women, and dogs are cats, therapists are limited. Also, it seems only well off richer people can afford one. My insurance sucks and therapists agree because trying to find one that accepts it is harder than finding the golden fleece. A 45-60 minute session of having your issues repeated to you in question form cost over $100 a session. Thatâ€™s essentially my food and gas for a week. Honestly, I just want to go to have a friend at least once a week. Yeah, I am at the point where I need to pay for a friend. I am at a point where I would waste $500 on an escort just to come over and talk and maybe cuddle for a little bit of time.
I am a disgusting man, who has pissed away any sense of companionship trying to do the â€œright thingâ€ and live what I was raised to believe was a moral and proper life. Now itâ€™s just a selfish â€œme firstâ€ world and I just donâ€™t fit in anymore.
Â 
I know, and people will say, that I am in control of my own happiness. No one else is, but everything I have tried, everything I have done has done nothing whatsoever to me.

Title: Guilt and shame
Content:
I guess it was the speed at which people shut me out of their lives that keeps haunting me. Patty wasted absolutely no time jumping into things with her new husband. It still tears me up that all those years, times, and memories didnâ€™t even count for a speck of doubt to her. Same with my â€œfriendsâ€ and others.
Â 
I donâ€™t know what it is that keeps stopping me from embracing and accepting this â€œnew lifeâ€. I do know that the criticism and guilt I get from her and my sister definitely throws a monkey into the wrench. I never have learned to please myself first and people know that and use it against me like a weapon.
Â 
I canâ€™t accept the fact that I am doing everything a man can, given the circumstance, for the kids, but somehow it doesnâ€™t ever feel enough.

Title: Letters written but not sent
Content:
Wendy,
Youâ€™re my big sister and I have always loved you. I remember going everywhere with you as a kid. Your â€œhotâ€ friends that, inevitably led to my unhealthy obsession with women in general. Youâ€™re the only female figure in my life and I have always held total respect for women because of growing up with you. That said, you have broken my heart even more than Patty ever could.
I came to you when she turned on me. I really donâ€™t know how you couldnâ€™t see the absolute pain I was in. I choked on my words, begging for some compassion and understanding. What did you do? You yelled at me that your â€œaccessâ€ to the boys might be damaged and drove away. Hours later as I called you, trying to fight off the â€œthoughtsâ€, you would not answer and said nothing when your husband called and threatened to â€œkick my assâ€ if I didnâ€™t leave you alone.
Since that day, when you â€œtalkâ€ to me, it has been ridden with guilt and shame for not being the father I should be for the boys. Yelling at me for my depression and anxiety. In fact, your big thing is how not me, not Patty, but you are the only one for the boys. You are the only one there for them, the only one showing them what family is. This apparently means, that when your real father is instantly â€œreplacedâ€ by a strange man, it should be immediately accepted. It doesnâ€™t matter that your real father was a wonderful man to your mother and you. Women should be allowed and even encouraged to make themselves happy. Weeks later you showed them all was good as you had them all over for parties, birthdays, and holidays like I was never a factor. They never saw their mother receive any sort of ramifications for doing what she had done. You made it look like it was the best thing she could have ever done to their father.
I canâ€™t and wonâ€™t say that you have never faced hurt in your relationships. You had bad boyfriends through the years, of course, your choice in men sucked ass, in my opinion. Just like a lot of women, you had to have the â€œbad boyâ€ so you can change them. You lost Don, your 1st husband to cancer. Don, who went against the grain of guys you had in your life. He wasnâ€™t the bad boy, of course, he was well off, so, thereâ€™s that. His death was hard, but you now tell anyone who will listen that he was horrible to you, something no one else ever saw. You say that dad knew, but our father wouldnâ€™t have let that go on. If he had so much of an inkling that Don hurt you, he would have pulled him inside out. Remember this was the man who literally pulled the father of Scottyâ€™s bully out of his window and beat the shit out of him. I guess what I am saying is, that you have never been broken up with. You have never been divorced. You drag the name of a dead man through the dirt, who left you wealthy and went on to marry another asshole, with whom you used all that money and you have never had a child of your own.
Is that harsh for me to say? Yeah, but you are in no position, and neither is Patty, nor your husband, to guilt me or correct me in how I feel and have reacted to all of this. In fact, no one is. Not you, not your husband, not Patty, or my shitty friends have any idea what I have gone through and none of you have ever shown any sort of consideration to understand.
All I ever wanted was to have some normalcy in all of this, but I guess I have never been worth that from you or anyone. You, like all of them, wonâ€™t like who I am becoming as I alone climb out of this hole you all left me in.
Â

Title: ğŸ˜”
Content: Why did she have to destroy me like this?

Title: Blahâ€¦
Content:
Today started out with so much promise. So much for that though.
None of the boys came over or wanted to. Iâ€™m not going to force them to just because I need someone. Thatâ€™s my problem and why I am now in the place I am in. Iâ€™ve forced people all my life to be with me. Whether through things I did or said or because I made them feel quilts and shamed if they didnâ€™t, I made them stay.
In the Grand scheme of it all, I deserve to be where I am now for what I have and have not done. The proof is right there. Both of my ex wives kicked me out of their lives and immediately jumped into a new one with others men and they are happier than they had ever been with me.Â  I gave the kids the choice if they wanted to come over and they chose not to. Kind of donâ€™t blame them, I suck to be around.
I hate weekends. I hate any extended time alone with myself. I have no money to go anywhere or do anything, well unless I donâ€™t want to pay my bills or rent.
My head constantly hurts from it all. There like a dull ache in the back middle of my brain, just enough that it seems to not let the thoughts and pains get out and let new in. I almost wish I was brave enough to try hard drugs and have that out of body experience or something, just to stop thinking and stuck dwelling.

Title: Saturday night
Content:
What do you do when all you want to do os talk to someone, but donâ€™t have anyone? Out of all my issues, this is the one that just kicks the others up.
I miss having people. Yeah, I have my kids, but they didnâ€™t want to come for the weekend.
Everything I am watching is some how making me think about this or that and itâ€™s all adding to my anxieties.
Â 
God, I hate this..

Title: Dumb
Content:
This maybe the first of many today.
I broke down and sent Patty a message. I wish I didnâ€™t.Â  Any sort of reply or non reply is only going to fuck me up more.

Title: Who is this guy?
Content:
Iâ€™ve been stupid this whole time. Itâ€™s hit home like a ton of brick today. The answer that Iâ€™ve been searching for 3 years and couldnâ€™t get from her, friends, family, or even therapy, just came to me.
Although I have a lot of traits of BPD, she is the one who actually has it. I probably could have even stayed in my home with my â€œbubbleâ€ for most of this time. Thatâ€™s all on me though and honestly it wouldnâ€™t have lasted too long before the eventual divorce anyway.
She lost her father at 10. As much as I ha e been told, things werenâ€™t the greatest in her parentâ€™s relationship and as have probably written, her mom became about â€œwhat can you do for meâ€ then â€œhow can we do this togetherâ€ and as much as Patty hated that, she was bound to become that, and she did.
Me, I was raised by both my parents. A mother who hated the fact that my grandmother was pretty selfish and horrible to my grandfather, so mom showed more then she should have, respect to me and my brothers and by a father who was raised in a family of sisters and learned that you should overly respect women, almost to the point of being walked over. I think itâ€™s called being a gentleman or â€œnice guy syndromeâ€. My my momâ€™s dad was the same too, because my grandmother rolled the fuck over that poor man. Did my mom have secrets? If she did, they died with her in 2017. All I know is I have been a week willed nice guy to women and friends and itâ€™s cost me everything. The damage is done, no putting the genie back with anyone before this point. I have tried to â€œrepairâ€ relationships, but itâ€™s too late and honestly why should I, itâ€™s time they â€œstep upâ€, Iâ€™ve did my end of things.
My crimes? I let myself go some. I was never a cut type of guy. Obviously I had a â€œdad bobâ€ since I was 20, I was a dad. I chose enjoying my employment over just working and getting status. I let my opinion be known in out village and people never confronted me, instead they gave Patty shit at her job. I have become impotent, not by choice, but it happened and it effected me and Obviously her too. Would it have been better that we talked about instead of her looking for it outside the marriage, yeah, but you women are human too. I did do my share of house work, yard work, and kid raising and I never used it as a â€œI did this so need to do thatâ€ thing. I did it because it had to be done. She is lying if she ever said that I didnâ€™t.
Point is, I am the guy most women will say they want, but really donâ€™t, unless itâ€™s an open marriage and they need a free babysitter/ provider. Letâ€™s not kid ourselves, those of you who tell me I seem like a great guy all wouldnâ€™t be caught dead in a relationship with me other then a friendship.Â  Thatâ€™s all on me though.
If I can avoid it, this is the last time I will post, write, or mention my whiney poor me feelings. I will still write, itâ€™s the only conversing I do nowadays, but Iâ€™m going to be the aloof, sort of an asshole, type that people seem to want to know and be around instead of the agreeable pushover nonrespected loser I have been for 40+ years.

Title: Clearification
Content:
I think those of you who commented on my last entry misunderstood what I was saying. Totally understandable given that 99.9% of everything I have written here is â€œwaa waa, poor me, life sucksâ€.
Â 
But seriously, I was trying to convey that something has â€œclickedâ€ finally. That I have somehow got through the fog of it all and have seen my divorce and frankly life, for what it is. 50% my fault and 50% theirs. I have always been too kind to really blame the â€œothersâ€ for my lifeâ€™s crappiness. I have mostly believed it was something I was or wasnâ€™t doing, but itâ€™s them.
Sure, no one wants to be around a sad loser, but I have become mostly that way because I judged myself and my accomplishments on the thoughts and feelings of others. IDK, maybe it is because even though my parents kind of spoiled me, they were also rough on me, for my own good. Compliments weâ€™re very far between. They knew me better than I ever knew myself and believed I could be so much more, even more, successful than my siblings. I would bring home â€œBâ€™sâ€ and they would say it should be â€œAâ€™sâ€. The â€œAâ€™sâ€ should be â€œA +â€. My dad would have me re-rake the leaves, finding the few stray ones. He never really taught me sports, because he knew if I didnâ€™t want to play them, what would it accomplish wasting his and my time. My mother never really answered my homework questions, instead, I had a mother who had thousands of books and the Encyclopedia Brittanica and every yearâ€™s update. Yes, I was the kid who burnt my hand to learn that fire burns, fell out of the tree to learn that not all branches can hold your weight.
It sucks that at 51, I now understand what they were trying to do. It sucks that I have had 2 failed marriages and 5 children (one of which has died) that will never enjoy the highs and lows of being brought up in an environment that I was. Thatâ€™s all I ever wanted for them.
I have spent 3+ years torturing myself that this was a failing on just my part. Sure an outside observer could say I did this or that wrong, but I will maintain that I did the best could without any â€œfeedbackâ€ from anyone. Seriously, if you want something to be purple, donâ€™t get mad if itâ€™s blue and you never said anything. Thatâ€™s what happened here, she let her issues fester. She kept her insecurities to herself. She felt the world owed her for her shitty upbringing. Her â€œfriendsâ€ to advantage of her feelings because they couldnâ€™t burn their shitty relationships down, so they pushed her and lived through it.
It all just â€œpoppedâ€ into my head. Hours and gads of money later and I came up with the answer I have begged therapists and psychiatrists for.

Title: Soap box time
Content:
I decided to go off topic from my usual rants and express my opinionsâ€¦ God help meâ€¦LOL
Â 

Roe vs Wade stuff.Â  Â About 31 years ago, my 1st ex-wife and I decided to get an abortion. We had Kayla and honestly that was extremely tough for a 19 and 18-year-old married couple. We were just barely getting by, even with the help from both our parents, but we were determined, or at least I was, to not have to be dependent on anyone. We could have and should have used protection in one form or another and we both knew the consequences, we were stupid. She was maybe just 2 1/2 months along when we made that choice. I think we both live with regret until today, but all choices come with two sides and have to be lived with. Also, knowing now what I didnâ€™t then, there was an extremely good chance the child wasnâ€™t mine, but I digress. Hereâ€™s the rub though, I totally agree with Supreme Court. Abortion should be a Stateâ€™s call. In fact, a lot of laws should be too. Itâ€™s the United States of America, meaning 50 individual States working to be civil together, but having differing ways. States were set up that way. Not like other countries with territories or providences all under the thumb of one or a few officials. It should and in my opinion is, a great system if it is allowed to work as it was intended to. I for example live in New York State. We pay stupid high taxes and are essentially governed by the whims of the boroughs of New York City. Want an example? In 2016 the democratic primary, essentially every county in the state voted for Bernie Sanders. The 5 boroughs of the city voted for Hilary Clinton. She won.Â  A 322-mile area was decided for aÂ 54,556Â miÂ² state. Nothing is fair in this State. Area wise the majority of the state is Republican, but not the city, so yeah thereâ€™s that too.Â  Yet, I stay here because we donâ€™t have oppressive heat, killer tornados, horrible drought, and only an occasional hurricane. When it snows, the world doesnâ€™t shut down because the roads are passable. Not sure how the states in tornado alley tax their citizens or anything like that, could be they are financially better off and own more stuff, but could literally lose it all in 1 storm at any time. The point is States should be allowed to view things differently from one another and Iâ€™m sorry, even though I used it too, abortion is a totally unnatural process to do when there are thousands of safe sex methods out there and 90% of abortions are â€œwhoopsâ€. I also believe that rapes and life-threatening abortions should be allowed to happen. Vote people, thatâ€™s the way to change it. Not protesting or rioting or even following a judge or elected officials home or to restaurants.
Whatever Ted Cruz is bitching about gay marriage. Now here is something I believe should be left alone by the court. Why? There is the separation of church and State. You wish to be married in the eyes of God, marry in a church, but because it is a church, follow their rules. If you want to get married in a casino, county building, on a boat, or dressed up like two Marvel characters, whether itâ€™s gay, not gay, or whatever the kids are calling it now, go ahead. Just know that it canâ€™t happen in the beautiful church on the corner because they donâ€™t believe in it and shouldnâ€™t have to be forced because of the separation of church and State. Besides in most States, it is legal to do so in everywhere other than the church. Now if some made-up religious church, like Scientology, allows it fine, but donâ€™t force the local Catholic church to especially if you only go there for Christmas and Easter. I personally donâ€™t care if two men or women want to marry. Like most of them, it wonâ€™t last anyway, so why live with the Christian guilt of divorce when you can casually shake off the civil union?
The absolute craziness of the far left and far right. I consider myself a moderate conservative. right from wrong and common sense. I could care less if you are straight or not. I donâ€™t care if you think youâ€™re a space dog from Saturn or secretly a lizardman from the center of the Earth, just stop pushing it on every single person. Stop forcing it on others and then punishing them for not agreeing. Most arguments start because of someone belligerently forcing their views on another. The far-right and their purity of the white race or extreme bible views or the far left and their concepts that one race is worse than another and history is wrong or someone needs to be punished for it. The views on what a man or woman is, what gender means, what an individual should be, how you should be pure from the moment of birth and never make what they consider to be a mistake, a concept that changes every other minute. Honestly, because of the internet and 24-hour news cycles, people are just throwing shit at the wall and seeing what sticks so they or their â€œat the momentâ€ odd thought can be seen as some toddler screaming â€œlook at meâ€. Somehow, the majority of common sense people, like you and me, are now governed, guilted, and shamed by people who one day just thought of the craziest things to get attention for.

So there are some of the â€œotherâ€ thoughts that go through my noodle besides the usual depressed, woe is me stuff. You see, part of my issue is that I am considered a dinosaur because I tell a bad joke or say a word that used to be ok to say because people understood the ignorance of it and also that it was not intended as hurtful or hateful, you just gave it back the same or worse, laugh it off and kept playing or partying.
Offense nowadays can be found in any word, phrase, and action. â€œHey guys, be carefulâ€Â WHAT DO YOU MEAN GUYS? THERE ARE 2 WOMEN AND A MAN TRANSGENDER HERE TOO.Â â€œHey, break a leg out thereâ€Â WHY ARE YOU BEING SO HURTFUL AND VIOLENT TOWARDS ME? ARE YOU THREATENING TO BREAK MY LEG?Â â€œI just like milk chocolateâ€Â WHAT ARE YOU SAYING? IS WHITE CHOCOLATE NOT GOOD ENOUGH? DARK CHOCOLATE BAD?Â I could go on and on, everyone knows this, but every day there is someone or group that decides to have their â€œNOTICE USâ€ moment over something that 99% of people understand that itâ€™s not offensive or said in any offensive way.

Title: Chicago
Content:
Chicago has a new album out,Â Born for this moment.Â There isnâ€™t a bad song on it, in fact, every single song is so good it transports you back to their music in the â€™70s before they got all David Foster popish. Sure I miss Cetera and Terry Kath, but they seem to have recaptured the â€œsoundâ€ again.
I do love everything they have done over all years I have listened to them and have come to see the founding members as a type of a family to me.Â  I miss Terry and what a tragedy that happened to him. I miss as much as I am angry with Peter Cetera. I just donâ€™t understand why he couldnâ€™t have just sucked down his pride for one night when they were inducted into the Hall of Fame.Â  I am totally heartbroken over Walt Parazaider havingÂ Alzheimerâ€™s and the inevitable effects that will steal his memories from the over 50 years with the band.
So many of my heroes have died or become sick and it kills a little bit of me as they do. I donâ€™t know what I will feel if anything happens to the last 3 guys,Â  although the â€œnewâ€ generation of members will definitely keep the band alive, Robert Lamm, Lee Loughnane, and the coolest man on the planet, James Pankow, are all that is left of the heart and soul of Chicago.
I listened to it all on Spotify and I am not savvy enough to put a link here, but if you have Spotify and/or any music streaming and have an hour to relax and reminisce give yourself a treat.
Â 

See I can actually make a non-whiney, poor me entryâ€¦Â ğŸ˜

Title: Struggle
Content:
Well, I am once again struggling with the â€œthoughtsâ€. I mean I am looking at things in another way, but Pattyâ€™s text kind of poked the bear. They are taking my oldest to Washington DC. Iâ€™m assuming it is for a graduation present and I am happy for him, he likes that sort of stuff. Where the mental problem comes in, is the fact that I canâ€™t do anything like that and may never be able to. Itâ€™s not really a jealous thing and itâ€™s probably all in my head. there are also several other things going on too. Caden my youngest, who has autism, has been put on medicine without me even being told until after the fact. I really donâ€™t mind, but the fact that since the first day I have never been included in anything for the boys or even our late pets. In fact, she immediately allowed him into all the decisions as if I had always been a non-factor.
Of course, my sister is right there on the front lines of â€œwhatâ€™s going onâ€ and she doesnâ€™t even inform me about things. Do you know what it is like to be accused or brow beaten about not knowing the things that you have never been included in? To be considered essentially â€œuselessâ€ by people who never tell you about anything until itâ€™s happening or over? Oh, hereâ€™s my favorite, to be told â€œI had to pay for everything and you never helpâ€ when not one person asked me to or even my opinion about what it is.
Â 
Ok, Iâ€™m back-peddling on the gains I have made, I know, but I am also not falling apart about this as I have for the last 3+ years. This is totally a new thing for me to look at life as â€œwhat I do for meâ€ instead of â€œwhat I do for othersâ€.Â  I personally do not like that I have to be a good guy asshole who is supposed to be a mind reader and never assume that people in my life will ever put forth an effort for me to be a man. A man who has to be a certain type of person that I may or may not want to be to have and hold onto a relationship with. I have to learn to be happy for people who intentionally â€œfuckedâ€ me over for their selfish wants. I have to be the one to consider othersâ€™ wants and needs instead of my own or become the asshole who made their life tough. ( I gave up my share of my home, my familyâ€™s home that was left to me because itâ€™s where the boys live, only to watch as the equity is used to take trips, buy cars, and other such items to make her life better, as I have struggled for 3+ years to even save $50)
So, I have accepted the fact that if I want anything or anyone in my life, I have to become someone other than who I have been for most of it. Or I can just be me, alone, and live, letting the chips fall where they may, accepting the fact that I will no longer be able to trust anyone to have my back, no one to depend on if I need a ride to and from a hospital or even someone who cares enough to check in with me at least once a week to be sure Iâ€™m not dead on the floor.
Â 
I donâ€™t really care anymore about people other than my kids, so, I am happy Jonathan gets to visit DC. I am happy for Caden to get the help he may need to get some control over his Autism. I am happy they all can still enjoy somewhat of a â€œfamilyâ€ experience with their mom, aunt, uncle, and stepfatherÂ ğŸ¤‘. All of that at my expense.
Â 
I hated writing this, but I had to talk to someone. In fact, thatâ€™s just one more thing I have to stop doing to be a â€œmanâ€ someone wants to hold close to them or wants a relationship with, allowing myself to expose my feelings or even being comfortable with others feeling toward me. I can no longer allow myself to ever become comfortable or secure with anyone as I did with my family and Patty ever again.

Title: Palate Cleanser
Content:
So my previous entry, which I wrote moments ago, was just my shitty old self peeking through, so you and I need a nice alternative.
Â 
Â 
Â 
Today here in Western NY it is one of the few summer days where the humidity is low enough that the warmth doesnâ€™t feel oppressive. Not that itâ€™s horribly hot, 75Â° and a slight breeze. The bugs arenâ€™t being assholes also. Kind of day where you wish you had a hammock and some nice jazz playing.

Title: Moving forward
Content:
Last night I was laying on my couch listening to â€œcalming meditativeâ€ music. First thing, it really doesnâ€™t work for me, but I keep trying. Any-hoo, I have made a decision going forward, Iâ€™m just going to make plans. No more hopes or dreams, nope not anymore.
WHY??
Since I was a teenager every dream and/or hope has gone to shit. Either life threw a curveball at the last possible second or I have achieved it and handed it right over to someone else. Letâ€™s see, when I met Vikki, my first wife, I was instantly in love. Although or probably, because I was 17, I dreamed and hoped to be with her, maybe get married and have kids and live together forever. Well, it actually happened and I fixed up our little trailer home, worked the 40hr job, and all that jazz. Then a POS name Jeff came along, Vikki left me, got the house (trailer) and child support, full custody, and pretty much all the above. Good olâ€™ Jeff got to be the â€œfull-time father figureâ€ to my daughter, moved into a pretty decent place, and turned Vikki totally against me (more than the â€œI just donâ€™t love you as I shouldâ€ she said). I lost the car I had wanted but kept the payments. Boy did he and her enjoy the shit out of it too. Trips and things I wanted to take with my â€œlittleâ€ family, but she never wanted to, were taken by her and him. All of a sudden, babysitters were coming out of nowhere so they could have date nights on the weeks I didnâ€™t have Kayla. And, I was left with nothing, except a little girl I got to see every other weekend, that is if I had paid the child support.
I had dreams and hopes with my 2 best friends/brothers from other mothers. Camping trips, hunting and fishing trips, and just pure Fâ€™n around stuff. Well, they got to do all that together and never included me. Even today thatâ€™s the case. Not sure why I keep insisting that they ever were my friends, even until today.
Then came Patty.
Just like Vikki, all I could dream and hope for was my life with her, even more so because I was an â€œadultâ€ now. Through blood, sweat, and tears, I scrimped, sacrificed, planned, schemed, and worked my ass off to get us things. I did what most women would say a good husband/man should. I cleaned and cooked without being asked, and I cared for the kids as an equal partner should. I left my comfort zone to fix and improve our house to make her and the family happy and comfortable. I helped build up great savings and retirement. Everything I dreamed of and hoped for came true. 4 great boys to teach and mold into proper young men and everything. Then good olâ€™ Ed the homewrecker met Patty at work and preyed on any and all insecurity she had. Yes, she also had a huge part too, but when you know someone is married and has four kids, ethics and morals tell you to not do things like breaking a family apart selfishly. Plus old Ed was this â€œborn again, Weslyan Christian manâ€ and supposed to know the bible better than this old Lutheran. So Mr. Ed, with the checkered past, who up until a year before our separation was just a schlub of a man who coasted through his 58 years, was handed all that I built, dreamed, and hope for. The woman I loved, the role of â€œfull-time father figureâ€, the home I put hundreds of hours into improving. Along with that, essentially all my savings and the money in the joint checking account. He essentially was given a great life without putting in anything for it.
Â 
So, no more dreams, no more hopes. I am done making them for others to enjoy. In the 32 years of my adult life, Iâ€™ve had to start over at zero, with absolutely nothing. I have never had a credit score over 550 because I have been saddled with debt for things I can no longer say are mine, all the while others enjoy them or â€œsellâ€ them to fill their pockets. Iâ€™ve fathered 5 children who will never truly know what it is to be raised by me and will take on anotherâ€™s views.
Â 
Just small possibly attainable plans for the rest of my life.

Title: Diet?
Content:
OK Iâ€™m a fat schulb with no motivation. Some how last September I got motivated and lost 45pounds and quit smoking for 3 months then the holidays hit. It wasnâ€™t all the great food, it was the depressing loneliness of what was once an awesome time to be part of a family.
So Iâ€™m back to wobbling around 255lbs and my gut constantly hurts. Not inside, but on the outside. Itâ€™s very tender and hard. Iâ€™ve never been fluffy fat. On top of that I have rectiÂ diastasis and I canâ€™t do normal ab exercises.
Kind of wish I could hire a personal trainer and a life coach. Must be nice to be rich or famous and have all that.
Now, when I was losing all that weight, I wasnâ€™t extremely active. I did this and that. It was mostly what I was eating and for the life of me, I canâ€™t remember what it was. I certainly wasnâ€™t eating enough, but I didnâ€™t have any weird effects from it.
I do remember eating Fiber One every morning and I canâ€™t seem to find it in the few stores around me lately, itâ€™s alway gone. It had a shit ton (no pun intended) of fiber and actually tasted good. Not sure of the science, but I was full for most of the day and didnâ€™t have cravings. Oh, I could eat, but I wasnâ€™t a slave to it. Itâ€™s the late afternoon evenings that get me though. Oh, and the price of â€œhealthyâ€ food.
By all means, I donâ€™t want to just sit around eating myself into disability, although I would certainly fit in here at the olâ€™ Derby NY ghetto ğŸ˜…
I guess for some people it is probably the easiest thing dieting and exercising being alone and on your own, I just canâ€™t find the motivation. At my age I think I can still get to a decent look, but nothing like if I was healthy for the last 30+ years. IDK ğŸ¤·â€â™‚ï¸ maybe if someone showed some interest in me I could use it as a springboard or if I had active friends, or any friends for that matter. I hate to say it, but my kids arenâ€™t the most active sporty types either, so the thought of keeping up with them is kind of a non-factor too.
Well, thatâ€™s just see what I can do these coming days, weeks, and months.

Title: Back to silence
Content:
The boys are home and I could really use someone to talk to, but all I have is OD.
The apartment is so quiet now. Iâ€™m missing the sounds of boys fighting and goofy YouTube. Watching movies and making dinner together.
Â 
Thus is all my fault. I was stupid to be the â€œnice guyâ€ all these years. Iâ€™ve been walked over, passed over, used, and abused and all the while I was just trying to please others.

Title: Hate
Content:
I can come to understand her failings and my failings. I can agree that humans suck and sometimes they do shit things.
But, I still hate the fact that I will never be able to have a family vacation or essentially family anything with the boys. Sure I can make my own â€œmemoriesâ€ with the boys, but I alone wonâ€™t ever have enough money to take the boys on a trip or anything. A restaurant here, a movie there, thatâ€™s all I can do. Yes, there are walks and drives and stuff like that, but those are memories that fade fast, not like a trip to DC or the huge water park or the week in a cabin.
Â 
I hate that Patty and EdÂ ğŸ¤‘ get to do this, just one more thing they have taken from me.

Title: FaceBook
