Itâ€™s not enough that I alone for the last month have unloaded each and every delivery alone when itâ€™s almost too much for 2 people.
Itâ€™s not enough that I have had to work every day while the others have had days off either because of injury or obligations.
Itâ€™s not enough that I have to work every sale that walks in the door and deal with any caller they deem â€œundesirableâ€ because they either canâ€™t be bothered or just choose not to.
I make the same as the woman who is the title clerk and cashier and less than the â€œbroken ribsâ€ guy who actually gets a small commission on everything sold here, but I do both their jobs and then some. I canâ€™t â€œrock the boatâ€ as far as asking for a raise and I am absolutely in no position to find another job.
Â 
I realize that people face adversity every day, some worse than me, but it feels as if I have nothing in my life that I control or has gone right for years. For every 1 good thing, several balls drop. Iâ€™m just tired and I really hate myself for this. All of it. Maybe it is all my fault. I ruined my relationships, family, budget, and employment. I took the path of least resistance and wholeheartedly stepped off the cliff. There comes a point when you put yourself in a bad position where you hear that little voice telling you to stay calm but all you can do is panic because there really isnâ€™t a way you can save yourself and you need someoneâ€™s help. They just choose to ignore the call.

Title: I donâ€™t understand the hate.
Content:
No one wants to tell me what I did or didnâ€™t do, but they all want to give me shit about it. I guess Iâ€™m just stupid. I donâ€™t understand how you can be with someone, have kids with someone, and make a life with someone for 20 years and then just drop them from your life as if they never existed.
Three therapists and two psychiatrists have yet to answer that.
I know I made mistakes, but u did everything I should have and yet I am the one paying the price. I stayed loyal and I am the lonely one. I loved with all my heart and Iâ€™m so desperately heartbroken.
I canâ€™t do this. I canâ€™t move on in life feeling this way and not even getting any sort of reassurance from anyone I hold dear. Is it wrong to want someone to show they care? I get the whole pull yourself up and move on thing, but all I want is for someone that has any sort of stake in all of this, to acknowledge my pain and attempt to help me feel differently.
Maybe an invite for dinner or a visit. Stop by for coffee and just talk about nonsense. Something. Almost 4 years and not one single friend or sibling has just showed up unannounced to just hang out. Not one call or text to say theyâ€™re thinking about me.
Itâ€™s really becoming very difficult to find reasons anymore. Iâ€™ll never have the life I wanted or get back the one I made. No one wants anything to do with me other than those of you who are securely â€œonlineâ€. The only people who talk to me are customers that want something and therapists I pay to talk.
Honestly, no one would be lost without me. I figure the kids would miss me to a point, but not in some â€œour lives are lostâ€ way. I guess I wouldnâ€™t want them to feel like that though.
Itâ€™s hard to face the facts that I have never been really loved or needed. No one has ever been lost for years, let alone days, without me as I have them. I canâ€™t see a future anymore. All I see is the next bill, the next shoe dropping, the next screw up, and the next let down.
I wonâ€™t commit suicide, but I really donâ€™t want to live anymore.

Title: Over the last night
Content:
Maybe I ask too much of the world. Iâ€™m not stupid, I realize other people have their own issues and dramas. Iâ€™m tired of always losing my dreams and accomplishments. Yes, I know win and lose, yadda yadda yadda.
But I see old friends and acquaintances and how they got to raise their families and now are enjoying that time after when they can sit back and live life together. Not me though. I will have to work until I die. No loving retirement with the one I love, enjoying grandkids, and looking forward to holidays. Now I live with the guilt that I canâ€™t give my kids a fun family holiday visit. My kids have to grow up with a father who can barely feed them on their visits.
I give up trying to understand it anymore, Iâ€™m just a loser. Both in name and actions. All my relationships have ended with them all leaving me for another, their â€œtrue loveâ€. Iâ€™ve only been a placeholder who they have mistakenly had children with. It hurts when I tell my children to love and respect their mother when I know in my heart that she wishes every day that I didnâ€™t father them. I mean, she appreciates that my family gave her a home, and treated her as a daughter and sister (still do), and essentially assured her a fulfilled life.
I, like other men in my position, have to live with the fact, true or not, that we are the cause of everything. I did everything, but I didnâ€™t. I loved totally, but I didnâ€™t. All the lies told by her and him are true, even though they are not.
Iâ€™m sorry but being a 51 yr old man having to start over fresh in life while having to still pay for a past that others destroyed is not the same as a 51 yr old woman who leaves or gets left but still has a home and the comfort of her children and friends. Iâ€™m tired of people saying they understand and how they went through this too when they really havenâ€™t. I realize I couldâ€™ve and shouldâ€™ve fought in the divorce and I know I canâ€™t win either way about how I didnâ€™t. If I fought, I was the fuck who took the home away from the kids. The one who made life difficult for his ex and kids. I didnâ€™t and now I am the stupid fuck who gave up everything. The one who doesnâ€™t care because I didnâ€™t fight it.
Itâ€™s horrible, but I am starting to think I should just drop everyone from my life, even the boys. I love them, but they would be so much better off. They speak like him now. They spout â€œnewsâ€ with his viewpoints. I get called his name at least twice when they visit. I listen to what they did together and how they all went here or there. Thatâ€™s the hardest thing to deal with. The Fact is that everyone treats me as if I am some degenerate scumbag because I canâ€™t hand Patty hundreds of dollars for the kids. I canâ€™t pay for this and that. I canâ€™t do this or that. You see, everyone has enough common sense to feel water and know that it is wet or fire and know that it burns, but for some reason, they canâ€™t get it wrapped around their heads that I left with nothing, asked for nothing, have to pay almost just as many bills without another there to help me. I donâ€™t have a paid-off home and I pay more rent than what the mortgage would have been if there was one.Â  My utilities are almost double living in a paper-thin apartment than a home I know is weatherized to the hilt. I donâ€™t have children to claim so not tax return or all the â€œfreeâ€ money that has been handed out over the last 2 years. Nope, all they see is a man who canâ€™t hand over his check to an ex who will tell everyone and their brother that she just canâ€™t afford things. Of course, she says this while sitting on her new outdoor or living room furniture in a house currently being renovated in between the conversations about the weekend in DC or the waterpark visit.

Title: Alone
Content:
The thought came to me today that I really want to be alone. I want to be alone to hate the world for what itâ€™s done to me. Two failed attempts to have a family of my own, lost love, a daughterâ€™s death, and so on. I know who I am and I am fine with it, other people still tell me to â€œdiscoverâ€ myself and love myself, but I donâ€™t love myself, I live with myself. Every accomplishment I may have made was for nothing. I did what the generations before told me to do. I loved, I worked hard, and I stayed loyal and I lost it all or had to give it away for the sake of others. No one ever gave up something like that for me. My parents were already 3 kids in, I didnâ€™t make them have to change, they already did. Neither ex-wife gave up anything. They kept the house, the kids, and the life.
Iâ€™ve been almost everyoneâ€™s sacrificial lamb. I have been screwed over, cheated on, lied to, and left by everyone that has come into my life since 1989, all to get what they wanted and to take what I had. Not one of them has ever apologized or even sympathized with me. They did this and blame me for it all.
Am I a saint? No. But I am not a cheater, constant liar, or abuser, but you would never know it by what they say about me, and the people who truly knew me, listen and believe the crap. I canâ€™t even go back to the town I grew up in for my kidâ€™s concert without dirty looks.
So yeah, Iâ€™m alone, and deep down inside I choose to be because I donâ€™t think I could honestly take another heartbreak without becoming postal to the world. It would be so much easier if I was better off financially though. That worry just is the gateway to all the other worries.

Title: Husk
Content:
Iâ€™m empty.
Iâ€™ve loved and cried, hurt, and waited for so long, thereâ€™s nothing left. Iâ€™m like a dried thing that has gone far beyond reviving.
For 4 years I have hoped for someone that I love and held in my heart to just come to me and be there. A call or visit to â€œsee how I am and/or if they could do something for meâ€ as I have done for them before. I got calls, â€ How are you? I need a favorâ€¦â€ â€œI know itâ€™s hard, but could you do???â€ Never just an â€œIâ€™m concerned, can I helpâ€ call or visit though, always an I need something from you one.
From day one everyone has treated me as though I am just an attention whore who has never had a bad thing happen. A spoiled brat who was given everything in life. I lost Patty and my family for reasons I will never know and she was given the victim card and I was told â€œshit happensâ€. I was broken to a point where I had to start completely over with nothing and I am treated as if I have the life of Riley.
My depression is a joke to others. Their hurt and sadness are real, but mine is just a big â€œnotice meâ€ attention-grabbing selfish thing. They have all treated me this way to the point where I am now believing everything is my fault. I donâ€™t know what or how I did it, but itâ€™s all me and I cannot do anything to fix it or myself. I am told what I should think and do and any time I â€œdo for myselfâ€ I am wrong, yet the answer to my calls for help is always, â€œlove yourself and do for yourself.â€
I will never love myself. Sorry, itâ€™s not going to happen. I like me and I can deal with me, but thatâ€™s the best youâ€™re going to get. I know other men in my position, alone and sad hoping to find someone to spend time with, but they are also better off financially and socially. They have friends that care and have the means to have hobbies and go out to see the world. What I am saying is they are not a prisoner like I am. I work but donâ€™t make enough. I have health issues that limit me. I have constant guilt that leads me. My dreams and hopes are used against me. Patty knows me better than I know myself. She knew my fears, hopes, and dreams and used each of them to destroy me and hamper my recovery. So do others like my sister and â€œbest friendsâ€. It all just seems as though the only way forward is to do what they want, hide in my shell, or just flat-out end it all. The funny thing is though, I donâ€™t believe anyone of them would even give a shit either way.

Title: Write to write
Content:
I had a whole tirade I wrote, but who cares. I mean, nothing will change.
I canâ€™t wrap my head around living in this world anymore. I donâ€™t make enough money to not care about anything or anyone, but even if I did, I constantly feel guilty that my actions or non-actions effect others who never considered me at all. Did Patty, who knew all my pain and hurt for years, consider me at all by doing it all to me herself? No and to this day even with living with my children and in my familyâ€™s home, she could careless about me. I sit here feeling bad because I canâ€™t do more for people who could careless for me.
I donâ€™t know how to move on in life. Who to be? What to be? What I can only be at 51, overweight, and bald?
It doesnâ€™t matter that I have love in my heart or that I would be truthful, moral, and caring. I donâ€™t believe Iâ€™m a fugly mess, sure I would feel better with a head of hair and a better body, but Iâ€™m not hideous. That doesnâ€™t matter. I canâ€™t spoil a woman. Strike 1. I lost everything and am back to zero. Strike 2.
There is someone I really like. Sheâ€™s girl next door pretty. Not a pompous type. She has kids. Went through a divorce. Saw the bad side of the â€œperfect guyâ€, but Iâ€™m not good enough. Oh she cares, says so on my sad FB posts. Sheâ€™s encouraged my â€œmoving onâ€, and tells me how â€œniceâ€ I am, but obviously not for her. Yeah, I understand before you all say that sheâ€™s not the one, no one is I think. Iâ€™m not good for anyone. Iâ€™ve screwed up all the chances the world has given me and now I am SOL.

Title: Sunday night
Content:
The kids are gone and I get pulled back to my reality. No one to sit next to and hold hands watching them be kids. Iâ€™m not allowed to have that in my life I suppose. I did nothing to lose it, but itâ€™s gone and never coming back.
I canâ€™t enjoy my later years because I was ruined by lifeâ€™s little tests. I am so far from being secure itâ€™s not funny and it really feels like I may never be.
What do you give up when youâ€™ve list everything? What can you sacrifice when itâ€™s all gone? I live on a shoe string budget now. Itâ€™s freezing in my place, but I canâ€™t afford to turn the heat on right now.
I just want to talk to someone,Â  but thereâ€™s no one to call or text. I know what people would say anyway, â€ you have to get over this.â€ If they would be part of my life they would see IÂ  trying and I have been for over 2 years. I just need someone, someone who cares enough not to wait for me to call. Someone who goes through with the promises that they care.
Itâ€™s hard when you have time. Time to reminisce like I have. Yes there are good memories, but Iâ€™ve come to realize that most of the last 35 years of my life were empty. Except for my children, I really have nothing. The failed relationships. The missed opportunities. The lost life.
What I need is to step out of life for 2 or 3 weeks. A health reset. Figure out medications and actual helpful therapy, but I canâ€™t restart again. I canâ€™t lose my job. I canâ€™t find what little hope I have now again. I feel so worthless right now.
All I want right now is to have Patty laying next to me. Just up against me. Nothing ever bothered me when I was like that with her. Now I canâ€™t get a reassuring word from a friend or family member. Strangers seem to go out of their way avoiding me or give me shitty looks for attempting a conversation. Iâ€™m sorry but I am well passed the â€œGod is testing youâ€ limit. Now it just seems personal. Iâ€™ve never had this much trouble to make a friend or even have a girlfriend. Now I am treated as a skunk. Judged and avoided by everyone.

Title: Bitter
Content:
I had a revelation last night. That happens a lot when youâ€™re constantly alone with your thoughts. As much as I miss my life as it used to be and the people in it, I am very bitter toward everyone who gets to have what I so wanted for myself. Doesnâ€™t matter if itâ€™s in the real world or on a television show. An old friend of mine, one of those who left me standing with my troubles, got remarried for the 4th time. Yup, 4 times. He pissed away 3 other marriages and families, but there were 50+ people all congratulating him on Facebook. Donâ€™t get me wrong, itâ€™s great for him, but I have no understanding of why the world gives a man who never put any effort into being a father or a decent person countless chances and opportunities and I am bitter. They say that I shouldnâ€™t be bitter and be happy for people that find love and stuff, but why? Why should I be happy for a person who sucked me dry of friendship when he needed one, but couldnâ€™t spare one moment for me in the last 4 years to at least â€œcheer me upâ€? Why should I be happy for my ex because she has found stability in life by destroying mine? I donâ€™t understand this whole process.
Iâ€™m not jealous, Iâ€™m bitter. I hate that it feels like for the last 30+ years of my life all my efforts, sacrifices, blood, sweat, and tears were for others. Everything I built and fought for was just handed over to someone else. Yeah, Iâ€™m sure the exâ€™s new husband brought something to the table, but it was my table. He got a home, the love of my ex, and influence over 4 beautiful children. He has my possessions, my tools, my BBQ, my lawn mower, my snow blower, and everything a man would want. My remarried friend isnâ€™t much different. Here is a guy who has doped his way through life and then â€œpoofâ€ life gives him a relationship with a woman who is a well-off professional. She owns a home and makes enough so he can sit around and play the PS5 which she bought him in between joints. I know what youâ€™re thinking too, no she is younger than him and not a hideous â€œno one will love me so I put up with itâ€ type.
I do realize that I do this all to myself. I create the â€œissuesâ€ that I feel are unfair. The only nefarious things going on are all my doing. No one has ever set out to â€œfuckâ€ me over. It is me making the guilt I suffer from. Iâ€™m just bitter because I have put all the effort into the world, the love, and all of me and I have nothing to show for any of it, and everyone around me gives me shit about it. I am sure that there are people who have it even worse, but I donâ€™t know them, I know the ones who tell me they had troubles.
But did they?
Did Nichole, the cute short brunette who canâ€™t sneeze without it hitting any number of people who have lined up to help her really have the same issue? When all of her friends and family fell over themselves for her, was she really feeling so alone she would rather be dead? Did these â€œhard daysâ€ occur between the parties or the dates?
Sean, did he feel so left out and depressed when people went out of their way to give him a 50th birthday party after he â€œleftâ€ his last wife because she was mean and told him to get a job? Should I listen to his â€œbest lifeâ€ advice as he constantly gets helped up?
Maybe Jodi, who tells a good tale of infidelity by a man she really didnâ€™t want, who left her, giving her the house and the children, maybe she understands my predicament? I mean I lost everything and had no home for over 3 weeks and was left completely alone and abandoned by friends and family, itâ€™s exactly the same thing and I should just â€œget over itâ€ like they all did, hey, life goes on, look how fast thing became better for them, right?
I just have a piss poor attitude, thatâ€™s all. I should see the couple who worked through their problems and smile because it is possible, but just not for me. I should be happy for the person who never did a single thing in his life but has a loving wife and friends who will do anything for him. I should admire the pretty woman who lost her job because the business closed and had a jerky boyfriend, but within a dayâ€™s time had several men helping her and friends giving her a room to stay in for her to get back on her feet. You see, all I am missing is hope. If I would have just believed more and prayed harder.

Title: A nobody in a somebody world
Content:
I had a different entry written, but I erased it. Itâ€™s just helping anymore, nothing is. In the last 4 years, I have climbed mountains only to summit and realize I have even more to climb. I realize we all do somewhat the same thing in life, but Iâ€™m done. I have reached a point where although itâ€™s doable, I need help. Iâ€™ve done the meds, the therapy, the prayers, the breathing, the meditating, and the acceptance and absolutely nothing has seemed to change. No new (physically near) friends, old ones never came back, all the efforts to repair relationships I didnâ€™t break have been for nothing.
Iâ€™m ok with me, I just donâ€™t want to live a life alone and that is what the world seems to be pushing onto me. I realize I am to blame for everything. I didnâ€™t do enough to keep Patty happy and secure. I was a shit brother and friend. I get it.

Title: A nobody in a somebody world 2
Content:
I donâ€™t matter to anyone. Years spent with my ex have all seemed to be washed from memories. Everything I did for friends, is gone. As soon as my marriage ended so did my family. My sister just wants to be the â€œsuperâ€ aunt and rub it in my face that she would be a much better parent if she had been given the chance.
Gone are the days when â€œholidaysâ€ were special. I havenâ€™t felt the â€œspiritâ€ in 4 years and probably never will again. There was a time the family would come together with food and fun and now itâ€™s a cold apartment and no greetings.
I donâ€™t know any other way to live. For the first 48 years of my life, this is what I had, how I lived. For the last 4 years, itâ€™s been nothing. Yeah, I get the kids a day or two afterward, but this isnâ€™t the life I wanted them to grow up in. I donâ€™t even know how to fake it.
I really canâ€™t understand how these people I have loved and cared for over decades could have just given up on me as they did. I donâ€™t know why when they all knew how sensitive I was and how deeply I cared for things, they just brushed me off and said â€œshit happensâ€ and â€ I donâ€™t care to hear itâ€ to me? What am I supposed to do?
Death is one thing. When you lose a loved one to death the finality of it is somehow comforting. This isnâ€™t. I lost important people in my life although I can still see them, read what they write, and hear what they say all the while, they treat me as if there was nothing between us. I mean I was there for my ex for every doctor visit, every birth, and every happy or sad moment, but I get treated and talked to like all I ever did was sit and poke her with a stick for 20 years. She wonâ€™t even talk to me about the day any one of our kids was born like I just donated at the local sperm bank and I figured out that she â€œusedâ€ my sample.
It made sense with my first ex. We fought constantly. She lied and cheated. Hell, she even slapped the shit out of me for no reason one night. But, Patty, there were absolutely no issues being thrown around. Sure, in retrospect, I can understand it was a money security thing, but there was never a lack of love. As I have said countless times, the day she ended it all, we woke up, held each other discussed dinner, hugged and kissed, and we both said â€œI love youâ€. Then in the late afternoon without warning it was gone as if the last 20 years never happened. Everyone and I mean everyone, acted as if there was never a marriage between me and her. People literally looked at me as I was sobbing and inconsolable and told me â€œget over yourselfâ€ and â€œif youâ€™re going to be like that, I donâ€™t have time for youâ€. Do you know that I never was hugged or held and told â€œit will be ok. Weâ€™ll get you through thisâ€ at all, ever, to this dayâ€¦
And now. I am always wrong. Always the bad guy. Not one person considers I may have an issue or problem, they just go right to â€œColbyâ€™s a fuck who doesnâ€™t care.â€ I pay over $700 in rent for a paper-thin walled 3-room apartment. The last few days have been cold and itâ€™s only getting worse. My furnace has not stopped running since I turned it on 2 days ago. Not one break at all. It has never warmed the place up to the temperature I set it to, which isnâ€™t the warmest either. Thatâ€™s gas and electricity running constantly. My â€œbudgetedâ€ bills are too high to pay let alone what this will do. I pay 2 car payments, 1 I own and the other from my marriage that â€œwho the fuck knowsâ€ where it is. $400 for one, $275 for the other. Every check has close to $350 taken for taxes and insurance. Insurance that still costs way too much for co-pays and prescriptions. Finally, I pay $200 a week for child support. What does this all mean? It means I live on $50 a week with no savings. It means that when I get my kids I blow what money I have on food for them. It means we donâ€™t go anywhere because I donâ€™t have gas too. IT MEANS, I am a no caring, shit, SOB of a father because I canâ€™t take them this weekendâ€¦ IT MEANS, I once again have to hear from my ex and my sister that EVERYONE has bills. YES, but not everyone has another personâ€™s income helping, a paid-off home worth $80,000, several large Covid checks over the last couple of years, and huge tax refunds because you refuse to allow me to claim just one.
Iâ€™m just tired of always being wrong. Iâ€™m tired of having to rely on the kindness of strangers to feel like I am not wrong.

Title: This storm is a metaphor for my life
Content:
And just like that I am put into my place.
Like my life that has fallen and broken apart over the last few years, so is this winter storm Iâ€™m stuck in.
Just like the people who are in relationships and the â€œprettyâ€ ones who have several people there to take out a splinter, so is this situation. I am stuck in my apartment. I am physically unable to walk through the deep snow and can only shovel so much until I have a raging sciatica attack. Yes, I am a medical mess. Could I crawl through the snow, sure but by the time I get to the front I will be in the midst of hypothermia.
So why the comparison? Well as said, just like the people who throw life advice at me that have never â€œreallyâ€ been a 51 yr old slightly over weight, bald, and broke man, they are also telling me how to sit and be patient about the snow.
You see, they can get out. They have food and company. They are not stuck as I am, but they went through the same storm, so of course they know everything Iâ€™m going through.
I was supposed to get my oldest from college today for the holiday break. Was the only time I would see him, but nope, once again I will be the huge disappointment everyone makes me out to be.
â€œI would do everything I could to get outâ€ says the guy with his own home and snow blower and several friends that came to help. Silly me, I forgot how easy it is.

Title: So I just lost my job
Content:
Yup. Iâ€™m snowed in, out of everything,Â  and just got a call that I am being laid off.
Itâ€™s going to be a fucking rough night.
Of course I have no one to talk to so I call my sister. First I get, donâ€™t tell the boys. Secondly I get the well get out there pep talk. What I donâ€™t get is any compassion whatsoever. Why should I?
Iâ€™ve reached my limit of these â€œtestsâ€. The â€œplanâ€. Iâ€™m essentially screwed. I have zero savings, just got screwed out of a Christmas bonus, 2 weeks before I would have been given it, and unemployment will barely keep me in this apartment I am stuck in.
I canâ€™t drink myself to death because I have no liquor or for that fact anything. I guess I have to turn of the heat, canâ€™t afford it and start thinking about what things I will have to leave behind.
Iâ€™m sure Patty will smile and say something about how I can never hold a job, but so much for the safety net I built for 20 years.Â  Homeless for Christmas.Â  Here I thought life couldnâ€™t get worse.

Title: Write for the pain
Content:
My life had turned to shit in the last 4 years. I went from happy, secure family man to a broke loser whose life just keeps getting worse. Seriously there are so many things happening all at once, I canâ€™t deal.
I can be my kids Dad, but I can never raise them how I always dreamed I could. I see all the holiday commercials and shows and they literally rip my heart out.
Iâ€™m such a failure. People think I donâ€™t try hard enough or do enough, but I do constantly and these are the results. I wish I could find the finality in me to just end it all. I fight to stay here for my kids, but I really donâ€™t know what to do. I canâ€™t afford this apartment and itâ€™s one of the cheapest around. I finally after 35 years had a job that paid a decent amount and my life revolves around it, how can I do it now? I canâ€™t wind up living in my car again. Worse thing is I canâ€™t afford the meds and I really donâ€™t look forward to that all going to shit.

Title: Write to write 2
Content:
Another sunny day here that I can only enjoy from the window or the 5 foot clearing I manages to make outside. Iâ€™m sure by my usual posts that you all see me as positive and outgoing so, when I say I feel completely defeated it will come as a shock.
I never could have imagined my body could hurt like it does right now. The arthritis in my knees and hands. The sciatica all down my right leg. The just overwhelming feeling like something is seriously wrong with me coupled now with the I canâ€™t afford my medicine or even Doctor visits in a weeks time. The hopelessness of not being able to dig myself out of this place to get to my truck and go to the store let alone get to the parking lot if for some reason someone would pick me up stuff.Â  Across from my building in another set of apartments. These house â€œspecial needsâ€ folks who are independent enough to live on their own but have aids coming over several hours a day. Thereâ€™s a clear path to their door. That sounds horrible of me to say. Iâ€™m glad that people care enough for them to help them maintain a regular day to day.
Iâ€™m not looking forward to the social services BS that will have to eventually come because of my job loss. I managed to apply for Unemployment but had to call because for some reason the website says I am using a VPN and I am absolutely sure I am not and besides its using my cell and data. Erie county is the worse social services experience one can ever have. Iâ€™m hope it doesnâ€™t come to having to apply for food stamps, HEAP, or insurance and having to negotiate getting into the city and finding a parking place that doesnâ€™t cost more than the actual benefits. Iâ€™ve never met a kind caring social services representative. Iâ€™m sure they are out there. I just donâ€™t know what I can apply for in the meantime between things.
I donâ€™t want to start over again. When I got the last job I was still able to go above and beyond and over the last few years I was able to adopt ways to still do it and not break myself. Now, IDK. Iâ€™ve never been a professional in anything so chances are the next job will have to be more physical than my body is going to allow. Iâ€™m not disabled but I know thereâ€™s absolutely no way I can stand or work physically for 5 days 40 hours.
I guess this is it. This is how my life will finish up on Earth. 20+ years of fumbling around with just memories of being someone at one time and how what little dreams and hopes I had were dashed for otherâ€™s dreams and hopes. Living with the fact that when I needed people no one really cared but gladly accepted all I did for them. How I built a life, home, family,Â  and future for someone who never did anything but take advantage of a woman having issues of faith in her marriage and now I have become the bad guy who just ruined everything and everyone and I am getting what I deserve because of it.
Â

Title: Thinking
Content:
Iâ€™ve been rethinking my life recently. Being shut in does that I guess, the unemployment isnâ€™t helping either.
The economy sucks and I am legitimately scared what tomorrow will bring. I am so screwed at the moment itâ€™s making me physically sick. I honestly donâ€™t have anyone here I can ask for help. Unfortunately I found that out over the last few years with all the divorce crap.
Iâ€™m overweight, physically broken ( my knees are so shot itâ€™s effected how I walk and what I can do), and seriously lonely. I have done the counciling and learned what to do and nothing is really helping when the problem is me. I fight myself every second of the day. I donâ€™t know what to do anymore. I really donâ€™t want to start over again and thatâ€™s just pulling me back to the bad place I was in the months after Patty gave up on me.
I realize that you canâ€™t go back and that if you could get it all back it wonâ€™t be the same, but all I want is what I had. I want to wake up tomorrow and start making Thanksgiving dinner for my wife and kids and my brothers and sisterâ€™s family. I want to sit next to Patty and hold hands like we did looking at the joy on our kids faces.Â  Now Iâ€™m sitting here alone, worried I donâ€™t have enough for them when they come on Friday. Knowing that I canâ€™t go all out because i just got the last paycheck and rent is due next week. Possibly the last time I can pay it.
What am I going to do? How do I find a job where they will be totally understandable that I am essentially lame? A job where they give a 51yr old man a chance. A overweight, bald, non professional man a chance. Before you say that it is easy and I am blowing things out of proportion,Â  I have went through this 3 years ago at 48 and went through Hell to get the job I just lost. The job I busted my ass to keep from losing its NYDMV privileges. The job where I trained the woman who is still there and not â€œlaid offâ€. The job where I did 2 peopleâ€™s jobs for 2 months.
IDK. I guess I will have to just live.
So what do I need to do? I have to figure out how to continue my meds and doctors visits. I have to try and lose weight without a lot of physical activities I can do because of my knees. I have to make peace with the fact that I will never have the family I wanted and somehow accept that I can only be a part time Dad whose children are being raised by another man. I have sell stuff and donate the rest so if the worse happens I can learn to love without it all. Maybe find something along a bus route or close enough I can waddle to when they come and take the truck. Not sure if bankruptcy will help. Iâ€™ve made the calls. Unemployment, HEAP, creditors.
Â 
I hate this

Title: Saying goodbye.. for now
Content:
Happy Thanksgiving. Unlike me, I hope you are all enjoying your family and friends. I sat down today and put everything in front of me. I donâ€™t know how I am going to do this. I can pay my rent for December and thenâ€¦ who knows. Obviously I canâ€™t call creditors today, so I am canceling things I can do online.
I closed the pay pal account and canceled reoccurring charges, one being Open Diary. Yes its only $4, but I have to learn to do without. Itâ€™s funny, Iâ€™m sure Patty will make a nasty comment even with knowing I went out of my way for her to never have to worry about money issues. My sister will start annoying me with calls and texts about how easy it is to find a job, never once having lost one and always being handed hers. Her husband will say shit too, eventhough he was handed a living from his father.
No one will offer help but will tell me how I am doing something wrong. I busted my ass all year and I will be screwed out of my Christmas bonus which would have been given to me in a week.
Well, fuck me all to Hell.
I have a few weeks left before OP locks me out, so hopefully I will have some good news, if not thank you all and hopefully I will be back in a few months and you will still be here.

Title: Thoughts
Content:
I took my son back to college today. He goes to Alfred State which is a little over 80 miles from me. I donâ€™t think I could have driven any slower then I did to have time with him.
Am I a good man? A good father? IDK. The world and â€œmy peopleâ€ have left me feeling worthless. 80 miles, in the dark, and just my thoughts. Itâ€™s all fault, isnâ€™t it? If I was a better husband or friend or brother or person, I wouldnâ€™t be in this spot. I would still be married and have had enjoyed Thanksgiving with my family. At this moment I would be sitting holding Patty and just talking about things. Instead I am in a cold bleak apartment where the sounds of my kids have all gone silent since they are hone or at college.
I wasnâ€™t good enough to keep my job. I wasnâ€™t important enough to people here who left me stranded for 5 days while I literally watched them dig out empty apartments.
I donâ€™t feel like I am important to anyone or anything anymore. People shook me out of their lives so quick and permanently. Even Patty, didnâ€™t waste any time and now acts and treats me like we have no history.
I have always been good at failing. Great at losing no matter what. Having almost everything that made me happy and complete taken from me although I did everything right. Iâ€™m all for karma. You treat people or a person like shit, you should lose them in your life, but you essentially worship someone, unselfishly giving everything you can for them the last thing you would or should expect is to lose not just them, but friends and family too.
I donâ€™t know why I write anymore. Iâ€™m not feeling the â€œtherapyâ€ from it. I feel like Iâ€™m doing everything I should to be better and everyone is ignoring me or just doesnâ€™t care.

Title: Lost interest
Content:
I have never rediscovered my love of cooking since the divorce. Hell, sometimes I canâ€™t go shopping because I see something and I begin to tell myself â€œPatty would love thisâ€ and like that my shopping is ruined.
Now I have spent a few months as a chef apprentice way way back in 1989 and I have done line cooking and prep cooking. I made entire Thanksgiving and Christmas dinners for my family, but the one thing I never did was cook for one. One lonely man who would rather starve or spend money he doesnâ€™t have at a restaurant. Frozen TV dinners have lost their luster and sometimes itâ€™s a bother to cook Ramen or even Campbellâ€™s soup. So itâ€™s usually chips or deli meat (which both are probably killing me.)
I miss cooking for my family, in an actual kitchen, with all the right stuff. Now I have a 5â€² kitchenette and 2â€² of counter space. A microwave and the smallest electric oven in the world. Seriously,Â  a typical cookie sheet doesnâ€™t fit in it.
I know why Iâ€™m still over weight, chips and shit food, but I donâ€™t just eat all day.

BLAH

Title: Again
Content:
Iâ€™ve probably wrote this about a thousand times, but here we go again.
I canâ€™t seem to find a happy balance in my life anymore. It doesnâ€™t help I am now unemployed, that only adds to the stress and anxiety. The one person I seem to be able to talk to, my oldest, canâ€™t know that I lost my job and to everyone else itâ€™s â€œoh wellâ€
I once again tried to talk to my sister only to be shut down. Friends are all gone and I just got played by a woman for money. My fault, but sometimes fat, older bald guys with nothing going right in life just want to believe.
I hate that I donâ€™t have anything. I have an apartment that just went up $35 a month, a truck just taunting me that it will shit the bed while I still owe 10k, and now no job.
Is it wrong of me to just want to live on unemployment for a couple months? Try to â€œdiscoverâ€ who I am meant to be other than everyoneâ€™s punchline. Try as I may, I just canâ€™t get past being a loser and a failure.
Patty could have tried and if she was determined to divorce could have been more civil and caring. That sounds stupid, but you would expect an abusive horrible marriage to end like ours did, but ours was nothing like that. Maybe she held resentments,Â  but she never told me, just smiled and acted as she loved me up until the morning of the day. I am some sort of pariah now, not just to her, but everyone I considered important and eventhough I should just say fuck them, I canâ€™t get past the why. I donâ€™t care what people say, when youâ€™re in a position like I am, you need someoneâ€™s help. Sure, if I walked away with money saved and the ability to pick right up in life, but I didnâ€™t and I am paying constantly for it. I get a job and save the business, train another to do my position and then take on sales and various troubleshooting things. I bust my ass for apparently no one because I am the one laid off. Not then who could easily retire tomorrow or the 2 income woman who could snap and have a new job in days. Me, the loser, the broken man who pissed away 30 years of living.
Oh, how I wish that some money could fall from the sky. I could get my knees fixed, pay off the anchor car loan, and maybe get a better place near the boys where I could see them more then a 1 or 2 day weekend. Iâ€™ve seen it happen for shitty people.Â  My friend Tony for instance. Quit paying rent at the trailer park he lived years back. Was evicted, but they pulled his trailer 2 days before the agreed date. Guess who got 16k and didnâ€™t pay back rent? Or how he went into corrections and quit for 10 years, went back, got time served and back pay. Or my other friend Sean who never has done a note worthy thing since 1994, just happens to fall into a relationship with a woman who is a professor and sugar mommas him. WTF. All the years of honesty, loyalty, and ass busting and I am on the edge of welfare or disability.

Title: Thoughtsâ€¦ UGH!!
Content:
Once again Iâ€™m sitting here thinking about what life was like 4 years ago, knowing I have to stop if I am ever going to survive. They only one I could talk to to fix it, is the one person who refuses to talk to me and essentially caused all of this.
I really canâ€™t believe I have to live like this and will more than likely die like this. Alone. I know there are men and women out there that would prefer this lifestyle and I get it, but I donâ€™tÂ  I donâ€™t want to be a part time father, an ex-husband and an ex-friend.

Title: Is this thing on??
Content:
Well just like every week, this day comes around. I take 1 or 2 or all of the boys back home and I immediately descend into a depression. I am having such a hard time seeing the forest through the trees. I just canâ€™t see this â€œbetterâ€ life everyone insists will come.
Iâ€™m unemployed, alone, and broke. Iâ€™ve mapped out a way to live atleast until February. Yeah, thereâ€™s jobs, but half I just canâ€™t physically do because my knees being so shot and others inconveniently to far or way out of my knowledge to do. Iâ€™m 51 and it looks like I have to get a minimum wage job at a place Iâ€™m going to feel odd at. This isnâ€™t right or fair. Iâ€™ve tried to live right, pretty much to the point Iâ€™ve been stepped over and stepped on by people so much better off than I am.
All I wanted was my wife and my boys living in our little house. Being able to enjoy the holidays through all of their smiles, but no, Iâ€™m here being treated as though I spent my life screwing people over and so unworthy of anyone. I never hear anyone. I have to call or text. Most of the time they go unanswered. I just canâ€™t understand what it was that I did to the world. I never ever have been treated like I have for these last 4 years. I am a reasonable common sense person and I know that I did nothing to deserve this, but all the therapy, pills, and attempts to â€ move onâ€ and â€œget rightâ€ have come to nothing. Not around here anyway. I have some friends here (open diary), but I am stuck. I have no way of moving nor could I bring myself to because of my kids,Â  but thus is killing me. I am not the loner type. I have zero hobbies and zero interest in one. Every thing I do other than going to the bathroom comes with pros and cons, everything.
I get invited to a personâ€™s home. Yeah, company, but I canâ€™t afford to use the gas.
I got my kids Christmas presents. Now I am in debt and theyâ€™re pretty shitty gifts.
Iâ€™m hungry, but I have limited money for groceries, so no 2nd helpings. Iâ€™m cold, but I have to save on gas and just run the heater when it is dangerously cold.
I just really hate me right now, probably as much as all the people I keep batching about and longing for. How fucked up is that?

Title: Who thinks of me
Content:
Almost daily I think of Patty, my boys, and others, but I wonder if they ever think of me as I do them?
Part of me hopes they never do, but another part is lost because they donâ€™t.
Maybe Iâ€™m weak, maybe I was spoiled and given a life, never dealing with adversity.Â  Maybe I should just give up on people whether lived ones or strangers. Iâ€™m not allowed to love things or be comfortable. All my life I have just lost everything that has brought my joy and comfort.
I had the love of my life and a perfect family and it was ripped from me and everyone, everyone acts and treats me like it never existed. My kids donâ€™t even remember me being there. I finally found a job I loved. I busted my ass every day at this job, giving it my all, all to be laid off days before the holidays and essentially told that they probably will never call me back.
All this shit has happened without much reason why, but somehow always being turned back on me as though I caused or asked for them.
I constantly get told about the â€œbetter things to comeâ€. When? How much more shit do I have to take for this good? The job was a supposed a â€œgoodâ€ thing because of the divorce,Â  a fresh start, and all itâ€™s done was make it worse. I had a job lined up that truly could have given me a better life, but I chose this one. So, whatâ€™s that say about me?

Title: The war in my head
Content:
Like an asshole I wrote Patty thinking that at the least she would have some sort of compassion for all the years and the boys. Nope.
I hate that I do this to myself constantly. I hate that I canâ€™t stop caring.Â  I hate that people choose to not understand the situation they put me in and blame me for.
Do you think I enjoy not paying child support? Do think I enjoy that that is the only reason people see me as a father? Do you think I like constantly losing? Seriously,Â  tell me how a man with no close friends and absent siblings can survive with nothing and no help. I am on unemployment and I make to much for food stamps. I have yet to hear shit from HEAP and I am living in a 30Â° apartment because I canâ€™t afford to run the heater.
As I have learned the past 4 years, I have no one to turn to and no where to go. I canâ€™t afford therapy, just like I canâ€™t afford heat and food. I am guilted constantly for being a â€œprivilegedâ€ white man, but have zero to prove it.
I thought my ex coworkers cared, but I havenâ€™t heard shit from them. Not even a how are you. Do I expect to much in this world or is it actually me, do people just hate me or despise me?
I just canâ€™t keep sleeping to past time, but thereâ€™s nothing else. The jobs I seem to be qualified for will bring in less than unemployment.
I am really starting to hate myself on a whole new level.

Title: I donâ€™t know who I am today
Content:
I woke up to such a dreadful feeling today. Iâ€™m no one. I know Iâ€™m a father, but I feel nothing like one. Iâ€™m fat but I donâ€™t want to be, yet I can not find the strength to do something about it. Infact, thatâ€™s how I feel about everything now. I want something different but I just canâ€™t muster the willpower anymore.
I saw a video about family. More importantly the motherâ€™s view of it. 99% of the time, they stay with the kids in the home. You see, I wanted Patty to be happy and I left for her, but somehow this has all been twisted into me giving up and walking away because I didnâ€™t want things. Donâ€™t you think if I could possibly afford to I would be just down the street available 24/7 for my boys? Why is it that I am shown as a absent father when itâ€™s common knowledge that I gave her everything and was left penniless and broken? Somehow another man who she brought into all their lives the same day I left is some sort of hero because heâ€™s there. It doesnâ€™t matter how much I love my kids, it doesnâ€™t matter how i guilt myself and torture myself everyday because of it. I can never be the father I had dreamed of since youth now. I canâ€™t offer my boys a place to live, I barely have one. I canâ€™t buy them things they need because I have nothing. All of this was caused by their motherâ€™s betrayal,Â  but everyone blames me.
I have never been an â€œAlpha maleâ€ living for myself. I donâ€™t even know how to be so selfish to put even my own flesh and blood to the side for my own needs.
Iâ€™m so afraid of new, of change. Thereâ€™s been too much, too soon for me and I canâ€™t handle it, but I have to because thereâ€™s nothing to fall back to. I think of the what itâ€™s.
What if: The day Patty dropped the bomb my sister/friends were there for me instead of chastising me. Maybe they offered a couch for a week or two so I could get my head right instead of fumbling around lost having everything fall apart.
What if: These same people called Patty out on her shit instead of just accepting this right off the bat. Maybe she would have allowed herself to think that she should atleast try to work things out instead of being reassured that this was all right.
What if: I could have stayed as more than a weekend dad. Would Jonathan be as guarded as he is? Would Morgen still be a carefree kid? Would Ethan not be as attention needing? Would Cadenâ€™s autism be better? Would I still feel like I mattered to them all?
I canâ€™t live thinking that everything will work itself out. Live with just letting the world go on this way. I wanted to be a family man. Raise my kids from babies into men, in a tight family. Then they would bring their families and I could watch my grandkids grow. Now, Iâ€™m on the outside and I donâ€™t know if Iâ€™m even part of my own kids lives and plans.
I spent 48 years being part of a family. Holidays and birthdays coming together. Love and support. A place in the dark to always come to. Then, it all stopped for me, and just me and no one can even tell me why. So Patty stopped loving me, why did my friends leave, why did my siblings stop talking?

Ive gone way off topic, again. Thing is I just canâ€™t stop feeling like a worthless piece of shit taking up space in otherâ€™s lives. If people do think or worry, itâ€™s because I e made them feel guilty. I can honestly say that at no time has anyone come to me â€œout of the blueâ€ expressing concern about hearing about what had happened. I donâ€™t mean shit to people. I have gone months without a Facebook post or a call or message to people without so much as a check in from anyone.

Title: Just shut it off
Content:
My mind. I have absolutely no clue what has set off this latest bunch of depressed thoughts Iâ€™ve been dealing with this week.
Seriously it feels like my head is in a vice. I literally have had a throbbing headache along with all the â€œthoughtsâ€. I generally donâ€™t feel good all over. I want so much to go to the doctor, psychiatrist, and anyone else and just let them throw shit at me.
Is it wrong to just want someone to call or show up and tell me Iâ€™m OK? The call for help thing hasnâ€™t worked since this all began. All I ever get is the feeling I am disturbing someone. As if I am screaming for help as something is attacking me and people are yelling at me for screaming.
Iâ€™m at a horrible point where I have moments of jealousy over the special needs residents on the other side of the complex because they have people there almost 24 hours a day. Yeah, thatâ€™s fucked up, I know, but thatâ€™s where Iâ€™m at.
Â

Title: Dec 22,23,and 24
Content:
I remember there was a pretty bad snow storm 33 years ago. It seemed bad for an 17yr expectant mother and her 18yr old husband. I thought the world couldnâ€™t be any better than it was. We married the past July and I had never been so happy and it all came down to this.
Kayla came to use around 6:30am. She was beautiful and I felt so complete.
Pattyâ€™s birthday is the 23rd and how I loved to surprise her. I would rack my brain thinking of the best gift, the best dinner, all I wanted was to see her smile.
Christmas eve was the best. Just sitting with the boys and my wife, one secure little family. Preparing to sneak the presents in and eating half of the cookie and some milk. Watching as they laid down the reindeer food. Everything was right.
Â 
All that is gone now. Iâ€™m sitting on a shitty couch in a quiet apartment. No one has called or messaged me about Kaylasâ€™s birthday, but I guess sheâ€™s been gone for 10 years, who cares. Tomorrow Patty will wake up with her new husband and the thought of how I would wake her on her birthday a forgotten memory and Christmas eve, well it will be same, just without me.
And this is how I live nowâ€¦

Title: Christmas eve
Content:
So Iâ€™m one of those lucky western New Yorkers who is stuck inside because of the storm. Not that I have anywhere to go or have anything to do or even am allowed to with the driving bans.
What sucks is that 4 years ago, it wouldnâ€™t bother me in the least. I had Patty and the boys and the world could burn down around me and I wouldnâ€™t have given a fuck.
I havenâ€™t received any messages or phone calls for the last few days and donâ€™t expect them tomorrow either. No one is ever going to tell me what is was that I did or didnâ€™t do to deserve this. I donâ€™t fault the boys, theyâ€™re young. Of course it would be nice if the adults around them, Patty and my sister, would have them call me. Yes, I call them and I message them, but when you lose everything and not even your children seem to have noticed, itâ€™s become a soul crushing thing that I canâ€™t come back from.
I long for my mother and father. The only two people who cared enough to love me, to listen, and to assure me everything would be OK. Not the ok I get from people who pity me or feel for me through my writings, the ok from the loved ones and those who truly know me. Throughout all of this all I wanted from these people was to be told that Iâ€™m ok. That things will be ok.
What Iâ€™ve heard is:
Let it go. Get over it. Shit happens. If you are just going to talk about it, we donâ€™t want to hear it. It gets better. Itâ€™s Godâ€™s plan.
Never once a hug. Never a â€œweâ€™ll get you throughâ€. Never once an â€ everything will be okâ€.
From my first birthday a month after the separation until this minute, I have been alone on any special day that comes along. Sure my kids come over a day or two or a week after the fact and sure we celebrate, but gone are the days where the actual day means anything.
I think after tomorrow Iâ€™m going to officially shut down. Iâ€™m going to force myself not to care anymore. Iâ€™ll be there for the boys as needed, but I will no longer invest myself in anyone. If I could, I would pack and go without so much as a goodbye. Based on these last 4 years, it would be some time before anyone would notice and even that would be because someone needed something from me.

Title: Christmas Day
Content:
This is my forth Christmas alone. No visitors or calls, unless I make them. All over television and Facebook are pictures of family, friends, and fun. Me, I am slowly going crazy because I canâ€™t avoid it. Iâ€™m slowly starting to realize that all the people who tell me about being happy and positive during holidays have never spent one alone like this.
I just want to give up.

Title: Wearing thin
Content:
I wanted to included a picture, but OP was telling me the file was to big.
Anyway, the worst of it is over and sure I will be the first to admit the snow and how itâ€™s covered everything is beautiful, but I am not ready to spend another freaking 5 days inside. The simple fact that this storm kept me from seeing my kids for Christmas is now keeping me from getting toilet paper and food is pissing me off.
As I learned a month ago, there is absolutely no use in asking or complaining to the manager of the complex. The same people who toss a $25 late fee 3 days after the 1st for rent, will take their sweet time clearing snow.
Iâ€™m not a monster. I know that this was an unusual weather event, but there was a significant break on Saturday that they could have gotten a start clearing, but of course blamed the â€œdriving banâ€ eventhough the maintenance people all live here. The snow is still fluffy and manageable for snow plows and blowers, but no, they will wait the the temperature rises and it becomes heavy and packed. The vicious circle will start later of the nasty texts about moving cars so they can plow when they know damn well that more than half of us are literally trapped in our place.
Can I get out? Yeah, I can destroy the storm door to get out. The snow is high enough that I can push it about half a foot and thatâ€™s it. I can certainly use my German temper to break the door and get out, but I will be charged for a new one.
Trust me, I would love nothing more than to just turn my chair facing the window and curl up with some coffee and stare out in youthful longing at the snow, but I canâ€™t and I spend the equivalent of 2 paychecks on rent for 3 rooms, not 3 bedrooms,Â  3 rooms, and you would expect that the complex would be there 25hrs.
Somewhere deep inside me there is a 20yr old man who wants to just go shovel his own way out but unfortunately the true 51yr old, broken, arthritic me know that isnâ€™t going to happen. I wish I could. I know there are others my age that can. I hate what Iâ€™ve done to my life and what life has done to me.

Title: 2 am 12/27
Content:
I canâ€™t stand this anymore. The loss of the only job I actually liked, another crap holiday season, the fact my boys are being raised by another man who Essen took my life I built. All of that and more. I canâ€™t do this much longer. Iâ€™ve done the meditation and distraction stuff,Â  but here I am at 2am with my mind fighting me with 4 year old memories of a life I will no longer have with anyone.
I donâ€™t know how people can tell me this is a new opportunity for me. I have never wanted this. I just want this to make sense. Iâ€™m a month away from possibly losing what little I have kept and scraped together. Thereâ€™s a good chance I will be homeless. Iâ€™m too afraid to start something new and to defeated to find any belief in my self. Seriously,Â  how can you believe in yourself when the worst thing imaginable happens and you are the only one who seems to care? I loved these people, I cared for them, I sacrificed for them. They were my friends, family, kids, and my soul and they all just went on with out souch of an acknowledgement of the ruin and pain I was in.
Why is depression so horrible for others but for me itâ€™s just me whoring for attention? I have literally watched people through the years have others rally around them as they had a b heart break or loss, bur when I needed that I was selfish and needy.
Maybe I am a shitty person. All I see with the people I thought were friends is how even at their lowest, they were never alone. Whether it was siblings, children, or friends, they were never left standing alone unless they wanted to be. They never went through what Iâ€™m going through all alone, yet they all want to give me shit because they â€œunderstandâ€ better and more than I ever will. Theyâ€™re 3 year relationship was far more important then my 20yr with kids. I should just shake off the loss of everything and embrace myself. The loser with nothing who gave up all his shit because at his lowest no one gave a fuck. IÂ  supposed to look deep into myself and say â€œyeah a new startâ€ when all the others left me in a pile of shit and tears. I canâ€™t do half of what I could, I look like a beat up demented older version of myself, and I have absolutely nothing to offer to anyone to be interested in me. I want to get in shape, but Iâ€™m too lazy. I want to give up, but I allow what ifs. I want to die, but I donâ€™t want to do that to my kids, who donâ€™t even act like I exist unless I call or contact them.
Itâ€™s so easy for these people who say things about loving you or being patient,Â  when in reality, they have never been in the situation I am for this long. What really pisses me off is people under the age of 45 telling me about how life gets better or telling me how to live my best life. I was living my best life. I went fir days and weeks without one negative thought and now for the last 4 years thatâ€™s all I can think about even when trying not to. And once again Iâ€™m up at well, now 2:30

Title: Thoughts
Content:
I donâ€™t how to title this. I donâ€™t really want to write.
Did you ever just want to lose it? Just hit, kick, throw, and smash everything and everyone around you? But, at the same time just want one person to just come and give you a hug, the closeness that will drain the feelings out of your body.
I just want to talk to someone and share some company. None of my kids have even asked to come over on winter break. Yes, there was the storm, but they donâ€™t even call.
Do you know how hard it is to go from thinking you are someoneâ€™s world to being an afterthought in days? Thatâ€™s me. I donâ€™t hear from people, no one checks in, my kids donâ€™t call.
I wish I hard the courage and selfishness to end things. I canâ€™t take control of my life. Every attempt falls to pieces and things get even worse.

Title: Loyalty
Content:
Can someone explain to me what it means to be loyal? I thought I knew what it was, I mean over the years I was loyal to 2 wives who both lied, cheated, and left me for another. I was loyal to my siblings, who have chosen to just push me away from them. I was loyal to friends, who now mock and avoid me. I was loyal to my children who now never call or want to come over unless they donâ€™t have a choice.
I think maybe my parents were the only loyal people in my life. My father until the day he died and my mom right up until she lost her mind with dementia. That was a hard 3 years caring for her as she hit, spit, yelled, and told me I was a mistake. Then she was gone and less than a year later so was everyone else.
I know my silly whines and cries are miniscule compared to others. Boo Hoo, Colby has no friends and no one wants him. I just canâ€™t describe what the last several years has done to an already broken person. I know thereâ€™s a problem,Â  I feel it mentally and physically,Â  but I just donâ€™t know how to describe it and when I try to it comes off like I am making shit up for attention.
I went to Walmart this morning and like always, as nice as I try to be, no one cared. No return greetings, no eye contact, no â€œexcuse or pardon meâ€. Just rude people who seem to be sickened by my presence. Iâ€™m saw my reflection in the freezer door, I guess they and everyone else are right.

Title: How?
Content:
How do I force a change to happen? Gow can I make new dreams when all I ever dreamed of I had and lost?
Is there anything like a life coach who knows the ins and outs of rebuilding and saving a person? Iâ€™m serious,Â  Iâ€™m at a huge loss here. I can afford to pay rent for January but going forward IDK. IDK if I can afford utilities or pay my credit card balance or my cat. I canâ€™t get my head straight about living. I am filled with self imposed guilt that no one seems to want to absolve me of.
I know I have to find work and that I canâ€™t live on unemployment,Â  but Iâ€™m a 51yr old and with 2 bum knees and other problems. I really donâ€™t think I can do some of the manual jobs anymore. I had enough trouble with my last one, but had the freedom to start and stop as I needed. I have waisted my life doing a lot of nothing, but not enough of something. I worked as a family man, who put the importance on my wife and children, never wanting to be away from them and being there for every moment. Now I donâ€™t have them and I donâ€™t have a job. The world hasnâ€™t made me feel good about it either.
I didnâ€™t ask for this and I know I didnâ€™t cause any of this, but yet I still have all the blame and guilt heaped on me because of it. My ex treats me like a bum, eventhough her actions and my sacrifices brought me to this point. My friend blame me for doing the right thing even as they would if I did the wrong thing. I donâ€™t know how much more I can give up or sacrifice to be normal again. Then again, I have no clue what normal is.

Title: Starting to think
Content:
You know what, it has been me along.

I was a shit husband, twice. I was more selfish then giving. I needlessly expected love and caring. I did all these things for them both and assumed they would appreciate me. I didnâ€™t realize they wanted to be unappreciated like the men they left me for. Instead of sitting around being a â€œmanâ€ I did things and made choices for all of them and not myself.
I chose to sometimes make sure the kids had clothes, food, and shelter instead of a car payment on time or such.
I assumed my friends and siblings would somehow be there for me as I was for them, when bad things happened.
I busted my ass for an employer who I thought would see and appreciate me for it. Pushing myself to a point where I physically unable to do some mundane jobs like stocking or standing for hours. Instead, I should have become more buddies with everyone so when it came time to lay someone off it wouldnâ€™t have come down to who kisses ass best.
I lived a life of loyalty and honesty and now I am reaping the rewards of poverty and loneliness everyone strives for.

Title: Happy New Year
Content:
Please donâ€™t confuse this as I woke thus morning after 3 ghosts visited me and shown me how life is great. Itâ€™s a way of trying to wish all of you a Happy New Year, especially all of you who have given me some space in your head and heart. OD has the worst messaging system to do it individually.
Colby

Title: Over and over
Content:
If you have allowed yourself to be tortured by my ravings, you already know that I have not allowed myself a chance to let go for over 4 years. I constantly whine and cry about the same stuff over and over and over. I would love to say that I have resolved this year to stop, but I havenâ€™t.
It is soul ripping every time I drop my boys home after having them. I not only have to say goodbye, I have to see my home I grew up in that is no longer mine. I home that when my mother gifted it to me I helped build a family in. A life in. Now itâ€™s all someone elseâ€™s. Oh I know Patty owns it now, but he is tearing it apart. He is sitting in my living room and sleeping in my bedroom. He has breakfast,Â  lunch,Â  and dinner in my kitchen, with my kids and the love of my life. He will live right up until the day he dies with the contentment that only a man with a family around him understands while itâ€™s looking pretty likely I will be long dead on the floor before anyone notices.
All I know is Iâ€™ve been a house of cards. I know that I am totally responsible for my own recovery from all of this. I have tired over and over too move on and forward. Like I said house of cards,Â  I reach a point where Iâ€™m good, well ok with it all and then a word, thought, action, or something completely out of my hands happens and itâ€™s back to 52 card pick-up.
I just do not have local support, meaning friends, family, and siblings. No one can truly teach you to ride a bike, but they can help. Iâ€™m not saying that no one cares, some do, but I have never heard from anyone about how I am or how I am doing here. I have never had a surprise visit from a friend or family. What I have had are lectures and brow beatings about not handling things how people think I should. I have had them since about 2 hours after Patty told me she wanted a divorce. Although I have found support from online people and a couple old acquaintances, I never received any here. Infact, I have been blamed for the lost of friendship and closeness to them all because I didnâ€™t react how they expected me to. I know thatâ€™s very understandable but I have to give an example of how I have been made to feel.
Imagineâ€¦ You are put in a situation beyond your control. Out of no where a rock falls from the sky on top of your house trapping you. You are in horrible pain and can hardly help yourself. Your cries for help are at first ignored. Then you finally hear an answering voice. â€ What did you expect living in a house under the sky?â€ â€œYouâ€™re alive, so way donâ€™t you just pull yourself free?â€ So you struggle and struggle, but itâ€™s not helping. â€œPlease, I am trying I just need some help.â€Â  â€œWeâ€™re sorry, but everyone has problemsâ€. So you go back to trying, days, weeks, months past and you slowly get somewhat free.Â  You never hear anyone ask if you are OK, in fact, they have all walked away from the crushed mess youâ€™re trapped in. â€œOK, I have managed to get somewhat free, but I am in so much pain still, something is brokenâ€. â€œJesus fucking christ!! Get the fuck over it. I mean, we are all sick of seeing the eyesore of a smashed house. This is starting to ruin our view. It always help me, help me.â€
The point is, you can do 99% of it, but everyone needs that 1% help, especially from the people you have loved and been there for all of your life.
So there I am. My boys are home and my world is back to quiet, dark, and lonely. Thereâ€™s no one I can call or will answer to talk about it or even the price of tea in China. Just my thoughts that kick up the breeze next to the house of cards.

Title: A quick thought
Content:
I have a friend named Sean. We had always seen things the same and had the same dark humor about it all. I always felt comfortable with him and as a kid I couldnâ€™t ask for more of a brother. Even more than my own brothers.
Well that ultimately ended with apparently all my relationships with my divorce. I just had a memory of when he was talking about driving to Michigan to visit a couple of his friends from when he was in the service. He drove over 600 miles to hang out with these guys, but a 20 minute drive to come and hang out with me is too much. Heâ€™s much to busy. Heâ€™s not in a position to just lose a few hours on me because of this and that now. Also, he is to busy for me to go there. Thatâ€™s what has killed me over the few years after my divorce.
My sister kind of summed it all up for me earlier when she said she understands why Patty couldnâ€™t deal with me and left because I seem to always want some acknowledgement.Â  Maybe she is right. I am stupid for thinking that even my own blood relationships should know me enough to see me suffering and hurting.
Over the last month I have contacted over 20 people and asked how they were. Just out of the blue I sent them texts or emails. Do you know how many did the same for me? 2 people who know me through Open Diary. No friends. No family. Not even the therapist I used to see and suddenly stopped going to has even touched base.
Â

Title: Almost, but not quite
Content:
I miss my job like I miss my wife. Both things that I shouldnâ€™t because I was never considered good enough by either. The world in the last 4 years has taken a baseball bat to my face.
I just want to be a drone and I did everything I could to stay that way. I worked hard and went above and beyond to just have that comfortable feel.
Now everything is slammed into me without stop. Race guilt, man guilt, covid, the shitty state of the US, cost of food, rent, bills, MGTOW, feminism, what women want vs what they say they want, losing friends, losing dreams, global warming, war, paying taxes to feed and take care of everyone but us here in this country,Â  being judged on how I am a father based on my financial involvement, being told that men should have feels, but made to feel like a shit because I do.
If I so much as did to anyone what they have done to me I would be ran out of town.
Â 
I donâ€™t want to be this guy I have become. I donâ€™t want to see and bitch about the unfairness of everything. I just wanted to go to the job I loved and lose myself there. Yes, I had some issues with my coworkers, but I also had a job where I could go and lose myself in things without the world taking a shit on me. Same with my little family bubble I had. I want a relationship with my boys other than trying to shove life lessons and good times along with forming them into men, in 1 or 2 days.
Iâ€™ve been left alone with nothing but the world. Just pouring on the Bull Shit of the woke craziness of today. Sure I can just shut it out. Turn of the internet. Read a book. Listen to the radio. Embrace the fact that I will probably never have a good friend or relationship ever again and live.
Do what I want, they say. I have no money. My job is gone and honestly a lot of the jobs being offered will essentially make me less money then the unemployment I get. It sounds so easy. Find a job. Yet, there is gas for the car to get there and of course the car. There is the fact my health is poor and I am hitting an age that, like it or not, getting a decent job probably wonâ€™t happen. Thereâ€™s the fact I can only see my kids on the weekend 9 months out if the year. I know, I know what I sound like and I also struggle constantly sounding like that.

Title: Itâ€™s January 4th
Content:
The day doesnâ€™t have any significance for me but I couldnâ€™t think of a title.
So I have become a victim of the Ozempic craze. I canâ€™t seem to find it anywhere around here at the moment. At least itâ€™s not an anxiety pill that you canâ€™t miss.
Iâ€™ve been forcing myself to think differently than I do. Pushing myself to give up the thoughts of family and relationships. My son called me out of the blue, which I donâ€™t really think was out of the blue, but Iâ€™ll take it. Itâ€™s harder than I thought because it also makes me realize I have a lot of trouble living in a moment. I long for the past and dread the future, but everyone Iâ€™ve allowed myself to exhaul, shit happens.
I was extremely comfortable in my marriage and then BOOM. I was enjoying my job and making plans then BOOM. I thought my friends would be there to help and BAM they just do the opposite. So thus whole live in the moment for me isnâ€™t going well. I feel like I havenâ€™t done enough eventhough I canâ€™t afford too. Itâ€™s raining and just a muddy snowy shit show outside so thereâ€™s nothing there. My dumbest had to move away from the kids, so itâ€™s not a quick jog from them.
Ugh

Title: Every night
Content: She haunts my dreams. Do you know what itâ€™s like trying and wanting to get past someone when every single night you dream of that person? Not lovely memories types of dreams or even new happy thoughts, but soul ripping nightmares. I have been cheated on, lied to, and left by her essentially thousands of times since January 2019.

Title: Hometown
Content:
I loved my hometown, Silver Creek, NY. I loved growing up here, partying here, falling in love here, and once upon a time living here.
Now, all it is, is a trigger. I am sitting here in the center of the village waiting for my son to get home and all I feel is disgust. Almost every memory is bow ruined by my divorce. All I wanted was to raise my kids here and now thatâ€™s never going to happen. Itâ€™s all some other personâ€™s dream.
I wanted to do so much for this place and now I canâ€™t stand even driving through it. I donâ€™t know what was said or done, but this village turned its back on me.

Title: Kinda hopeless
Content:
First thing. I want to say thank you and I so appreciate all of you who comment on my entries. I am trying to have something go right for all of you and myself.Â 
Also, I do read through your entries too. I just donâ€™t know what to say sometimes and I feel like I may sound like a hypocrite to give advice.
Â 
Today I woke up feeling kind of hopeless. Thoughts about my job forced themselves into my mind. I realize that there is a special hell for people, like me, who makes things so personal. Why did this happen? I work through covid, she didnâ€™t.Â  She toke several weeks off because of â€œcovid exposureâ€. I literally trained her to do her job, which I was doing for months before her. I busted my ass to keep the place going when the other guy broke several ribs and couldnâ€™t work. I worked overtime to keep our ability to issue dmv stuff and plates. All of this with no thanks, I guess I just answered the why.
I have applied to several jobs and havenâ€™t heard a peep. I finally found a therapist and after waiting weeks, got a half-hour talk that I personally feel did nothing for me.
I still put out calls and messages to what seems no one. I just got dinged for $35.75 because I was a day late on rent, which I told them I would be. The place that left me stranded in my apartment twice this winter. Yes, it was crazy weather and yes, I understand only so much can be done, but when you watch the building across the way get plowed and cleared twice when yours is still feet deep it bothers you. This past Christmas storm they never came, the neighbors and myself shoveled a passable path. So, do I say something and take the chance of eviction when I have shit for money, no job, and nowhere to go? No, I bend over and bite down.
But thatâ€™s me. Thatâ€™s all I have done in life. If you have read anything I have wrote, you know I have no backbone and I am nothing but a doormat for everyone and their brother. You see, when I have stood up for myself, itâ€™s all been turned back on to me. People who said I should turn around and tell me I shouldnâ€™t have.
So if I want to somehow make bad worse for me, I need to stand up for myself and lose what I have left. HOPELESSâ€¦

Title: There has to be a way
Content:
I remember a long time ago when I was a teenager that I couldnâ€™t wait to be an adult and on my own. I was going to go into the Airforce and make something of myself.
That didnâ€™t happen and I chose another path but I still remember. So why canâ€™t I get it wrapped around my head that itâ€™s ok, somewhat, to be in the situation Iâ€™ve been in for almost 4 years.
I want to claim bankruptcy, well I donâ€™t but itâ€™s kind of where things are at. The things is if I do and I lose everything I am in no real position to come back from it. I will lose the truck that is seriously getting to a point where itâ€™s going to break but is my only way to get anywhere and thatâ€™s the only thing keeping me from claiming.
How did I get in this spot? Why did I not fight for whatâ€™s mine? Why did I just concede? No wonder anybody doesnâ€™t want to be in my life, all they see is a loser. I just come off as a â€œpoor meâ€ bitch boy eventhough shit just keeps happening to me. I didnâ€™t lose my job, it was taken from me. I didnâ€™t lose my house, family, and relationships, they were taken or left. I do and have admitted my part, but thatâ€™s like saying I threw the rock in the ocean and then a wave crashed into an orphanage.

Title: Sins
Content:
Thought I would do a deep dive of myself today, sort of a confessional.

I am a liar, a cheat, and a thief. As far as how and who, letâ€™s just say everyone and leave it there.
I am a shit father, brother, and friend. I was a horrible son and husband.
I have lived most of my life being a victim to my own acts. I am lazy, I am narcissistic, and I cry out for attention instead of earning it.
I was a crap employee at pretty much any job I held. Never really doing more than I had to. I selfishly asked for more and did nothing to earn it.
I suck with money, always have. I spend for instant gratification and never think of a future. This is why Patty left me. I donâ€™t blame her.
I have nothing but opportunities to be with my kids and do things. I should have learned from Kaylaâ€™s death that thereâ€™s only so much time and opportunities to be a good father. Instead I allow the world and itâ€™s problems to hold me back.
I have only myself to blame for my weight and appearance. My health has suffered because I gave up on myself years ago.
