Worse of all, as I write this and confess all, I will most likely not do anything about it because I selfishly feel like the world and people in it owe me something. Thatâ€™s what I hate the most about me, I know better and was raised better, but I just do not care anymore.

Title: Friends
Content:
Beside the few of you here and my sons, I havenâ€™t heard from anyone since Thanksgiving and that was to reply to my greetings. Along with the ex I probably think of my friends at least once a day, whether or not I want to.
All the others who said they would be there arenâ€™t anymore either. Iâ€™m really starting to lose it here. I need a job but I canâ€™t bring myself to look. I have no want to once again learn a job. Iâ€™m the old guy now. Iâ€™m slow and hurt and canâ€™t keep up with people 20 years younger. My head is jumbled by the meds and I canâ€™t get an appointment to see anyone until March for that. Why is it they say seek help and when you do you have to wait months for it. In the meantime your going crazy.
I really wish someone cared enough back then to have me institutionalized. I really wish I would have.
Itâ€™s like I have totally forgot how to live anymore other than hiding out in my apartment. Everything changed in a day for me and itâ€™s like I was never there in anyoneâ€™s life 4 years ago.

Title: Itâ€™s been a long day
Content:
I just want to sit comfortably and not stress anymore. Mental issues, physical issues, financial issues, life issues, family issues. Itâ€™s never ending in my head. All I ever wanted throughout the last few years is someone close to just show me a little comfort and tell me itâ€™s ok, but itâ€™s gone to far now and everything is a mess in my head.
I literally worry about what others think when they donâ€™t think of me at all.
I keep thinking and waiting for things to change. Something to happen. Someone to happen. But it just seems to get worse.

Title: Bleeding from my ears
Content:
No, Iâ€™m not really bleeding, but with all the thoughts going on in my head it feels as if my head will explode at anytime.
I tried to watch a YouTube about God taking bad people out of your life, well not bad but damaging. IDK, I saw the title and saw that the time was 11:11. I have been catching that time a lot lately.Â  Some say itâ€™s a sign.Who knows?
So anyway, here it is again 11:11 and here is a video about how God works in mysterious ways, so why not. Right off the bat it became clear that this was a Uber far left/right religious thing. I mean I am a Lutheran and I believe and know that God makes a push here and there, but for the most part itâ€™s a freewill kind of thing. This guy was going all â€œthese are demons that God has saved you fromâ€. I hate what Patty did to me, but I donâ€™t consider her a demon.
Honestly, I donâ€™t quite understand what lesson Iâ€™m supposed to learn from all this. I mean what is lesson to be learned when you lose the person you loved for 20 years in what seemed to be over the course of one day? What is the lesson when that person, from that point on, treats you like you are a stranger? What is the lesson when your family and friends walk away from you when you needed them the most? What is the lesson when you lose your job eventhough you have gone above and beyond for it?
I have lost all the dreams I have had since I dreamt them. No, at 16, 17, I didnâ€™t dream of having a family and being a father, but when I got my first ex pregnant, all I wanted was to be just that. Yet, I didnâ€™t get to raise my daughter like she deserved to be and now the same with my boys. Infact, they were and are being raised by another man. It doesnâ€™t matter how good he does it, the point is they are mine to raise and it seem as if she, the world, and God wants me not to.
Besides that, I am old. Not busted old, but oddly old. My values are wrong for the modern world and now as I try to find yet another job I have to compete with 2 younger generations who understand it all so much better.
I just feel like a dusty keepsake that has no use, but you canâ€™t bring yourself to throw out.

Title: I guess itâ€™s me.
Content:
Eventhough they lied to me, cheated on me, broke their promises, and left me, itâ€™s all my fault.
Let me be straight, I realize that i had to have a role in it all too, but nothing compared to what was done to me and yet I am treated like I am to blame.
Let me rephrase that, for almost every bad thing that has befallen me, has always been my fault. They cheat, my fault. They lie, my fault. They force me out and take everything and leave me with nothing, my fault. Things donâ€™t go their way after they leave, my fault.
As I said, I know that I could be difficult at times, everyone is.
IDK, it is probably all my fault. I pushed all of them away because I wasnâ€™t who they wanted me to be.
Everything is a mess. I canâ€™t win either way.

Title: Emotions
Content:
Ever since my â€œbreakingâ€ after she left, I havenâ€™t been able to control my emotions. Some say that this is healthy, but it goes well beyond a healthy thing for me.
I want to talk to people about things, but u instantly start to blubber and tear up. 4 years and the mention of Patty or the boys sets me on a crash course of intense feelings I canâ€™t control.
This happens constantly. Anywhere. Anytime.Â  I can be in a professional situation and something said or heard, I begin to lose it. Itâ€™s almost disabling.
I could use a win. Something. How does one gain confidence when everything falls apart on an almost daily basis?

Title: Weekend Visitation
Content:
I wish I could put into word how empty I feel after taking one or all of my boys home. You would think that after how long it has been since the end of my marriage, it would be east, but itâ€™s not. For 5 days, sometimes more, I live in a dark, stale, lonely apartment and for 1 or 2 days it comes to life with my children. It happens so fast that I canâ€™t grab it and hold it and once again I come home to nothing.
I see the life at what was once my home. I see the dreams I shared happening, but without me. Once again I am dragged back to not knowing why or what I did wrong. The boys are young and donâ€™t understand that I need that one more hug, that few more seconds with them.
Then comes the â€œgreat silenceâ€ of the next several hours. No one calls, no one answers, but I need to talk, I need to feel not so alone, so worthless. Iâ€™ve told people this, close people, but still they just choose to not be burdened with me.
I understand it. Itâ€™s my problem, not theirs. They all chose from day 1 to not involve themselves in my hurts and pains, and they have clearly shown and told me this several times in the past 4 years, but I walk myself right back into the minefield.
I want to escape my head. I never like drinking and when I have, I always stopped when the â€œfuzzinessâ€ started. The â€œcontrol freakâ€ in me will not allow me to smoke Marijuana. I tried that too and if there was a high, I mentally ruined it.
Fuck, Iâ€™m a messâ€¦

Title: Was it right or wrong?
Content:
Iâ€™ve been bopping back and forth with a potential job. At first the money lured me into considering it, but I ultimately turned it down.
It was selling accidental death insurance. Personally I think that it is a very good company. There was also hospital stay payments like Afflec offers. Over all 4 sales a week would gave making more money then I have ever made.
On the other side though, I would have to get an insurance license, which would be around $400 and since I donâ€™t have one, a decent lap top, so another $500ish. The job is 100% commission, no draw, so no sale, no money.
I decided that I am too old with too many problems to do something like this. Also, unemployment is weird and if I took this job it would screw it all up and then I would be SOL. There was a very scared little boy in me afraid of change that is too afraid to take this much of a risk too.
So I passed on it, for what I really thought and considered good reasons. Now I am sitting here feeling like a failure once again.

Title: Not happy
Content:
I found myself starting to hate me last night. Not a I wish I was dead kind of hate, but a I hate what I have become hate.
Letâ€™s get something, I never really knew what it was I wanted to be. I was just a carefree kid until I wasnâ€™t.
As most are aware here, I just wanted a family. Wanted to raise my kids traditionally. I spent years building that dream for my ex, them, and myself. Then I was pushed away from all of it.
I guess instead of stepping aside for the benefits of my children and my unfortunate love of me ex, I should have got fight into the mud and fought for what I wanted no matter who got hurt.
I did what I thought a loving person should and I have been reminded daily that I fucked up. I already know I couldnâ€™t win either way.
So what happened last night? It finally hit me I am no longer my kidâ€™s father. I mean I am biologically their father, but Iâ€™m a really good friend. Not quite a best friend, but the friend you know you can totally count on.
On its surface that sounds like a great relationship, but thereâ€™s a huge difference to feeling your dad is your father then just dad.
I guess in the end itâ€™s all my fault. Not being able to co-parent with Patty. Not standing up for myself.

Title: Failure
Content:
Iâ€™ve just realized I have really failed at life and itâ€™s all my fault. Itâ€™s become clear to me for some reason this morning.Â  Itâ€™s not like I had a Scrooge night where I awoke and seen the errors of my way and will strive to overcome it. I woke up and finally had the realization its been me all along and itâ€™s too late.
I canâ€™t repair my relationships. Iâ€™ll never be who I wanted, with the people I wanted. Iâ€™ve burnt down the forest and I complain that there is no shade. The apologies havenâ€™t worked. The mending hasnâ€™t worked. I am forced into the only forward that I have never been able to be. Alone.
I am pitied by my own children and they are all I have left.

Title: Talk
Content:
Itâ€™s so hard to want to talk and then to realize the only person you can call to actually talk to, is the crisis hot line.
Â

Title: Down
Content:
You know, trying to â€œsee the goodâ€ and accepting â€œlifeâ€ is hard, well for me.
I canâ€™t accept myself anymore. Worst of all, I donâ€™t remember when I became so ugly and unappealing. I think I have answered my own questions on why people donâ€™t talk to me in public and I always feel like some creepy old guy.
I just donâ€™t like my looks. The old man ugly stick hit me hard. It didnâ€™t help that my ex left me for a man who is almost 10 years older than me.
I find myself just wanting to accept that my time has come and go and I hope that I can find a job where I no longer have to deal with anyone.

Title: I donâ€™t know what to say
Content:
Iâ€™m in a weird place right now. Around this time 4 years ago my life ended, well the only life I wanted ended.
I donâ€™t understand relationships or people for all that matters.Â  I failed as a father to all my children. I selfishly took the â€œgood guyâ€ path and itâ€™s cost me so much. Maybe if I was more present in Kaylaâ€™s life she would still be here, never had the accident that made her last 10years difficult.
My boys donâ€™t call me with problems or concerns. Iâ€™m the last person on the list to hear about rewards or events.
I sit alone too afraid and guilty to live life any different then how I lived as a married man. Iâ€™ve been stuck this way 4 years, no matter what Iâ€™ve tried. I had a speck of possibility with my job, but that was ripped from me too.
At this point I want someone to see Iâ€™m a mess and have me committed or take conservativeship over me for a while to help me get right or not. Things have all gone out of control and all that would have helped was just someone, someone to have taken my side, seen me descending into my madness that haunts me now.
I canâ€™t see the good in things anymore. The warm breeze blows on me and I only can think of the bugs. My kid gets an award and I realize that several others knew before me. I go to therapy and get 45 minutes to talk and have to wait 2 weeks to do it again when I need someone every day to help me.
Itâ€™s the loneliness I know. Thereâ€™s a big difference between loneliness and being alone.

Title: The urge
Content:
So right now Iâ€™m sitting in my truck outside my sonâ€™s â€œkarateâ€ studio. I donâ€™t normally take him or pick him up, so this is still a little new. They donâ€™t allow the parents to crowd around inside, so if your first thought was why I am not in there, thatâ€™s why.
Anyway since my brain is wired wrong, all I want to do is be back with Patty. Back with my family, living that life. Knowing that at the end of this sitting in a cold truck in the dark will end with family togetherness instead of the harsh reality of dropping him off and back to my hole.
I want to text her and talk, but thereâ€™s no point. Just knowing how it all ended haunts me into knowing she was completely done with me, not even enough left to respect me.
I realize that is my problem and it always has been. Acknowledgement, needing to know Iâ€™m ok with others. Sure I can pick apart all 20 years with her and find this and that, that could have lead her to do this to me. Whether or not itâ€™s right or wrong, she did it to me. The one person, besides my parents, who I believed whole heartedly wouldnâ€™t hurt me.
How do you come back? What did I do so horrible that she disregarded me so much? She literally forced a new man in the kids life and let the world know it and somehow is the â€œheroâ€ of this story. I guess I would be different if I fell right back into a new relationship with a fresh financial start. I just never figured her for that kind of person who would push me off a cliff for a chance at something better.
I have this all in my head too. The loss and anger. I know I have to â€œget betterâ€, but Iâ€™m holding myself back. Seriously, itâ€™s like seeing the air while under water and needing to breathe, but I just keep my head underwater and I have absolutely no clue why.

Title: Insomnia ramblings
Content:
Yes, I have said a lot of this in the past, but itâ€™s almost 2am and my brain wonâ€™t stop, so I am working it out here.
This unemployment on top of depression has caused me to become an insomniac. Even more than normal. Yes thereâ€™s been a couple days that I have slept through a day instead of doing something productive. Recently though, Iâ€™ve had something going on with my gut, IBS, infection, or something is wrong with my innards. All I know is I just canâ€™t get comfortable and when I absolutely tired, I sleep. Of course I canâ€™t see any one until Feb 27, so there you go. Yes I am eating healthy. Yes I am drinking plenty of water. Yes Iâ€™ve stopped taking medicines that may aggravate it.
I am tired of being judged and treated like a shit father by the people whose actions put my in this spot. You know, maybe if they didnâ€™t nuke my life for their own needs or guilt, things would be better. Maybe I could be a better father if they didnâ€™t take almost every thing I built and saved for over 20+ years and leave me with the bills. You throw someone in a hole and yell at them because they are in it.
Why is the world so unfair? I built my life. The life I deserve,Â  the life I wanted. Then in a blink, a man who just fucked his up for 30+ years, gets my everything.Â  Sure, Patty had a lot to do with it, but you would think lying adulterous person would be the one punished in the â€œeyes of Godâ€, but no. She has a fresh start, a church wedding, and friends all rallying around here, while I have struggled for 4 years to get through a day without losing it. Yes, the man who spent his first 20 years going to church almost religiously. The man who did the right thing marrying the girl he got pregnant in high school. The man who insisted on having all 5 of his children baptized. That guy has been broken, left, ignored, forgotten, and unappreciated by almost everyone he held dear a mere 4 years ago. Whereâ€™s my Ying for yang, my tit for tat? Nope, itâ€™s just lose, lose, and lose some more.
Ok. I have more â€œwork to doâ€ but Iâ€™ve done a lot over the last 3 years and all I have to show for it is an apartment I may lose in a couple months. Laid off from a job where I busted my ass and literally saved it from going out of business. A truck that is possibly going to just blow up at anytime. No close friends to check in on me. No women interested in getting to know me. Hell, not even a person at the grocery store willing to have a conversation. My kids look at me as just a friend that they are happy to see occasionally, but not someone they are willing to change plans for.
IDK
Maybe I am the miserable fuck who knowingly sabotaged his only life, relationships, and employment.aybe everyone else has it right and I really am the problem.

Title: Inconvenience
Content:
I donâ€™t think I have ever known someone who is more of an inconvenience to people like I am or how I am made to feel. Last summer as I was going through the scary possibility of having bladder cancer, it was nothing but an inconvenience to ask anyone to drive me to and from the hospital as I went through 2 procedures,Â  let alone to be bothered to even check on my wellbeing.
That brings us to today. I mentioned I have been dealing with a stomach thing. When I finally got to sleep, I woke and I was shivering.Â  I never get cold like this, 2 huge blankets and I canâ€™t get warm. I feel like I may give birth to a rock at the moment. My sister canâ€™t be bothered to change her plans to stop by and Patty, well she just thinking I am making it all up. My two youngest that are with me this weekend seem to sense Iâ€™m not ok, but I want to be with them for what little time I get, so Iâ€™m going to remember this when the ask comes from people. In a ditch? Feeling faint? Sorry, canâ€™t be bothered.

Title: Guess what
Content:
So once again my â€œlucky hits home. I am being put out of my apartment. Not evicted, but told to leave by not renewing my lease. Seems I should have read the lease I signed in November, which I thought was just the same I signed 2 years in a row, but no. They changed the terms to month by month. So I guess they are pushing out over half the tenants to â€œrenovateâ€ all the apartments and apparently I am one.
Here I am, unemployed and soon to be homeless and no where to go. There are absolutely no places affordable and they all want credit checks and proof of income and well, Iâ€™m screwed.
Do I have standards? Yes, I will not just find a shithole that is affordable.
I donâ€™t know what Iâ€™m going to do.

Title: End of January
Content:
So pretty much around the day I was told â€œI donâ€™t love you anymoreâ€ 4 years ago, I was told we donâ€™t want you here anymore. You would think that at age 51 a man would understand that it doesnâ€™t matter what he does shit still happens to people. Some more than others. I spent 20 years being the best husband, father, brother, and friend and it didnâ€™t matter. I paid rent on time, even through covid, for over 3 years and it didnâ€™t matter. The jobs I busted my ass for, gone.
Iâ€™ve tried to roll with the punches, really I have, but when life has puts you in a corner itâ€™s way too hard. I want to be the cool no worries guy. I want the world to burn down and be able to sit there with a marshmallow and enjoy the colors. I canâ€™t though. Itâ€™s easy for employed people to tell me itâ€™s easy to get a job. Itâ€™s easy for attached people to tell me that love will find me. Itâ€™s easy for home owners to tell me to just get a new apartment.
Oh, and for you people keeping score, I told my sister. As I guessed, the first thing she said is â€ I donâ€™t have any money, what do you think I can doâ€¦â€ I didnâ€™t ask for money or help, I needed to talk. Also, this has now turned into â€œyou did something wrongâ€ situation. Just like my divorce was my fault to everyone and my job loss was all my fault, I must have done something to lose my lease.
I seriously have to give up thinking someone will just come around and just cheer me up.

Title: Write to write
Content:
I suck at life. Iâ€™ve finally have come to a point where I canâ€™t right the ship anymore. Iâ€™d say I burnt my bridges, but they burnt themselves down. I weakly took the easy path in life and hand â€œmeâ€ over to my ex and our family. I havenâ€™t been â€œmeâ€ since 1987 before Vikki, the first ex.
I was constantly saved from my fuckups. By my parents and others. I just sucked for all these years. I had Patty as my security blanket always there to make feel like there was hope I would pull it together. No, I wasnâ€™t an anchor on her, I did my part for us, but I was worried about not having â€œthe momentsâ€ and having stuff instead of the real security of savings and planning. I decided that that was my life. Her and the kids until my last breath.
She just wouldnâ€™t talk about what she felt bad about, letting resentment build in her. I would have done anything. I threw myself into making her and the kids happy and comfortable. I threw myself into the house and yard, making it safe and enjoyable. She took it all and left me with nothing.Â  This woman who up to the second said she loved me, said she was happy, said she cared, had turned on me with such a vengeance that just seems to get worse for the years we havenâ€™t been together. She made me into a villain so throughly that she refuses to even remember we had a great life. Sure there was money issues and yes I will admit I wasnâ€™t the most sunny person to live with for a stretch. I had lost a child who I had really failed to be a good father to. All Kayla wanted was to be my daughter and know she loved me and I blew it. She died because of injuries she got 10 years before in a car accident that would not have happened if I would have just agreed with Vikki when she wanted to send her to me because things were out of control in California. But things between her and Patty were tense and I took Patty side. We were just about to close on our home and were living with my parents and I told Vikki not right now, we have to get settled. Kayla never came to stay with us as just a normal girl again. After the accident, after the hospital stay and the little rehab she got, I came to bring her home to me. She thrived at the school special ed and exceeded all the goals and then turned into a teenager. Her and Patty fought, not violent things, verbal. Oil and water. Long story short, Vikki had moved from the â€œtrouble areaâ€ to New Mexico and a new start and Kayla wanted to go back.
A couple years later she came back to stay and the first night they had a fight, verbal, about going out so late, I worked nights, and Kayla took off. Well, stupid me decided she needed a real world experience and honestly in Silver Creek she couldnâ€™t fart without someone letting me know.
Point is, I should have been a better father. I should have worked with her and Patty to get along better. I didnâ€™t and now sheâ€™s gone. That weighed in me, but we didnâ€™t talk about it, I didnâ€™t want Patty to feel uncomfortable.Â  Then all the crap with my mother falling into dementia and how I experienced my last few year with her as I became â€œa horrible fuck who shouldnâ€™t have been bornâ€.
So yeah, I was depressed and questioning who I was, what I did, what I didnâ€™t do, how to make life better for her and the kids. I was bottling up the feelings I shouldnâ€™t and whining about â€œwhat ifsâ€ All the while she seemed to want to be there for me or at least I thought she was. She didnâ€™t need to talk to me, just her being there was all I needed. Maybe you could say, she was the lock that kept the closet in my head closed and when she turned on me, 48 years of pushing all the pain and sadness down came rushing out and somehow I turned into a narcissistic whining bitch boy according to everyone. EVERYONE.
This entry has totally gone off the rails from what I intended, but it does show where my head and heart are at.
I just donâ€™t know what to do and essentially because Iâ€™m 51 and man, everyone makes me feel like a dumb fuck because Iâ€™m lost and I canâ€™t keep up with the losses. I am typing on a phone at 1am trying to make myself understand and somehow find that one thing to grab on to to start the change. That one thing to make it right. The one thing I donâ€™t trust anymore. After the separation, I through myself into the job I had at the time and was â€œdismissedâ€ because I didnâ€™t have a degree to do the job I had done for close to 4 years. BOOM, back to the bottom. So after living on food stamps and 2 unemployment checks before they (the job) fought to pay. I find my last job, I learn the job even when I felt as though I was being talked down to. I bust my ass to be more than they need. This was my change. I screw up the nice covid unemployment pay day by figuring out a loop hole to reopen because the big guys down south wanted us to stay open. I fix 3 years of the woman I came to â€œfill inâ€ for DMV mistakes and also discover along the way she was stealing from them. I train her replacement and stay on because I was the cover guy who could do all the jobs and the problem solver. This was mine, the first thing I had on my own, alone. Never took any time off that wasnâ€™t necessary like the â€œcancer scareâ€ last summer. I did all my work and the other guys work for 2 months because he broke 5 ribs without so much as a thank you. 3 days before Thanksgiving BOOM. Job ripped from me, back to hole. So I decide to take the â€œunemployment timeâ€ to fix me, get healthy, take some time to either go back or find something I would enjoy doing. I spent most of my life taking what came along. I almost finally get comfortable and not feeling guilty or wrong for being on the system BOOM, I am out of an apartment now.
Iâ€™ve know this for 3 days now and do you know how next to impossible it is to find an apartment? I am unemployed with shit credit because I canâ€™t afford to pay on the credit cards. Even the shit places wants a credit check, who cares if I can make my rent. Oh and rent, it will take atleast $1000 down to get even the cheapest studio.
So what have I learned and why have I written this entry? I suck. I am a 51 year old â€œmommas boyâ€ without a momma or a momma stand in. I never took being me seriously like I did being Pattyâ€™s husband and the kidâ€™s father. I have no social skills or a common balanced mind to work lifeâ€™s problems out on my own. I have no more filter on my emotions and canâ€™t even mention her name or our family without becoming a blubbering idiot. I see 51 as a crutch and how I will be judged too old for everything,Â  except knee replacement which I desperately need. My end plans are all gone and literally given to another man who did nothing to deserve it other than take advantage of a woman who was questioning things.
I just canâ€™t see me coming back from this anymore and itâ€™s bringing my thoughts back to the dark place I was in for months in 2019 after the separation. Iâ€™m starting to not care anymore and feeling like no one around here cares.

Title: Need help
Content:
So, I got a call about a new apartment, itâ€™s just a showing, then application, and hope that the ownerâ€™s approval.
Yeah, it does seem hopeless based on my current karma, life, and fate issue.
As you can probably tell, Iâ€™ve been on the outs with God for some time now. Iâ€™m angry that these â€œtestsâ€ seem to keep coming for 4 years straight and the scales never seem to balance. I need prayers, could use money, and definitely help moving. I canâ€™t ask people for 2 or 3, but if you can put in a word or two to the man upstairs, Allah,Â  Budda, or Tom Cruise and help me turn my luck around.
The place itself will be challenging. Itâ€™s back in Silver Creek where â€œsheâ€ is and all the other Heartbreakers. But itâ€™s extremely affordable that unemployment can actually pay for it and itâ€™s walking distance for the boys to come over anytime and thatâ€™s all that matters to me going forward, but I will still bitch and moan hereâ€¦

Title: Brain is doing it again
Content:
I donâ€™t think I ever learned how to stay in an upbeat mood. I was all good until 5 minutes ago and it just snuck in. The doubt, loneliness,Â  and pure terror I feel about being me. Itâ€™s like someone just through a weighted blanket over me and not in that relaxing huggy way, more like a scary suffocating way. My mind has instantly been thrown into panic mode at 9:30 at night when there isnâ€™t anything I can do about anything.
I wasnâ€™t lying when I said that the ex was the only person or thing that helped me not dread like this. I told my therapist last week I wish I could shut down and have someone live my life for me for a week or two, to get it back on track for me. Iâ€™m at the frustrated lash out and make it all worse stage.
When it gets like this, I canâ€™t regulated my head. No music, meditation, or activity helps. I know it passes, but it sucks so bad getting through. This is where a nice chat would help. I really wish I was a bar person. Not sure if it would help, the world has made me feel like a creep lately when I attempt to talk to another. God I miss cigarettes.

Title: Just a little bitchinâ€™
Content:
Why canâ€™t people answer texts? I get asked to do something and I say ok, but when or where, what time.
And
Nothing. Iâ€™ve sat here for over an hour waiting on an answer. I know if I ask again then all Hell breaks loose. But, the other way around, I get read the riot act for not responding.
Â

Title: Wednesday Feb. 1
Content:
Well itâ€™s been a day. Looked at the studio apartment near the boys. It will definitely be a change from having a bedroom. I have no flair for decorating so I canâ€™t imagine what it will look like if I get it. IDK, I donâ€™t live a life where I just sleep, shit, and shower and go. Honestly I donâ€™t live any kind of life, I exist.
The whole reason like I said is to see the boys more, but how and where will they sleep? I guess I can have them hang out during the afternoon and then take them home. I just feel at an age where stuffing myself into a studio apartment will make me feel worse about myself. I know, thatâ€™s stupid.
I hate the way my brain is wired and I wish I could finally flow with life. I feel like I have to be forgiven for all of this, like itâ€™s all my fault. I canâ€™t make peace with the fact that this is who I am now. Iâ€™m a father to kids I canâ€™t be with 24/7.
Â 
Any way, there maybe a chance to get a place in Fredonia. About 15 miles away. The people who own this place owns some up there and I may be able to get in with just rent and not rent and deposit. I mean, honestly I see their side of it all. These apartments need updating. The timing just sucks.
The job search? Not great.

Title: Me in all my Fester glory
Content:
I decided to let you all see the sad guy who writes here. This picture took several attempts and Iâ€™m still not happy with it.
Iâ€™ve never really been alright with how I look. Iâ€™ve been skinny and I been (am) fat. I now have a double chin turkey neck and have successfully stretched my body so that when I do loose significant weight I will have loose hanging skin.
Yes, I know the man who can confidently be beyond this can be an obese mess but still attract people towards them. I also know that handsome men will be approached more and people will be more likely to respond to when you just say hello.
IDK. Iâ€™m probably wrong. Just had to get the thought out.

Title: The struggle
Content:
For the last several days I have been really trying to rethink life. Accept that what I had and wanted is gone for good. Even if I could go back to her and fix our family, itâ€™s gone. So, Iâ€™m trying to figure out how to remake me.
I want to stop worrying. Seriously,Â  I worry about EVERYTHING. The news doesnâ€™t help, the internet doesnâ€™t help.
I want to stop feeling so guilty about things I had no control over. This whole divorce and all the fallout it has caused has left me feeling like itâ€™s all my fault. No one, absolutely no one, has made any sort of effort to regret their part in it all. People have said some very hurtful damagingÂ  things to me when it was apparent I was (am) suffering with all of this. Iâ€™ve said it before, all I ever wanted was a hug and â€œitâ€™s ok, Iâ€™m here for you.â€
Now, I just want to live alone from almost everyone. I want to be the man I remember my great uncle Bob was. Just laid back. Morning was a cup of coffee and a smoke. Some gardening, some puttering, a visit down at the bar. Now, I know there was so much more in his life. Good, bad, and all. Itâ€™s just the peaceful man he became. I want to find that peace.
I want to find a certain type of job before I have to take anything. I essentially want something that I can do alone with minimal management. And, I donâ€™t want it to come home with me. I almost had that with my last one. I could lose myself in my office,Â  deal with my customers or go outside and do inventory or organize stock and I never once was told what to do. Of course as I unfortunately found out, it didnâ€™t matter to anyone or appreciated by anyone, because all my efforts didnâ€™t mean dick when they put me out.
The hardest things will be giving up some technologies if I can. This phone and all the shit it does for one.
Iâ€™ve been working on accepting some very hard truths in the world, especially todayâ€™s world. I will probably never have another romantic relationship. I will have to be a divorced father to my kids. All the dreams I had are dead and gone and any thing I can think of now is way out of reach and not very possible. People will still use me and leave me. I any way I play it, Iâ€™m always going to be wrong.

Title: Fâ€™n Sundays
Content:
Yep, here I am again after the boys are dropped off at home. It just seems to be coming from all directions today. Them, the apartment search, the unemployment, and Patty.
Shit of it is, I can reason in my head about all of it, but then like a dog seeing a squirrel, I take my eyes off and boom, it all rushes in.
I just need a win. Something. The dating sites are playing the â€œlikesâ€ thing where they send you a email that you have so many likes and of course anything less than $29.99 you canâ€™t see anything about them.
Â

Title: Why canâ€™t I get past.
Content:
All I wanted to do was watch A man called Otto. I had no clue it was what it was. Sure the ads made it seem like heâ€™s a grumpy old man who becomes a nice man, but they didnâ€™t show the love and loss story.
Not to spoil it, but I couldnâ€™t finish it. It hurt too much. No my situation has nothing to do with the characterâ€™s loss, but itâ€™s the same feelings. His thoughts and actions about the loss are exactly how I feel about mine.
Yes thereâ€™s a difference between the characterâ€™s and mine, but if you see the movie you will understand how tough itâ€™s been for me and how itâ€™s still hurts.
Of course, I donâ€™t have the neighbors or others around me as he does to help him see past his hurt.

Title: The quiet
Content:
Itâ€™s all weighing on me tonight.Â  The almost hopeless apartment search, the unemployment, my health (Iâ€™m not sick, just fat and disgusting), my kids donâ€™t ever call me, not hearing from anyone, and wanting to talk to Patty about it all.
I know the answers to all of the concerns and I know what I have to do. Iâ€™m just feeling the heaviness of everything and I just want something to make me feel ok to happen.
I just want to be told Iâ€™m going to be ok, but Iâ€™m not. Not with all this happening. I want to somehow just have that Oprah, Dr. Phil type of rescue. I just want someone to take control of me so I can just breathe.
I have to figure out how and where I can live. My options are closing quickly. I have to not pay rent here so I can pay rent somewhere else. The deposits and rents people are asking for are horrible.

Title: Waiting
Content:
Iâ€™m still waiting to hear about the studio apartment I looked at back in Silver Creek. Itâ€™s becoming a bit unbearable for me. My anxiety is back to levels I thought I was over. I should pack things or throw stuff out. I canâ€™t touch any savings until I hear something so I canâ€™t get a storage place yet. Most of my stuff is probably going to get donated. Thereâ€™s no way it will fit in this place. I have to get rid of my bed, itâ€™s way to big. I broke my rule about accumulating things and itâ€™s going to be a bitch moving it all by myself.
Somewhere in me there is a voice telling me to get up and go do something, anything, but itâ€™s lost in the hopeless dread Iâ€™m feeling right now. All those people who called me a loser and Patty leaving me because of financial difficulties are being proven right. I am an unemployed, no savings, broke and soon to be homeless nothing, just like they all said and thought of me. I tried, I really tried. I never asked or begged for help or money from anyone. I sacrificed to keep the lights on and car running. I did my job well and never complained to them, maybe here, but not there. I been a quiet renter, even when I was literally stuck in my place for days. I clean, I organize, I attempt to care for myself alone. But here I am in what is starting to feel like a no win situation.

Title: Legacy
Content:
The hard truth is I donâ€™t really mean anything to anyone and Iâ€™ve never made any sort of impact on anyoneâ€™s lives.
My sons have live for me, I am their biological father after all, but they donâ€™t need me or rely on me. I donâ€™t get â€œguess whatâ€ calls from them. Iâ€™ve never had one of them come out and say they really miss me at home. Maybe itâ€™s a testament to how good Patty is as a mother and how better her husband is as a father for them.
I must be what everyone thinks I am. A loser, a horrible father and friend, a terrible partner, a shit brother, and a lousy human being. Patty dumped me out of her life so completely itâ€™s like I was never part of it. I would guess she wishes I wasnâ€™t the boyâ€™s father either.
She right, I donâ€™t deserve to be their father. I havenâ€™t been able to pay support since I lost my job. I donâ€™t actively participate in the boys lives. They come for a night or two and we donâ€™t do anything. I should have fought Patty tooth and nail in the separation and divorce, but instead I surrendered to the hurt, betrayal, and anger and have totally allowed it to slowly ruin me for 4 years to a point where I almost donâ€™t want to live anymore.
Thereâ€™s been no good side to this divorce. I donâ€™t have a new relationship or friends who come around. The one thing I managed to have was ripped away, like everything else, in November. And now, I have no where to go after I leave this place.
Seriously, the cheapest place besides the studio I looked at, is over $900. I canâ€™t get that much money together to move in any time soon. If I do find a job, I need to make atleast $19 â€“ 20 an hour to even pay all my monthly bills and child support. I was hard pressed when I was worked and I was making a salary that amounted to $22 an hour. Iâ€™m fuckedâ€¦
There are no programs for a poor guy who is single, unless I go balls into it. Fully homeless and addicted to something. Morbidly obese where I canâ€™t walk or function. I have tried. Iâ€™m on unemployment and I still make too much for food stamps or most every assistance program. I managed to get insurance that is affordable, but Iâ€™ve already been told twice that they wonâ€™t cover things that my other did.
Itâ€™s a steep cliff I have to climb and I donâ€™t know how to be a good father, friend, and sibling while I need to climb. Itâ€™s been 4 years, no one cares anymore. They never have. I donâ€™t wonder how I will be remembered,Â  I just know I wonâ€™t be.
I realize that there are people out there so much worse off than me, who face each day with a smile and lay down with a prayer every night. I obviously canâ€™t. I know I have to, but I canâ€™t. I know I blame and I know complaining doesnâ€™t do shit.
I guess I donâ€™t know what I want anymore. Iâ€™ve had it a couple times and as soon as I was comfortable enough to believe I could trust it, I lost it all. I will never again have the opportunity to raise a family,Â  not how want to. No I have to do this divorced, weekend shit thing because my heart and soul canâ€™t allow me to be around the life I made and had to give away. Iâ€™m not Bruce Willis who can hang with the ex and her man and still be awesome about things. She didnâ€™t allow for any of that doing what she did and yet, she uses it against me. They all do. My hurt, pain, and loss are just weapons that people use against me. To hurt me. To belittle me. To show me how much better they are then me. To tell everyone who will listen that I am nothing because of my reaction to it all.
I want to build a new life on the anger, for me to be selfish like all of them. I canâ€™t.Â  I worry about shit that doesnâ€™t happen, wonâ€™t happen, and didnâ€™t happen. I feel so God awful guilty if I do anything for myself because of others. I canâ€™t accept a notion that as my sons get older they will want me in their lives other than a holiday.
Â 
Itâ€™s all just me. I have created this Hell I am stuck in. My thoughts and fears. My sense of time and life. My stupid hopes and dreams. My actions or lack of them. I thought I played the game right. I stayed loyal, I worked hard, I sacrificed living a life for just me alone to make others happy. I spent my days wondering how to make her comfortable and secure. What I could do for the kids to give them a childhood like I had. I didnâ€™t make selfish decisions based on â€œyou only have one life and only so much timeâ€ and because I didnâ€™t,Â  everyone has used me and never once apologized or tried to make it up to me. Instead Iâ€™m told to suck it up, get over it and thatâ€™s life. Iâ€™ve never once thrown someone under the bus for my advancement or needs, yet Iâ€™ve become part of the pavement for them.
So I guess thatâ€™s how I will be remembered, if at all, as the easiest mark to use to get ahead. Oh that loser who we lied to and cheated over. That guy who did all that stuff to make our job easier. That idiot who spent years making a home and family for me to slide into.
I think Iâ€™m done with it all. I donâ€™t know, I guess weâ€™ll see how the rest of today plays out.

Title: Thursday night
Content:
Iâ€™ll try to not turn this into the regular poor me post. I just have to write, I guess if I actually had someone to sit down with I wouldnâ€™t be writing.
So Iâ€™m once again having the urge to write Patty. It wonâ€™t make a difference and it wonâ€™t change anything. Itâ€™s been me all along thinking things are different or not what it seems. Yeah, it hurts that she did what she did and how she did. But, she did it. Most of my issues come down to me not feeling like anyone cares. She doesnâ€™t have to love me, no one has to, but I donâ€™t understand hers and others attitudes towards me.
It makes me laugh when i think back then when I was spiraling into a dark, dark place I was told people donâ€™t know what to say, so they day and do nothing. Four years later, I should be over it and not mention it.
I have flashes of a new life. I have allowed the thoughts to come to me about it all. I see a man I want to be going forward. Yet, I am weighed down by all of the shit thatâ€™s come to pass.
How do you take it day by day when you have no real support in actual life? I have tried to get help (social services), they have all refused because I make too much in unemployment.
How do you move on (financially) when ots all stacked against you from the start? Yes, I was stupid for giving her everything. I did so because I thought she may have remembered I never did anything wrong and things werenâ€™t as bad as she thought. I thought she cared enough, even with the lost love, that she didnâ€™t want me to suffer as I have.
She doesnâ€™t. If she does, then she refuses to allow it.
People here know me and they know I am not a horrible man. They know I made her and the boys my world. It still hurts that not one person stood up for me. Not one person held her accountable, instead they took the fact that I lost my mind about it as I deserved it all.
Whatever. Itâ€™s done. My actions or lack of them has proven everyone correct. They donâ€™t want to see or understand what I have been through or how life seems to toss me endless amounts of curve balls. I hear shit from people, who have had jobs for 20+ years, that itâ€™s must be my fault, I lost my job. I did something to lose my lease.
When it happens to them itâ€™s a cruel horrible happening. They all lift each other up when it gets tough.
When itâ€™s been me, itâ€™s all just an attention asking narcissistic made up bull shit thing.
Â

Title: Gutting out my life.
Content:
I have just made a standing order with the Salvation Army to donate a ton of stuff. My couch, chair, end tables, coffee table, and bed. Why? Because 1, I have no one to help me move and thereâ€™s no way to afford help. 2, Chances are Iâ€™m going to have to find a studio place or worse, sleep in my truck. I can probably afford a small storage place for odd boxes and stuff. I worry about moving the tvs. Yes somehow I have wound up with 2 big flat screens. I donâ€™t do FB so no marketplace and have no clue how to do Craigslist. There was another, I just canâ€™t remember the name.
Even with all that being donated, I feel I still have too much. I would love to just load up my clothes and some pictures and leave in the night. Leave all the shit for the land lord. I wish I could find that man in myself. Just pick up and go, screw everyone. But where to? Nowhere. I have nowhere to go.
I wish I could be one of these â€œvanâ€ people. Hell, I would settle for living in the truck if I had a cap for the bed.
Iâ€™ll let you all in to a secret. I have been offered a place to stay for a bit, but every atom in my body is telling me not to. I have mentioned this person before. I know she has designs on me. She has always held a flame. Itâ€™s just, I donâ€™t. I have absolutely no attraction towards her and as much as I would really like to take a few weeks to save up, I just see things going to shit quick here.
I canâ€™t shake the thought that she, even knowing I am not interested,Â  will see this as way more than a friend helping a friend. I see this going to a very uncomfortable relationship where in the end I will somehow come out worse then when I went in.Â  This isnâ€™t a â€ hey I have an extra roomâ€ thing, this is a I will force my kids out of their room for you or you can use the family room thing. A, I have younger female children, thing. Way too much to go sideways thing.
Could she actually be just a concerned person who wants to help? Yes, but thereâ€™s way too much things that feels wrong to me, too many things that can go to shit, especially in this day and age. No, Iâ€™m not some user dirty old creepy man, but all it takes is a lie. I think you know what I mean.

Title: Waiting again
Content:
Another day and no answers. What is so hard about a yes or no? I mean seriously,Â  itâ€™s a studio apartment, why is it taking so long to give an answer?
Â

Title: The hits
Content:
Although my living situation is up in the air, I was offered an interview for a job yesterday. That gave me a nice shot of positivity I have been lacking.
Until this morning
The email came at 4 am, well atleast that is what outlook said. The olâ€™ thanks but no thanks letter.

Title: Patience
Content:
I have never been able to be patient. In my experience being patient is just another way to miss out or lose. I realize that sounds stupid, but I patiently waited for Patty to get things out of her system and now sheâ€™s remarried and I am having the roughest time in my life. Maybe if I would have fought more or talked moreâ€¦.
I have been patiently waiting on hearing on this apartment and I feel like Iâ€™m out of luck now because I should have pestered the shit out of them. Yet if I pester then it becomes annoying.
Iâ€™m off track here. Thing is I have a countdown. I have about 15 weeks left on unemployment and I have a little less than 2 months before I am homeless. Looking at it, it seems like a lot of time to most people, but I have never looked at time that way. I am in panic mode, which is even worse being on my own, and that is making my already anxious brain worse.
There was a time that it seemed like I got everything I set my mind to. Jobs, relationships, possessions just seemed to come to me. I donâ€™t remember being any different then I am now other then 90lbs lighter and a somewhat full head of hair. Oh and also 20+ years younger.
I guess the whole â€œthanks but no thanksâ€ email from the job I was told I would have an interview with is causing a panic in me along with the week of waiting to hear about this apartment.

Title: The carrot and the donkey
Content:
I had an extremely horrible weekend with the thoughts and feels. The boys went to my sisterâ€™s for the weekend to celebrate their uncleâ€™s birthday. So I pushed through, alone, with no one to talk to. I thought about calling the crisis line just to have a conversation. So yeah, thatâ€™s how the weekend went.
I woke up today to a email about the studio apartment. They wanted to do background and credit check. Dumped $20 for it and explained to them my credit sucks due to the divorce fall out. They asked for my last to pay stubs to see if I could afford a $475 place. I donâ€™t have pay stubs. I have a letter from unemployment. I almost make the same amount on unemployment as I did working. I pay over $715 here and still have everything paid.
They havenâ€™t responded.
I wrote a heart felt plea. I told them I needed this place. I told them I wanted to be there for my boys. I told them they could trust me and I would do anything.
Â 
The shitty thing is all of this happened after the tele-session with my therapist. When I talked to her, I had thought it was all set. I made the small talk and told her that I was doing great with the possibility. Then what seemed moments later afterwards, I get the email about the stubs that I couldnâ€™t provide.
I know that silence doesnâ€™t always mean something bad. I know people get busy and they donâ€™t sit waiting on my answer. But, I know how this world seems to hate me enough that it dangles hope at me and pulls it away when I grab. Its been that way for 4 years.
Iâ€™m tired of waiting for things to turn my way. I have done nothing for 4 years but wait. That whole â€œit gets betterâ€ thing has yet to happen, but the â€œit get worseâ€ shit happens on an almost daily basis. Now I have heald somewhat contrary of my writing and I am at a point where I know kind of what I need to be this new person. I canâ€™t get there. Every single time in the last 2 years I made a plan and worked towards it, everything goes to shit without any reason or missteps from me. The job and apartment loses all happened way out of my control. Iâ€™ve canâ€™t even get a break with a place the size of my current living room for almost $300 less then I can pay now.
Itâ€™s really one thing to keep the faith when you have support around you. Itâ€™s a whole other chore when you are alone. Maybe I am not meant to be fixed. Maybe I have out lived my usefulness to anyone. All I know is I really feel like this is a final straw moment.

Title: Where my head is
Content:
Today I had an interview. It went well, my hopes are up. But, I donâ€™t want them to be. I donâ€™t want to fall anymore.
Yesterday morning was awesome. I was told I still had thus interview and I was right there with the apartment I wanted, or so I thought. By noon it seemed that it all crashed down. Againâ€¦
He hasnâ€™t reached out at all about the place since I explained my circumstances at the moment. I explained and promised I can pay for it and there would be no issues whatsoever.
Why should I even think that someone would give me a chance? I have gone through 4 years of people leaving, people refusing to talk to me, people more or less making light of my pain. I busted my ass for a place that laid me off with a phone call and that was that. I pay rent on time and I am close to being a model renter, didnâ€™t matter, I was put out like trash. Friends never call, never respond. Same as my siblings.
Why should this be any different?
Â 
I just would like someone to explain what It was or is that Iâ€™ve done. I donâ€™t understand.Â  Years of therapy hasnâ€™t made it make sense.
Iâ€™m just tired of losing and being so alone why I do.

Title: Not knowing
Content:
I truly believe thereâ€™s something very wrong with me, that several therapists nor I can figure out.
What did I do to people? Seriously, I need to knowâ€¦
Why is it that Patty seems to hate me so much? I did nothing to make her so resentful. I admit I was bad with money. I admit she was the only one I could talk to. I admit that I was sad and depressed that I couldnâ€™t give her a better life, but she was the one who cheated and ended it all. Not some, time away put it in prospective thing, but an all out, burn it to the ground, and salt the Earth thing. Why?
I donâ€™t expect to be friends. Hell I donâ€™t expect to put on a show for the kids. I just want to understand what it was that I did or didnâ€™t do. Why a person who for 20 years had a pretty loving life together turn around and do this like she did.
Do I ask her? Itâ€™s never worked in the past, so no. Do I ask anyone? Not one person stepped up for me in any of this.
Really, I can understand hate when it comes to a murderer. Someone that did such an awful terrible thing. I canâ€™t understand why people would hate the victim though.
Is it a defensive thing she did and it has somehow become real in her head? Is it 4 years of him and her yenta friends filling her head with nonsense?Â  Sure she has reason to be angry at me. I have had a tough time keeping up on child support. I didnâ€™t help out with Jonathanâ€™s college stuff. She was left with shity credit, same as me. But this?
Yes. I know I should just wash my hands of it all. Whatâ€™s done is done, but I have gone through miles of shit over these past 4 years because of this without even knowing why she â€œfell out of loveâ€ or why she seemingly hates me so much. I have watched as the people who â€œloveâ€ me and â€œsupportâ€ me all turned from me and wonâ€™t even talk to me now. I realize that everything doesnâ€™t have an answer.
Â

Title: Hope
Content:
Yes, hope. Something I screamed to the heavens that I would no longer have. Yet, here I am sitting outside of a possible new job, new career. The interview went good and today is what called â€œshadowingâ€ where I sit with someone for a hour or so and see the job in action.
More to comeâ€¦

Title: Hope 2.0
Content:
So the â€œshadowingâ€ went well. Tried to ask the sort of questions one would when wanting to be hired.
The man I was 10 â€“ 20 years ago would say this job is as good as mine. The last few years has taught me that I shouldnâ€™t make the assumption.Â  So hereâ€™s to the next few days and hoping the call comes.
Â

Title: Well itâ€™s happening
Content:
Like everything for me, things just come out of nowhere all at once.
So the apartment is mine, for $1050 by the 1st. I have $350, was $600 but my car loan servicer was supposed to take a half payment but took a full one. It sucks, but itâ€™s done.
Now the asking and begging begins.
The job seems to be happening and probably will be smack dab in the middle of the apartment drama. I was hoping to be in the new place before the job kicks in, but I have never had something just go easy for me
Ok, I know, these are good things and I am totally happy about them, but even too much chocolate at one time can be too much.
So anyway,Â  Iâ€™m going to need to borrow some money and the options are limited. Do I ask my sister and listen to the guilt about having to or do I take the offer by a friend who will see it not as a loan, but as validation of her interest in me? She is a nice person, but I have no interest other than friends and although her offer may just be that, my instincts tell me not to. Especially since I am going back to a small village where everyone is up in your shit.

Title: I am that official old guy.
Content:
Ever since the general legalization Marijuana here in NY, you kind of smell it everywhere. So IÂ  sitting here at 4am and I smell weed and I think â€œJesus Chist, how much fucking pot can the neighbors be smoking that I can smell it 3 doors down?â€
Turns out it was actually a skunk and a big one at that. I never shut a door so quickly in my lifeâ€¦.

Title: Now the real test begins
Content:
I got the apartment, I got the job, and now I am really in it.
Going back to the place I said I wouldnâ€™t.Â  Being around people I donâ€™t want to. People I no longer trust or give my time to.
Â

Title: Days are approaching
Content:
So everything is kind if in a weird holding pattern. Waiting on money to hit the bank, waiting on background results, waiting on getting the last little bit of the security deposit and 1st rent so I can actually move things which either way has to happen before next Wednesday.
I donâ€™t have anyone I can borrow the last $400 I need, so that will come down to the last minute.
Now will the weather hold? Will I find stone to help move all this stuff? Will I have utilities the same day? Is this all a huge mistake? Can I do this and stay sane?
I have to older boy who can helped and one 10 year old who thinks he can. My oldest wonâ€™t be home in time, the others are all back in school next week so I wont have help until the afternoon and I not sure if the weather will hold.
So yes I am allowing all the what ifs to cloud my head with anxiety. Well that and the usual things that eat my sanity away.
Itâ€™s a horrible thing when you canâ€™t stop yourself from thinking, remembering,Â  and dwelling. I am working on it, for 4 years Iâ€™ve been working on it. It all sounds so silly to everyone. People have all made me feel worthless for my feelings and thoughts. Yes, I have paid several people to understand and allow me to repeat the same shit over and over, day in day out, and every single time we talk. I had one dream, one hope from the time I met my ex. All roads led and ended with her. I donâ€™t have anything close to hopes and dreams for me, just for the boys, and I donâ€™t even know if I can fulfill those. And because of that, just that, I am throwing myself back into the fire I never started, but have always been blamed for.
Â

Title: Panic mode
Content:
I am always in panic mode. Sometimes itâ€™s the loneliness panic, others itâ€™s the future panic. Worthless panic, happy panic, lost panic, and hurt panic.
I havenâ€™t had a moment since it all ended where I was just calm. Where I could just sit there and watch the world go by for a day or even just an afternoon. Even the things that have gone right for me cause me to panic.
Yes, I got a new place, pretty quick after losing this one, but that comes with the panic of moving, not having help to move, not having money to hire someone to move me. Then the panic, itâ€™s way smaller then what I have now, will I constantly â€œbumpâ€ into her or him, with this being mostly about seeing my kids, will they come over and stop by?
Yes, I found a new job but the panic is will I be able to learn it, will they let me go if I canâ€™t quickly enough, will this become yet another job the I am laid off from when things get slow.
Â 
Ugh

Title: Innocent mistake
Content:
I received a text from my son today. He was asking for some beeswax. Yes, that is odd. I call him and Iâ€™m told oops sorry that was meant for Ed, the step-father.
Now, Iâ€™m not naive, I realize thereâ€™s a relationship between the boys and him. What hurts though is how quickly and completely that relationship happened. Iâ€™m not kidding when I say I feel like everyone, everyone thought this was the best thing Patty ever did instead of anger that see cheated and broke her family up.
Now it leads me into the thoughts. Did she ever love me? Just what did she say about us or me to everyone? How can a person be with someone for 20 years and now treat them as if they never existed?
These thoughts are the killer that I am so tired of fighting. Try as I may, I canâ€™t just say fuck everyoneâ€™s opinions of me.

Title: Round and round
Content:
Itâ€™s been too much too soon. Itâ€™s essentially made me sick. It funny what your brain can do to your body and health.
Thereâ€™s more, I just donâ€™t know how to put it in words. Itâ€™s sadness, happiness,Â  worthless,Â  needed but not needed, and confusion. Lots of confusion.
I miss my family. I miss her. I donâ€™t know why anymore. I canâ€™t remember her face, her touch, or her smell, but I miss it so much.
My head hurts so bad right now.

Title: Have I paid enough?
Content:
The boys just stopped over with my sister. They had all gone out to a restaurant somewhere. My birthday is tomorrow so they came with the usual no thought behind it gifts a father gets. This yearâ€™s socks, not just ordinary sock but arthritis socks that go up to my knees.
Anyway, I asked them to stay and they didnâ€™t want to. Even the little 2 didnâ€™t want to.
This has ripped my heart out. I can barely see what I am typing as I sob writing this. Have I not paid enough for all this? I didnâ€™t do anything but here I am 4 years in and they all just have dismissed me from their lives and see and treat me as an occasional thought.
I donâ€™t know how to live this way. I have talked to countless therapists, psychiatrists, and even you guys on here about how to handle it all. Nothing wants to stick. My own boys donâ€™t want to see me as anything more than a distraction.
I never had big dreams. I didnâ€™t want to be a astronaut or a doctor. I just wanted to have and raise a family like my parents did us. Why was it taken away? Finances?
Iâ€™m so lost right now. I have no one near to turn to. No where to go. Iâ€™ve just decided to walk right back into the oven by moving back to the village. I chose to go and surround myself with liars, cheaters, non-supportive ass clowns as friends, siblings who just see me as the last born who ruined the good times they were having before I was born, and rumors. In reality Iâ€™ve made myself more of a prisoner to it all by doing this. I will see them, I will bump into them. Whatever she has said to make herself the victim will make everyone look at me as â€œheâ€™s the oneâ€.
Iâ€™m going to be 52 years old tomorrow at approximately 6:30 pm and I donâ€™t remember how to be happy or relaxed or secure or even how it feels to have love ones around you with cake and companionship.

Title: Birthday blah
Content:
So Iâ€™m 52 now. Not anywhere in life I wanted to be.
No party
No phone calls
Yeah, I guess the boys said something yesterday,Â  but I thought I would get a call today.
Oh well, just another Sunday
I do this every year since the end of my marriage. I look forward to my birthday only to be disappointed and reminded thatÂ  alone.
For 48 years, there was a party, a cake, or something. These last 4 years have been waiting for a call, visit, or message and never receiving any. I get it, people said something a day or two ago, so why say it again. Itâ€™s just I keep building myself for the inevitable disappointment and now Iâ€™m sitting here trying to convince myself Iâ€™m not hated and I mean something to someone.
Iâ€™m not doing that good at it

Title: Therapy
Content:
Why is it that I seem to feel better after talking to my therapist yet when I really thunk about it, nothing seemed to have been solved?
I just feel for all the talking Iâ€™ve done, Mt life would be so much different. It is, but not how I imagined it. Then again, who is living the life they imagined?
I feel if I live for me everything and everyone will suffer, eventhough they donâ€™t live for me at all. Iâ€™ve all said that no one has ever lived or died for me as I seem to for them. I mean here I am still stressing for a woman who took all my fears, sadness, and loyalty and used them for her own gains against me and even let others know them to also use against me.
This week is so fucked up with moving and transferring stuff. Itâ€™s only Monday and I am just so anxious and tired.

Title: Moving forward while it all stays the same
Content:
The week has come, time to move and prepare for the new job. I should be excited and filled with happiness, but Iâ€™m not. All of this is proving to be just as difficult and lonely as the last several years have been.
Oh, I heard about all the help and I listened to the lectures of getting rid of things. I was yelled at when I mentioned renting an uhaul or a moving company. I was told there would be my brother in lawâ€™s truck and if she had to my sister would move my shit on her own. I was promised so much assistance I wouldnâ€™t know what to do with it all.
Yeah, no one showed, no help, no truck, and nobody. The same as the week I moved out of my home I shared with my ex. The same when I moved here. All talk, all guilt, and no help. But, if I even say one thing about it, I become the ungrateful ass, yet again.
Because of the â€œguilt tripâ€ my sister has put on me these 4 years, I canâ€™t make a decision without spending atleast several days sick to my stomach with anxiety.Â  Why do I give her so much power? Because she is my only real family left. I honestly canâ€™t tell you if either one of my brothers is still alive. Iâ€™m a mommas boy, I admit it. The women in my life hold an important place over me. I crave their acceptance of me and need their understanding.Â  I didnâ€™t have a controlling relationship with my mom. She wasnâ€™t a Smother, but she was there to listen, console, and assure me. My father taught me to respect the women in my life as he had growing up. He was the only boy in his family beside my Grandfather, obviously, but he learned to accept, honor, and respect his mother and sisters no matter what. I had always had a good relationship with my sister and I have no clue when that all went to shit. IDK, maybe when my mom fell into dementia or how I let my first ex kind of walk over me about my daughter. *Remember the respect thing I had ingrained in me, she didnâ€™t walk over me, I did what I thought was right.
I loved Patty, still do. She was my rock for many years until she chose not to be in what seemed to be in a matter of hours. With being that rock, I gave her my â€œpowerâ€, my consensus, and my confidence. My actions were always to make sure she was happy and I stopped thinking of me.
I guess the whole point I am failing to say is, I canâ€™t do anything for myself without feeling guilt, regret, or irresponsibility. Point is for all the lectures and promises of help and such, nothing has came from it. My life has become what only can be described as a dumpster fire. It is so apparent that even a stranger can see I have been put through some crazy shit, but that doesnâ€™t stop Patty, my sister, or others from twisting me into knots if I am not doing or reacting how they want me to.
Maybe I am selfish and narcissistic, but not really once in this whole life changing 4 year rut have I ever felt that the people who should have cared and been there for me, cared and been there for me.
Yes, I know and have learned that I have to love myself.
Yes, I am the only person I can rely on to really be there for myself.
Yes, I realize at the end of the day the only opinion the matters is mine and maybe my children.
I know all this and thatâ€™s the sad thing. I still allow it all to run roughshod over me daily. Always worried how it will effect others. At no time do I believe that either my ex, my sister, or even my friends consider me or my feelings when they do anything, even if I am included or effected.

Title: Moving day part 1
Content:
Iâ€™ve been sitting outside the new place for almost an hour waiting on the manager to show with the keys.
WHAT HAVE I DONE?
Not that I had too much choice, but this is going to suck. I am asking soo much of myself by moving back here.Â The love I once had for my hometown is gone, that to was ripped away from me with the divorce.
Not that I ever thought I moved on in these last 4 years, but today is really feeling like I have totally fell right down to the bottom all over again.

Title: Moving day part 2
Content:
So most of the major stuff is in the place. How to describe this place? Small, really small. Itâ€™s in a condition you would expect a $475 rented studio to be in. Just have to get past the icky feel of it and clean. Lots of cleaning. Kill it with bleachâ€¦
Emotionally I donâ€™t know how to feel. Although none of this was my fault, losing my place, I still feel like a failure. I lived in a comfortable failure house for years and now I am scraping what seems to feel like the bottom.
Patty called me.
The first time I have heard her voice in over 3 years. Every word was torture to hear and say. She asked me to take the boys to the dentist, her suv was having brake issues. Seeing that this is the reason for coming back, I agreed. She asked how I was doing. I lied.
I am doing everything to try to find the excitement in this, but I just canâ€™t. To you itâ€™s great news and a new start after months of crap. To me itâ€™s yet another start over I never wanted or asked for. I mean, whatâ€™s the point when every time you start over it all comes crashing down.
I guess at the core of it all I am just mad. Mad that Iâ€™ve known several people who went through tough shit like I have, but had nothing but outpouring support and love. Mad that I am paying the price of others mistakes and broken promises. Mad that she has it so easy after doing what she did, how she did it. She broke her home up, destroyed her kids father, move another man in immediately, and never had once word or dirty glance come her way. I re-homed my dog and I was called a dog killer for months here.
Yes, I have wandered off the original topic, again. I just wish I had no compassion, no conscious, and no use for others, so I can just go seamlessly through life without looking back at any and all damage I leave in my wake. It feels like everything I do is a lesson. How I feel in the morning, a lesson about how to sleep. If I spend a selfish day doing nothing, something bad happens and I learn a lesson about doing something for me. I buy that thing, something breaks. I allow myself to exhale, my job lays me off at holiday time and my lease gets canceled. I fall over myself to get a new apartment,Â  it turns out to be an uncomfortable shit hole.
Â

Title: The call
Content:
Itâ€™s still haunting me, talking to her after all this time. Should I say hearing her voice. Iâ€™m to a point where I hate how this still effects me,Â  but to force myself to not care feels worse.
I donâ€™t want to let go. If I do they all win. Her and everyone who dismissed my hurt, sadness, and grief as nothing. I logically know that if she was to wake up tomorrow and want me back that itâ€™s to broken. Thereâ€™s whole sets of different feelings the boys are now tied to with him. Somehow if she was to leave him to come back to me, I know I will be the â€œhome wreckerâ€ and the bad guy that messed up his life. How fucked up is that?
Yet, I canâ€™t get my head around a life without her. Yes, I have lived 4 years without her, but every single day, at some point it all rushes back in on me and hurts just as bad as the day it happened.
I just wish that someone will tell me what I am doing wrong, when I try so hard to do whatâ€™s right only to lose constantly.
I really want to talk at someone. Yes I wrote that right, I just want to spill my guts, again,Â  to someone. Why? I donâ€™t know. 3 therapists, 2 psychiatrists, and 1 minister have never given any real answers. I just lose no matter what I do and how I do it. Since I was 17, itâ€™s been a string of losing with the wins just setting up more painful losses.
Donâ€™t get me wrong, my children, all 5 of them, are the greatest thing Iâ€™ve done in my life, but I was pushed out of their every day lives, while another man was brought in. Then no matter what I do, I hear the comments like he is there more then i am or heâ€™s been a better step father than you have been a father. At no time does anyone see the facts that I was pushed away. I was left. I was put into a deep hole to have to climb out of. I get told that Iâ€™m single and I donâ€™t have to pay for this or that when if they logically thought about things they would see that itâ€™s all an uphill battle. I am paying for all the same utilities, car payments, and all that. By myself. I donâ€™t have someone sharing their income with me. They live in a mortgage free house, while I am paying over $700 in rent. Even when there was a mortgage, it was nowhere near that much.
What happens to a personâ€™s common sense when they break up a relationship for another? They push you off the boat and yell at you for drowning.Â  They shoot you in the heart and blame you for dying. They stick you into an impossible position and accuse you for being in that spot.
Do I think an ex should give a fuck? No, not all of them. Thereâ€™s many reasons why theyâ€™re exs and I wouldnâ€™t blame anyone if they treated an ex like shit because their relationship was a total shit show of abuse, cheating, lying, and drugs. But, a relatively stable relationship that falls apart because of finances or lost love shouldnâ€™t be some sort of revenge thing where someone burns you to the ground and salts the Earth. Especially when you give them everything they want and donâ€™t fight them for years for the salt and pepper shakers. Especially when they know you live them more than life itself, not a weird stalking love but a take a bullet type of love. I guess no one wants that anymore, instead itâ€™s become a what can you do or give me to make me stay love. Itâ€™s become a selfish one sided make only yourself happy world where people are applauded for not making a choice and staying with it.
Would I have rather Patty stay with me and be miserable? No, but I believe if you make the commitment you do what you can to try and keep it. You donâ€™t sit on hard feelings, insecurities, and annoyances only to let them fester until youâ€™ve made yourself hate your partner so much that you literally destroy him or her, your childrenâ€™s lives, and spit in the face of you extended family that treats you better than they ever did him or her. It would have hurt and I would try to do anything to solve it or change her mind, but it would atleast show you that there was some humanity and caring left, but the love has changed. I didnâ€™t deserve this and yet she did it and everyone went along with it. I have never been â€œthat guyâ€. The one who lies to cover for the real situation. When I say I worshiped her, I did. When I say I did everything I could to make her happy, comfortable, and safe, I did. When I say I was loyal, honorable, and truthful to her, I was. That alone should have had someone in my corner, but thatâ€™s all useless today. All that makes you seem weak. Makes you nothing but a sad push over, a simp, a joke.
Being that guy has done nothing for me except leave me alone, unloved, unneeded, worthless and broken.

Title: Woke up in pain
Content:
This morning I feel as though during the night I was possessed and my body contorted into positions it wasnâ€™t meant to. My back hurts so bad that I canâ€™t seem to stand straight.
I know what youâ€™re thinking, I just moved a bunch of stuff yesterday, but nothing was so heavy I had to strain to lift it.
Iâ€™m also having an issue just taking a nice breath. Starting to wonder if I maybe in the midst of a mild heart attack ğŸ¤”Â  I donâ€™t think I am, but Iâ€™m at that age. All I know is I now have absolutely no time to fiddle and fuss at doctors and specialists. I havenâ€™t shaken for almost 2 months now and went through the whole flemy stage about 3 weeks ago, yet it feels like I canâ€™t take a deep breath and hold it.
Anyone who has followed my rants here probably know the worse is swirling in my brain. Cancer? Heart attack? Covid? Being a fat ass slobâ€¦ or maybe I just need a good old fashioned back rub, a luxury I havenâ€™t had since Patty.

Title: The new place
Content:
Right off the bat, the noise. The old place was well away from the road so I didnâ€™t have to hear every mufflerless car go by. The door is thin and itâ€™s in a apartment building, so every loud talker is heard going around in the hall.
There is absolutely no storage and no room to have more. I have no clue how to make a big meal in the â€œkitchenetteâ€ let alone wash the dishes.
Itâ€™s for the boys, to be around the boys. I have to keep saying and thinking this or else Iâ€™m going to lose my mind.

Title: The new place 2
Content:
First night here. Think I slept OK. I have been feeling sick, gut stuff, for several days. Itâ€™s not helping my overall mood. Iâ€™m down to $20 and canâ€™t tell you how I spent $200 in less than 2 days. Itâ€™s depressing really, on top of all the other depressing stuff.
Iâ€™m really feeling like I made a mistake renting here. Itâ€™s probably cozy for most, but Iâ€™m in no way comfortable here at all. Although I have a full size fridge and oven, but absolutely no room to do anything whether itâ€™s cooking, washing dishes, or even using an one pot.
Itâ€™s wired like a building that was made in the 50s. Thereâ€™s a total of 4 outlets in here and they are in the worst locations. Thereâ€™s absolutely no water pressure for the bathroom sink and it took almost 5 minutes to get warm water. Shaving sucked.
I realize itâ€™s all me. This all feels like I am falling backwards from whatever successes Iâ€™ve made these last few years. I realize I have to change my thinking and views if I want to get better and move on. I want to, I need to, but thereâ€™s just some sort of weird block in me that canâ€™t move on.
It never fails that when I really need to talk about stuff, I donâ€™t have an appointment with my therapist. It feels like I just want lose my mind, scream until Iâ€™m horse, and cry until I dry up and then never again think about anything. I just need someone or something to come along and make me feel wanted or needed. Make me stop feeling worthless and useless.
Itâ€™s my fault for judging me and my life on my ex and familyâ€™s happiness, comfort, and security, and never thought of my own.

Title: The plan or the lesson
Content:
Iâ€™m sitting here thinking about what the lesson I am supposed to be learning from all the shit of the last 4 years. Everything and everyone I lost. What is this â€œGodâ€™s planâ€ that I have been spiraling in for 4 years?Â  For all intents and purposes,Â  my â€œfamilyâ€ life and marriage are going along as if I was there, but Iâ€™m not. Why am I left out of my own dream I worked so hard to get to? Yes, my other place was sad and lonely at times, but it was certainly miles ahead of this one.
I should stop hating on it. This would be an awesome place for someone 35 or younger. I donâ€™t have the patience to wait for this or that which can make this more liveable. Plus, do I really want to add more shit on top of everything else? I need a microwave cart or stand.
Iâ€™m finding myself wanting to contact her and fighting it. This is making for a very stressful and uncomfortable evening. I knew that this would happen.

Title: Covid
Content:
Well itâ€™s finally come for me, 2 days before I start my new job.Â
