Iâ€™m not dying, but it does explain the aches and pains and cough. Doctor told me to treat it like the flu unless symptoms get worse, but still, come on lifeâ€¦

Title: Covid part 2
Content:
Ugh. This sucks. I honestly donâ€™t remember being sick like this these last few years. Not since being in that life. Not that she would take care of me, but I wasnâ€™t so alone.
I donâ€™t know what to do. No, Iâ€™m not suffering or anything, but Iâ€™m so congested itâ€™s hard to get a good breath.
I donâ€™t have the money to buy anymore medicine so fingers crossed, I hope the Robotusin works.
Â

Title: Covid part 3
Content:
That was a shitty night. My head feels like someone was sitting on it. The body has the usual aches and pains.
I donâ€™t know what else to write.

Title: Covid part 4
Content:
So I think I went through the worst of it last night. I still have a monster headache and some congestion.
Thank you for all your concerned comments. They mean a lot to me, especially when all the people around here who have as yet, checked in with me.
I should be used to it. I came here to try to change things and so far Iâ€™m doing crappy with it.

Title: First day jitters
Content:
So having survived my weekend from Hell here I am at the new job. My stomach is sour which can be either the anxiety or sickness, who knows?
I did it to myself again, getting worked up about people not asking how I am or even have a good day at work. I know no one should expect those things. Let alone me.
I just miss that time in life when it did happen. Having her tell me everything will go good and the boys hugging me and telling me they love me.

Title: One day down
Content:
Yeah it was kind of long and seemed like I wasnâ€™t doing something,Â  but the first day was good. My head has throbbed all day because of the covid, I did stay away from my coworkers.
Now, Iâ€™m tired and Iâ€™m going to veg out.
Â

Title: Reason #246
Content:
I originally was going to write about something more like my usual rants, but as I was leaving the new placeâ€¦.
Reason #246 I never wanted to live in an apartment building is this. As I left my place immediately there are 2 people sitting right there. Not being prepared, I mumbled a hello only to realize one of them has special needs and is very uncomfortable around men, which now became a thing as he began to scream.
I walked down the hall to leave, immediately enveloped by several strains of Marijuana being smoked by various neighbors. I guess smoke free only pertains to cigarettes.
Iâ€™m really starting to hate this.
Â

Title: Thoughts
Content:
The jobs going good, a lot of stuff to learn, but not overwhelming. Seams my brain goes through ebs and flows.
I have to laugh when people almost push smoking Marijuana on you, when just maybe 10 years ago would give you a dirty look for making a joke.
Speaking of that. Marijuana smoke does not mix well with deep fryer stink and spicy Mexican food smells. The hallways are torture in my new place.
Still lonely ğŸ™

Title: More thoughts
Content:
So the halls were so much worse tonight. Like a skunk orgy went off the rails. I donâ€™t get it, people bitch about smoke smell, but not Marijuana which is like licking a skunks ass.
I met a neighbor tonight. As soon as I gave my name, she proceeded to ask if I was Edâ€™s wifeâ€™s ex-husband. Oh joy.. Maybe it wouldnâ€™t bother me so much if she wasnâ€™t such a messed up druggy. I mean she couldnâ€™t keep her tongue in her head for 2 seconds.
I lost my everything to a man who runs around and has friends like thisâ€¦
Fuck meâ€¦

Title: So where Iâ€™m at 3/11
Content:
Iâ€™m the guy at the end of the counter at the local dinner. As opposed to Derby, Silver Creek has two. This is Aunt Millies, the place to go here when youâ€™re thinking of going out. My reasons, besides hunger, is to see if anyone will recognize me and actually come up to talk.
Seeing that I have now been referred to as Edâ€™s wifeâ€™s ex-husband twice now, Iâ€™m starting to wonder if I actually grew up here.
What I mean about the guy at the end of the counter is being that guy who intersects into strangers conversations and always says something cheesy to the waitresses. Thatâ€™s my problem though, I know Iâ€™m about to do it and sure as shit I just do it and regret it as you can tell by the looks of people. Then it all rushes back in and I start to once again hate myself for being that weird guy and gow no one will ever want to be with me or befriend me.
So, thereâ€™s this rather attractive waitress that I would like to talk more to, but Iâ€™ve resigned myself with the fact that if there was something there she would show it. I really donâ€™t understand dating anymore, not that I ever did seeing that all my relationships have ended like they have to a point where the exs couldnâ€™t careless if I was run down by a semi.
Well I guess Iâ€™ll stick with the one thing Iâ€™m sure of in this world and how it will never make me sad.

Pie

Title: The boys
Content:
Iâ€™m not sure why, but I almost feel like I am just a novelty to my sons. Not to be taken seriously, but kind of included out of pity.
I guess for me, life works differently. I had what comes down to a total mentaly and emotional break a few years ago without any sort of support from family or friends. I was told not to talk to the boys about it from the same people who refused to talk to me about it. What little support I managed to fund faded away as fast as it came.
Was I not allowed to â€œlose itâ€? Was I not allowed to shut down some?
So why is it these people around me who give me shit are allowed to ignore me when they choose? They can have their anxiety days and say such hurtful shit to me? They can cheat, lie, and end a marriage and people just go on as nothing happened, but the one moment I feel somewhat sorry for myself, Iâ€™m selfish and narcissistic.
â€œWell, youâ€™re the one who disappeared.â€
Yes, there was a very legitimate reason I did for almost a year, but no one cared. No one sat with the boys telling them that Dad lives them, but heâ€™s very hurt. That he has abandoned them. They all wounded me and complained when I said it hurt, never once addressing what had happened and then one day bitching about me not letting it go. Itâ€™s like murdering someone and a few months later saying â€œwhatâ€™s done is doneâ€ to the rotten corpse and getting mad that the corpse hasnâ€™t moved or cleaned up their own murder site.
No one but me, the hurt one, has any guilt or even compassion about what Iâ€™ve gone through. I have some sort of messed up guilt about it all and every effort I have tried to do is feeling like itâ€™s too late.
Like I said, my kids love me, I know, but itâ€™s never going to be the relationship I always wanted from the first time I held each one in the delivery room. It just isnâ€™t anymore. Now itâ€™s a novelty. Spending the night at dadâ€™s. Going for some fries. Stopping for 2 seconds to say hi. Nothing significant. Yes, make new memories. That to me still feels like the novelty. Itâ€™s not:
â€œDad can you help me with homeworkâ€
â€œDad come quick, Ethan fell off his bikeâ€
â€ Daddy can I sleep with you, I had a nightmareâ€
â€œDad can you teach me to shaveâ€
She took all that from me and gave it to another. Sure they donâ€™t call him Dad, but heâ€™s the first to be asked, the first to be told.
If this was all because of finances and losing love, then way has it became such a vindictive push me out of their lives thing?
â€œJust talk to me about the boys,â€ she says. Then when I do it turns into the,â€ you owe $$$ for child supportâ€. Not a how should we go about this or that. Not about an united front.
Iâ€™m just the guy who is supposed to pay and shut the fuck up, sometimes being allowed to enjoy their company.
Â

Title: Update 3 14 23
Content:
So work is going good, I think. They expect my to do training and in the nicest way possible, thrown me to the wolves answering call, taking payments,Â  and writing applications. My anxiety is kicking in because Iâ€™m not hearing constant praise or criticism. I know, Iâ€™m crazy like that, working on it.
Jonathan is home for the week. Iâ€™ve seen him maybe 2 hours since Friday. We had plans tomorrow, but he decided to go with Mom and him instead. None of the other boys have called or visited. Theyâ€™re busy and theyâ€™re kids. Iâ€™m sure someone will need a ride and Patty, him, or my sister will be too busy and put it on me one way or another. I guess Iâ€™ll have some time with Jonathan Sunday, Iâ€™ll have to drive him back to Alfred.
Iâ€™m currently sitting at Applebeeâ€™s, spending money I shouldnâ€™t. Iâ€™m fighting the urge to play Quickdraw so thereâ€™s that. Maybe some bourbon street chicken will fill the void.

Title: The phrase
Content:
The one phrase I never wanted to hear again after all the drama of my 1st divorce and fallout is:
â€ You have to for the kidsâ€
Before you take me to church on what I said, I mean hearing this and it meaning having to talk nice and act like every shitty thing Patty did to me, means nothing. Meaning I should sit with her and him and talk to him about the silly stuff my boys do.
I will never do that, I donâ€™t care what the situation is. I donâ€™t care.
Â

Title: The phrase 2
Content:
I apparently struck a nerve with what I wrote. I do that a lot. Now I never meant to say that I wouldnâ€™t sacrifice for my children. I have since I was 18 and my daughter was born. Where others can say they did something for themselves to benefit their kids, I canâ€™t. I lived for each one. Did it seem like anyone looked at me as a good Father? No, no they didnâ€™t. Neither of my exâ€™s considered my feelings and love for my children when they dumped me from their lives, nor did they care when they put new men in the childrenâ€™s live immediately.
I know what some of you might think, â€œmaybe it is you?â€
Who knows? It probably is.
The point is, I do live for my kids. Hell, I live for everyone but me. My friends and family have acted like they couldnâ€™t give a shit about me, but I just keep calling and texting.
When my daughter Kayla died, it was about how everyone but me lost something. I was told I had to be strong for the boys, while everyone else was pitied for their loss. I remember being dressed down when I had a moment where I said something about losing my daughter and how selfish I was for saying that.
What people donâ€™t understand is Iâ€™m not some heartless bastard. I spent a lifetime being strong for everyone else and then I was totally broken by Patty and her betrayal. I needed someone to be strong for me and no one cared. The boys being young, didnâ€™t understand, I get that, but it hurts that they never questioned why. My sister, who you would think would be there defending her brother, or at the least, have a few words to say to my ex, didnâ€™t. She and the brother in law just went on like nothing happened. Friends didnâ€™t gather around me and mother fuck my ex to support me, instead I was told shit happens. Yes the same friends I went out to track down the guys their exs cheated with. The same friends who I sat with countless times to make sure they didnâ€™t make a stupid drunken decision.
So, Iâ€™m wrong for saying I will support my kids my way and not play at being buddy buddy with the ex and her new husband for the kids sake. People may see it as showing them how mature men should act. I see it more as allowing cheating and lying home wreckers to be accepted. My boys shouldnâ€™t feel the need to be gracious to someone who flips their world upside-down, pissing on it, and dragging it through the mud. Especially after hearing that person make promises and loving remarks right up to hours before tearing you apart.
I want my boys to be pissed about the unfairness of what it means to be a man in a world that no longer allows a man to be a man. Iâ€™ve taught them to be chivalrous and respecting, but I donâ€™t want them to be weak and allow the world to piss on them like it has to me.
So the critiques are right in my last entry, I am the problem.

Title: What is catastrophising?
Content:
Itâ€™s me.
Overthinking.
Stress.
Anxious feeling.
Racing thoughts.
Fear and anger.
Depression.
Pessimism.
Stuck in your head.
Thereâ€™s finally a name for it all. Along with some other thing my psychiatrist is thinking.
I drove the boy back to school today so the 80 mile trip home alone didnâ€™t help. I made the mistake of listening to 90s country music. I never really listened to the words. There was a song, â€œ2 tear dropsâ€ that just about made me want to put my truck into a tree. Also a Diamond Rio song, â€œYouâ€™re goneâ€ that made me hope that when I hit the tree the truck would explodeâ€¦
Surprisingly though Iâ€™m home and somewhat centered. Iâ€™m not happy, nor am I content, but Iâ€™ve managed to learn how to numb myself and withdraw to quiet thoughts. Thing is, they just linger there waiting for me to let my guard down again.

Title: The fight
Content:
Iâ€™m worn out. Thr constant mental adjustments all day to stay level headed is taking its toll. I realize most â€œsaneâ€ people do this everyday,Â  even unknowingly. Iâ€™m jealous, I lost that ability when I lost her, so now itâ€™s one of those things that I have to be constantly aware of.
Am I doing better? Yes, but I feel as though Iâ€™ve had a constant headache these last few weeks of actively trying to not fall back into the muck. Itâ€™s like balancing on the spinning log like you see in the lumberjack games on ESPN.
I just never imagined I would be at a point where I canâ€™t put trust into anyone. A point where I have to have suspicion about anyone and everyone in my life, knowing that at any point they can flip on me. Itâ€™s kind of torture for a man who live most of his life based on others.
Â

Title: Use to know
Content:
Krista. My first girlfriend, first pretend wife. Time and living has been kind to her. Well at least her beauty.
I saw her and talked for a minute just today when I was out for breakfast.
All I wanted to ask is if she was still married and if she would like to go out. That would be a yes and no respectively.
We were inseparable during elementary but she blossomed in middle and high, while I stay as awkward as I am now.
Just yet another silly dream.
Â

Title: The ol hometown
Content:
Iâ€™m really not enjoying being back here. The â€œplanâ€ isnâ€™t working as I thought it would. The boys donâ€™t call more or stop by. If it wasnâ€™t for me initiating things over the last couple weeks, I would hardly ever hear from them. Iâ€™ve been more or less, used by Patty to take the boys here and there, or pick them up, which I donâ€™t mind, but itâ€™s not really done with the intentions of her believing they need me in their lives.
I have been trying to be â€œmore publicâ€, but other than Krista the other day, no one has seemed to even notice me. I canâ€™t shake the made up feeling of being a pariah here eventhough I was the victim in all of this. Then again, thatâ€™s how Iâ€™ve always felt since this went to shit 4 years ago.
The job is good, keeps me busy 9 hours a day, but the loneliness waits for me when itâ€™s all done.
As you can see, Iâ€™m having a pretty low self esteem day. I know I have lost weight, but I feel disgustingly fat. I feel ugly and worthless. I know these are not who I am, but â€œsticks and stonesâ€. My â€œbadâ€ self is yelling the insults in my ear and it just doesnâ€™t seem to know when to stop.
Iâ€™m missing being held like I hold my youngest. Just someone to cuddle up to and maybe a gentle back rub or a small slight tickle on the back of my neck. I donâ€™t need sex, I would just settle for this. Maybe I am just a scared man child or maybe itâ€™s because Iâ€™ve gone through 4 years of Hell and not had one person who was supposed to be close for me tell me things will be ok. I guess Iâ€™m not a â€œreal manâ€ and thatâ€™s why she and they left and I canâ€™t find someone new.

Title: Applebeeâ€™s and Quick draw
Content:
As the title says, thus is where I am. Can I afford it, probably not, but just not in the mood to go home to the silence.
Plus, work was nuts and the beer is helping

Title: Well, that didnâ€™t help
Content:
$20 less in my account and a stomach ache. Thatâ€™s where my â€œfuck it, just do itâ€ attitude got me. Yeah, I flirted some. Of course the only ones to play along were married and obviously not like my ex and willing to destroy their husbands and families.
I seriously am trying to be better, be more self confident, but it seems as though things wonâ€™t change. I have been making all kinds of efforts to come out of my shell. Going out more, putting my self out there, it all feels like a colossal waste of time. No one has come up to me. No one has seemed remotely interested in having a conversation. I make a concerted effort to smile, be positive,Â  and not bring up the past, but Iâ€™m still left to feel like Iâ€™m no one. Unimportant. A waste of time to talk to.
By now, most people know Iâ€™m back in town. Enough people have seen me to get the mill running. Yet, no calls or texts. But, I guess I have to call and text and act as if all the shit they did doesnâ€™t mean a thing while understanding I will never be allowed to treat them anywhere as shitty as they have all treated me.
Yes, I realize that you fake it to make it. I realize that no one will ever apologize or give a shit about what happened to me and what it has done to me. Even the â€œonesâ€ who said they care havenâ€™t talked to me since November.
Itâ€™s my fault for never learning how to enjoy me. Learned to be me for me and not for what others want from me. I guess if I want people in my life, my feelings shouldnâ€™t matter.

Title: It rushes back in
Content:
I canâ€™t listen to this without being thrown back in time. Not because the song is from 30 years ago, but because itâ€™s just that kind of song that makes you long for a time when things were just â€¦ right.
Now I have to stay on top of everything, every thought, emotion, and choice so I no longer get overwhelmed by the shit I hold back and push away.
Life, for me, has this way of going all FUBAR if I take a moment to exhale. Iâ€™ve done a lot of soul searching and tons of forgiving and giving up, but I still canâ€™t take my eyes off the road.
Â 
That song though, it reminds me there was a sweet few years where nothing went wrong and everything seemed to go my way. I havenâ€™t had that since I was 18.
Â

Title: The sterilized father
Content:
No, my â€œstuffâ€ works, Iâ€™m talking about how I have been regulated to being the father I am and not allowed to be the one I want to be. Maybe itâ€™s me? Maybe I should be happy to have such little responsibilities? Maybe itâ€™s the fact I take shit from people who put me into this situation or never stood up for me while I was put in it.Â  Itâ€™s like leaching a dog to a tree in the back yard and yelling at it to come inâ€¦
When I say I like with constant guilt, this is what I mean. I get lectured about living a single carefree life as if I left, by the ones who forced me out by cheating, lying, and blaming and somehow I have to tell myself that Iâ€™m ok.

Title: Canâ€™t think of a title
Content:
So Iâ€™m â€œhealingâ€ they say. To do so, Iâ€™ve been told that I have to stop seeing what they all did and see my part in it all.
Itâ€™s hard to. Hard to find happiness in anotherâ€™s happiness. Itâ€™s seems kind of stupid to me to somehow make the one who more or less destroyed me, the victim. Hard to be happy for her,because she seems happy now when it came at the price of all of mine. I lost pretty much everything and everyone so she can have everything and everyone.
Now Iâ€™m told to look at it through her and otherâ€™s eyes. See what I did. Justify what they did.
So this is what I do now. Iâ€™m starting to hate me too.

Title: So disappointing
Content:
Besides the hundreds of other reasons, I found yet one more today.
I have been back to eating like a demented rabbit and trying to â€œmoveâ€ around more. For the most part I felt like it was having some sort of difference, but one trusty scale latter and that all went to shit.
Now, itâ€™s about 60Â° and I am dressed lightly and I still am tipping the scale at 265. The same 265 I was months ago when I felt like a slob. No I havenâ€™t gained muscle weight.
Whatâ€™s the point? I sit here giving up smoking, giving up pop, giving up food that tastes good. Hardly any carbs or processed junk. I am still just as fat.
I canâ€™t push exercising because my knees are shot. Seriously, I started out walking today, thinking everything felt great. Halfway into the village both of the knees gave out. Currently I am sitting on a bench writing this and waiting for the pain to subside.
I had life figured out. I had a family to help me and I them. Now Iâ€™m alone, in pain, lonely and apparently not any skinnier than I was several months ago.

Title: Thoughts
Content:
Thatâ€™s all they are, comment if you must
Â 
I hate the fact that I no longer have friend and family support.
I hate that my biggest supporter and defender, now throws the biggest rocks at me. Bigger then I ever had hurled in my direction my whole life.
I hate that I think this way, but so far the acceptance way isnâ€™t working.
I hate that I have tried to mend fences to no avail and then I hear nothing back. I have tried to make new friends and not one of them is interested.
Â 
I almost wish I could be one of these stars,Â  like Selena Gomez, who can fall out of the world and go to a rehab that is probably nothing more then a spa retreat. Have doctors look into my ouchies and psychiatrists listen to all my whines. Spend a month and not lose anything in the real world while away and walk out to the cheers and calls of bravery for it all.
Instead, Iâ€™m told I am not trying hard enough. Told that I have no disability so even if I do go into the hospital I canâ€™t afford to. Told that if I miss more than a week or so, my job wonâ€™t be there. I have no one to drive me to a surgery or pick me up.
Â 
I came back to this village for the purpose of â€œreconnectingâ€ with my sons and itâ€™s going about as bad as when I lived miles away. I call nightly, ask nightly if they want to do this or that. Iâ€™ve been passed over for video games and trips with their Aunt.
Â 
Stones, Patty now throws stones to hurt me for what?

Title: Friends?
Content:
I put it out there the other day to my 2 â€œbest?â€ friends about how sorry I was losing touch and going off the reservation. No need for them to have to feel the least bit sad for me.
Sean reached out today and as I have always thought, needed a chair filler for a DnD game he wants to start up. One could say, heâ€™s offering up some time to do something with me, but for a man who works 2 days and sits around the other 5 to also tell me heâ€™s not interested in â€œhangingâ€ speaks volumes.
I havenâ€™t heard from the other.
I guess I will be happy for them as I have to be for Patty, at least they have each other when they need to have a friendship bonding day.
My friends, my brothers, Sean and Tony. Fuck the both of you.

Title: Donâ€™t know what to say
Content:
Work is going well, just canâ€™t seem to find the comfort zone I am comfortable with.
Iâ€™m told to let lose and come out of my shell, trouble is my â€œout of the shellâ€ is a man 30 years younger. At my age, it will definitely come out as immature and asinine.

Trouble is I idolized Bruce Willisâ€™s character from Moonlighting. I still do and, well see for yourself. Would you want to work with a 52yr old bald overweight guy acting like this.

Title: Life recently
Content:
The job is going well. Me being me is making me feel as though it isnâ€™t,Â  but it is. Trouble is, I have absolutely no money. Losing the other place, moving, and all the money to get into this one all put me back into a 30 foot hole, again, like the one that took me almost 3 years to crawl out of before.
With the other job I was bringing home almost $400 more. Iâ€™m not a person who gives my word and breaks it. I told the new one I was there for the long haul and Iâ€™m not going to work the streets trying to find a higher paying job that would probably treat me like crap.
I donâ€™t really have anything to cut back on. Dropping OP saves me $4. I like my internet, itâ€™s all I have for entertainment. I can drop all the +s and save I guess maybe $15 a month. I gave up smoking, so I donâ€™t dump $ in that. I barely go out and have exactly 2 packs of tuna, 6 packs of Ramen, some oatmeal and 2 sticks of butter.
Doesnâ€™t matter though, Iâ€™m barely hungry these days. The free ride of unemployment and free health insurance has come to an end, so prescriptions will sap the $70 savings Iâ€™ve managed to cobble together.
So, you see, everything good is followed by twice as many bad. I understand the â€œliving day to dayâ€ thing, it would be easier not having to do it poor.

Title: Itâ€™s not hurting, but stings like a bitch
Content:
The 4th Easter without family how it used to be. Another man gets to enjoy my kids when they wake excited. Family dinner without me involved, both at home and at their Auntâ€™s, my own sister.
Not sure why I keep thinking each year will be any different. Even the first year just months after being torn from all of it, no one invited me.
I stay strong for the boys. I see them for a couple hours, where they act as though nothing is any different being with me for a little bit. They fight and disagree, get angry and fight some more and then the visit is over before it even began. I drive them home to once again see a stranger doing what I used to do. No greeting from their mother, even though I had texted her hours ago. Quick hugs and thatâ€™s it for my Easter.
No word from old friends or my own family. No dinner at home awaiting me. No invites.
Not sure why I keep thinking each year will be any different.
Â 
Happy Easter OD

Title: Am I good?
Content:
The silence is killing me tonight. Life alone seems much more manageable when you have some money than it does when you have absolutely nothing for the next week and a half.
Iâ€™m feeling it again tonight. The overwhelming dread and self loathing for myself again. I got through the holiday weekend without anyoneâ€™s greetings or invites, but I ran out of juice today after listening to all the â€œfunâ€ everyone else had. Now Iâ€™m slowly falling back into my dark again.

Title: Trying to keep a smile
Content: As it says, Iâ€™m trying. Itâ€™s kind of an ugly forced smile though. Like acceptance. Iâ€™ve accepted the fact Iâ€™m alone and may be for the rest of my days. I accepted the fact that I may never again have a â€œgood friendâ€, just nice people. Iâ€™m no longer the â€œfunâ€ guy at work or even the most moral and empathetic. Iâ€™ve accepted the fact that my past and pains have turned me into a pretty miserable man and although I am more open, I will never be like I was before and that really makes me sad.

Title: Whatâ€™s wrong??
Content:
Why do people ask if they really donâ€™t give a shit?
Iâ€™m in a spot where Iâ€™m told itâ€™s ok to make a mistake, but then when I do I catch holy Hell.
I am suffering PTSD from all the crap of the last 4 years, thatâ€™s what fucking wrong. When I needed people to care, they didnâ€™t,Â  some even added to it. Constantly losing people, jobs, and apartments and having people laugh in my face and lie to me.
I wonder why I seem as if something is wrongâ€¦

Title: So where Iâ€™m at 4/14
Content:
My head is fighting with me again about work and people. IDK, I just feel like Iâ€™m being singled out at work because I keep making mistakes and everyone has to â€ be understandingÂ  â€ to the new guy when they could care less.
Iâ€™m 52, the oldest one of them is 33. A world apart. They grew up with technology shoved up their ass. Doing 15 things at once as their face was stuck into a phone.Â  I like to write down my notesâ€¦NO,Â  type them in. Donâ€™t write them down.
Arg

Title: Erased
Content:
Itâ€™s like I never existed for the first 48 years of my life. Family hardly talks to me and when my sister does, itâ€™s usually because she needs me to do something. My friends donâ€™t respond to texts and email and even the oneâ€™s that swore they cared havenâ€™t checked in for over a year.
I just spent a moment at the old home I no longer recognize because all the renovating her and him have done, but memories of my Parents are still there, but as far as me, Iâ€™ve been erased from her and to a point, the boys lives.
They donâ€™t have a picture of me to be seen, they never talk about me with her. She â€œconvenientlyâ€ canâ€™t remember anything about my involvement in their lives before January 2019. I canâ€™t talk about it anymore,Â  no one want to listen.
Iâ€™ve lost 48 years of my life and the only memories I can share are with me alone.
Â 
Iâ€™m talking to a woman lately,Â  well texting anyway, but this has gone on for almost 2.5 years. It always ends the same, she just stops. When we do â€œtalkâ€ she never has time to meet and the few times she proposed it, she somehow had â€œsomething come upâ€. And this is the only person close to making an effort as far as I am considered.

Title: Defeated
Content:
You ever feel like you are playing the best game of something, doing everything right, only to stop and look around to see no one is even noticing. Then to top it off, when you say anything to them about it, you get a â€œyeah rightâ€ attitude and cold shoulders.
Thatâ€™s how I feel now. Do I need a party for every milestone? No, but would it hurt to have someone say they are noticing. I could honestly give a shit about myself and smoking. I liked it. I never had the shakes or even a bad extended cough. I smoked all through covid and nothing. I enjoyed a cig with coffee or just enjoying a nice spring day on a bench. I quit for 4 boys who havenâ€™t even said anything. I quit for those around me who bitched and complained. Nothing out of their cake holes either.
I know all these â€œhealthy â€ changes were for me, but I have no one to celebrate the â€œlittleâ€ victories with anymore and Iâ€™m tired of being the lonely guy at the end of the counter.
Itâ€™s the same with food. I have really ate nothing but leaves and sticks. Drank nothing but water and coffee.Â  I still feel like shit. I havenâ€™t smoken for 3 months and have ate this way and nothing.
Oh, and work, well thatâ€™s going to shit now too.Â  From day one I was thrown in the deep end and told to ask questions if I needed, mistakes happen. Except they donâ€™t and I e been given shit every day. I have several hours of training materials that I have to somehow do without any time allowed to do it. Essentially Iâ€™m told to have fun, try something new, enjoy work, but do what I say to do. You have to be as lively and carefree as a 29 and 25 year old. They havenâ€™t been beaten into submission by life like I have. They can enjoy their stupid outlook on shit. Sorry, Iâ€™m anxious. In the last 4 years I lost a wife, a home, all my dreams, hopes, and possessions. All my money, 2 jobs for no apparent reason and 2 apartments for no apparent reason. Sorry, when I get a feeling, it just gnaws at me.
Maybe I should have past this job up. Maybe I should have just given away all my shit and lived in my truck.

Title: That same old empty feeling
Content:
Iâ€™ve had enough, really this time I have reached a limit. Iâ€™m lonely, but not lonely enough to play the turny twisty BS dating when not even dating game.
This is who I am and I guess I can see why no one would want to take a chance no matter how funny or charming. Iâ€™m 52 and I was 10x better off when I was 20. No savings, no real home, not too many possessions,Â  no real plan, and absolutely no retirement.Â  Oh I had all those, but now a man who did nothing gets to enjoy them with my ex. Iâ€™m left with child support payments until Iâ€™m mid 60, weird relationship with said children, and some odd mark on my forehead that screams loser.
I thought I had a great job, but that too was ripped away along with a nice apartment. Now I live in a closet and work for young people who talk to me like a child because I use â€œoldâ€ methods to get the same results. Part of my pay is commission, but because they think that Iâ€™m not performing like them they take credit for my good and chide me on my bad. Closed 2 loans totalling over 30k yesterday with all the bells and whistles and no one but me, them, and now you will ever know.
I canâ€™t even begin to explain how bad I want to have a cigarette. Absolutely no one cares I quit. I donâ€™t even know why anymore. One little bad habit that brought me joy gone.

Title: Sunday
Content:
Iâ€™m feeling defeated today. I told myself I would get to church, but didnâ€™t make it. IDK, I guess Iâ€™m an old man and I believe you dress up for service and neither of the boys have dressy clothes. And yes, I know God doesnâ€™t care about fashion.
Recently Iâ€™ve been trying to walk more and my hip is starting to hurt along with my knee. I guess I am extremely bull legged. Which I guess I am if you watch how my knees pop out to the side as I walk.
Iâ€™m a mess.
Iâ€™m trying to take care of myself, but Iâ€™m at a place where I just want satisfaction and thatâ€™s really not healthy.
The lady Iâ€™ve been chatting with is kind of neurotic and Iâ€™m back to feeling like Iâ€™ll be alone for the rest of my days.

Title: I donâ€™t want to write anymore
Content:
Writing isnâ€™t making anything better, it never really has. Most things Iâ€™ve written over the last 3 years I do with a face full of tears and an emptiness that canâ€™t seem to be filled.
Am I personally â€œbetterâ€? I guess so, I donâ€™t know. I can no longer find confidence and courage in myself. Iâ€™m just a broken animal that â€œjumpsâ€ and bows down to any sort of criticism or annoyances. I donâ€™t think I can stand up for myself anymore.

Title: Ugly rant
Content:
WTF. WTF do people want from me? I make a man I work with uncomfortable because I talk to him like guys talk. Seriously heâ€™s not gay, just met a very lovely girl he wonâ€™t shut the fuck up about. This homely little troll has a girlfriend and I canâ€™t have a 2nd date.
Yes, to me heâ€™s effeminate, sorry Iâ€™m old enough to be his Father. I donâ€™t call him names or anything, I just say BS that 2 guy friends say. I guess thereâ€™s just one more person I canâ€™t call friend.
Iâ€™m told to â€œbe part of the teamâ€ but chided at every twist and turn. Even the job, told to do something and then punished for doing it.
For exampleâ€¦
I took an application for a person and I know I asked everything right. I have been beaten into submission to do so these last 3 weeks. Anyway, she shows up, canâ€™t prove her income, that SHE TOLD ME and proceeds to throw my ass under the bus about. Guess who just had a 15 minute bitch session about how I donâ€™t correctly do my job. Much like fighting a woke person, nothing is believed, facts donâ€™t matter, and they canâ€™t be wrong.
I more or less have given up on my 60 day bonus check. I guess I have to conform and be a whiney little effeminate bitch boy too. One that just keeps quiet and bends the knee to everyone.
There is absolutely no respect for me and what I have lived through in my life. When people think that me losing my daughter is equivalent to their dog passing or how my 20yr marriage falling apart with 4 children is like their girlfriend or boyfriend leaving after a year. Why canâ€™t I find a job where I can just be alone, deal with who I need to and be left out of this silly ass shit.

Title: Yep, one of thoseâ€¦
Content:
Soâ€¦. I have no clue how to deal with work. My boss is my age, but seems to want to hang with the younger 2 here. I am totally censored in what I can say because it disturbs the 33 year old man child who himself says some buckass crazy shit. The 26 year old girl has a personal issue with a customer that came in, didnâ€™t even go to her, so she leaves and proceeds to have a liquid lunch and is given the rest of the day off to nurse her â€œbad feelsâ€.
Seriously,Â  is that generation that sad we allow this shit? I saw my ex drive by the other day, could I have left work to nurse my â€œmadâ€? My boss cow tails to these 2 constantly. Now I know Iâ€™m new and still having issues with everything
Â 
I realize Iâ€™m an asshole, but I worked through a total mental breakdown because if I hadnâ€™t, I wouldnâ€™t have had a job. I also understand trying to be understanding and friendly with your employees, but as I said, I wouldnâ€™t be able to do what these two get away with.

Title: Did it again
Content:
I guess Iâ€™m just meant to be alone now. Patty was my last chance and I blew it. Iâ€™m the guy at the end of the counter. Iâ€™m the warning parents give their children that they will become if they do wrong.
All I had to do was not be fucking weird, all I had to do was make the conversation about her more.
Itâ€™s always the same. What will be the brush off? Total ghost? The weâ€™re at 2 different places? The I guess Iâ€™m not really looking? Or maybe she will come right out and tell me I suck.

Title: Just not feeling it
Content:
That was the excuse. No get to know me. No meet up. Just not feeling it.
Fuck Patty. Fuck her for what she did and what itâ€™s done to me.
Sure, itâ€™s all on me to pull myself up, but she put me in a hole with smooth walls and no hand holds. Why? I did nothing to her, but 4 years later here I sit dealing with the fall out. She gladly collects over $500 from me as I scrounge together $3.50 for a pack of a Ramen and live in constant fear of losing what little I have.
And all I want is a friend. Someone to hug and make me feel like thereâ€™s a light somewhere,Â  but no.
Sitting outside of work wanting to give up. I donâ€™t want to face another day with these people. Not face another day of backhanded â€œcritiquesâ€ and being talked down to even if itâ€™s said to be helping me learn.
I shaved last night so now Iâ€™m as ugly on the outside as I am on the inside.

Title: Useless
Content:
Well, after all the BS about â€œit takes timeâ€ to learn the job, apparently the caring and team atmosphere turned against me. I guess I should have acted like a man half my age. I had a banner week, in my opinion,Â  last week, but I should have figured something was up.
So here I am, unemployed again, only this time Iâ€™m screwed. NY being how it is, I probably canâ€™t get back on unemployment.
I donâ€™t know what to do other than what I shouldnâ€™t do. Iâ€™m a burden, a joke, and the farthest thing from a useful human being. I take up space and pull people down.
Thereâ€™s a reason Patty left me. Thereâ€™s a reason why the boys did seem bothered by me going. Thereâ€™s a reason why my family and friends abandoned me.
This whole live for myself shit has me even wanting to leave me. Itâ€™s hard to not feel like a failure when thatâ€™s all you do no matter how hard you try. Getting back on the horse ended years ago. I canâ€™t even get up from the ground.

Title: Being replaced
Content:
Some people say itâ€™s life and others call it change, but I see it as being replaced. Everything about me and who I am or I was has been replaced.
Patty replaced me, work replaced me, he replaced me as â€œdadâ€, my sister replaced me with her in laws, and even my friends replaced me.
I have to somehow accept the fact and no one else does. I have to change what now feels like every 4 months, lose everything all over again and be told that itâ€™s all in my head.
I canâ€™t afford my therapist who made it pretty clear when I said I needed to talk, but I didnâ€™t think I could afford to with a heartfelt ğŸ™ and silence.
Itâ€™s bad enough everyone else thinks I do this all for attention. I deliberately lose jobs and break me myself so people â€œseeâ€ me.
I guess I hate me too.

Title: Love
Content:
I miss having a relationship, eventhough I have learned over the last 4 years I never really had one. Well not how a person should anyway. I donâ€™t think Iâ€™ve ever had one how a person should.
So I donâ€™t know what I am missing at all. I think I know, but I honestly donâ€™t. Chances are I never will.
All my â€œbigâ€ dreams of fatherhood and being a perfect husband are gone, replaced with doing the best I can for my kids and a head full of empty meaningless memories of a relationship that wasnâ€™t.
I long for the return of these relationships where I was left, destroyed, and hurt because it was better than the loneliness I live in now.
Â

Title: 11pm
Content:
If you canâ€™t tell Iâ€™m back in a spot in my life where Iâ€™m doing everything in my power not to hate myself.
One would think this wouldnâ€™t be a hard thing to deal with, but it is. Tonightâ€™s a rough one for me. Especially after this week.
I hate being single, but thereâ€™s no one out there I want to be with. I want to be with someone who made every effort to keep that from ever happening again as quickly as she could. One person who took everything from me and permanently changed everything else.
Â

Title: Another late night
Content:
I hate Iâ€™m back in the endless no sleep nights and days again. I just want normal without this being it. But, thatâ€™s the thing, this has become the â€œnormalâ€. Not sleeping, stressing every night, over eating, and just hating the dawn of a new day.
For 4 years Iâ€™ve had to â€œrestartâ€ several times over and over. Some people think that itâ€™s a great thing to be able to start fresh, they already have all they need. They havenâ€™t lost everything that matters and more, over and over. What little faith I used to have about the â€œbetter tomorrowâ€ is long gone after the 4th better tomorrow Iâ€™ve had to endure. By the 6th and 7th it stops being a wonderful thing.
What little faith I have keeps the razor and noose at bay. Keeps the pills in the cupboard.
I love my kids, but I canâ€™t tell you the last time any of them or anyone has just shown up or called. Itâ€™s been me calling, begging for a relationship and for attention.
Â 
EDIT: I really donâ€™t know why I keep writing. Itâ€™s not helping and going back to read stuff makes me realize I am what people think of me. Longing for attention. An attention whore.
Truth is, Iâ€™ve hated myself for so long, I donâ€™t know any other way. As much as I try and do all the things my therapist and psychiatrist ask of me, it just doesnâ€™t seem to work, which is more of an example of me not caring then them being wrong.

Title: Loneliness
Content:
I know what I do and whatâ€™s wrong with me, but it doesnâ€™t help to curb the feelings. I catastrophy. I have no idea how to spell that, but I see the worst in everything.
There seemed like there used to be a time where people would come up to me to talk or women would flirt, now it feels like Iâ€™m avoided no matter what my mood may be. Yes, I understand the concept of being happy to attract happy and all the hippie dippie stuff. I doesnâ€™tÂ  work for me. Iâ€™ve become all that I never wanted to be. Iâ€™ve become the man I always said I hope I wouldnâ€™t be.
Â

Title: Why am I at this bar?
Content:
Fuck people are stupid. Then again so am I.
I waddled down to the shit bar in town, still not sure, I guess maybe I thought I might bumped into someone. Instead itâ€™s a room full of sad loud talking drunks confessing their love to stupid shit, dirty looks at me for saying hi to someone who doesnâ€™t even return the greeting.
Each one of these people are sad human, but Iâ€™m the saddest. They atleast have each other. I canâ€™t even find a spot at the bar, so I am sitting off to the side by myself. How sad is that? I came here to feel not so alone and Iâ€™m more alone then when I walked in.
Sad thing is I will just have 1 beer and will walk home like Iâ€™m drunken because my knees are bad and cause me to stumble anyway.
